Molecular Design.title: Florigen activation complex forms via multifaceted assembly in Arabidopsis
Molecular Design.summary: Nature, Published online: 12 November 2025;doi:10.1038/s41586-025-09704-6In flowering plants, DNA–FD–14-3-3 recruits FT to the florigen activation complex both through DNA–FT interactions and by reducing liquid phase condensation of FD protein, which promotes dimerization, leading to FT recruitment.
Molecular Design.abstract: Florigen, encoded by FT genes, is synthesized in leaves and transported to the shoot apical meristem (SAM) to induce flower development1–3. At the SAM, 14-3-3 proteins are proposed to act as receptors for FT protein and to mediate the indirect interaction between FT and the basic leucine zipper (bZIP) transcription factor FD to form the florigen activation complex (FAC) that activates transcription of flowering genes4–6. Here we demonstrate a different mechanism of FAC assembly, diverse functions for the 14-3-3 proteins within the complex, and an unexpected spatiotemporal distribution of the FAC. We show that FT is not recruited by 14-3-3 alone, but that it interacts with the DNA–FD–14-3-3 complex through two interfaces, one of which binds DNA via the unstructured C terminus of FT. We also find that interaction of 14-3-3 proteins with the C terminus of phosphorylated FD reduces liquid phase condensation of the intrinsically disordered FD protein, allowing it to bind DNA, and that the 14-3-3 proteins strengthen DNA binding of FD by promoting dimerization, which ultimately results in the recruitment of FT. Unexpectedly, we also find that after FT movement to the shoot apex, FT and FD are co-transcribed in young floral primordia, forming a boundary with the suppressed bract and allowing formation of the FAC during the first stages of floral development. Our studies propose a new mechanism by which the florigen FT transcriptional complex is formed, and indicate distinct functions for the complex during SAM and floral primordium development. In flowering plants, DNA–FD–14-3-3 recruits FT to the florigen activation complex both through DNA–FT interactions and by reducing liquid phase condensation of FD protein, which promotes dimerization, leading to FT recruitment.
Molecular Design.authors_short: Gao, He et al., Coupland, George
Molecular Design.title_cn: 拟南芥中成花素激活复合体通过多途径组装形成
Molecular Design.abstract_cn: 成花素（Florigen）由FT基因编码，在叶片中合成后被转运至茎尖分生组织（SAM），以诱导花朵发育1–3。在SAM中，14-3-3蛋白被认为是FT蛋白的受体，并介导FT与碱性亮氨酸拉链（bZIP）转录因子FD之间的间接相互作用，从而形成激活开花基因转录的成花素激活复合体（FAC）4–6。本研究揭示了FAC组装的一种不同机制、复合体中14-3-3蛋白的多种功能以及FAC出乎意料的时空分布。我们发现FT并非单独由14-3-3招募，而是通过两个界面与DNA–FD–14-3-3复合体相互作用，其中一个界面通过FT的非结构化C末端结合DNA。我们还发现，14-3-3蛋白与磷酸化FD的C末端相互作用，可减少内在无序FD蛋白的液相凝聚，使其能够结合DNA；并且14-3-3蛋白通过促进二聚化来增强FD的DNA结合能力，最终导致FT的招募。出乎意料的是，我们还发现，在FT转运至茎尖后，FT和FD在幼花原基中共同转录，与受抑制的苞片形成边界，并允许FAC在花朵发育的最初阶段形成。我们的研究提出了一种成花素FT转录复合体形成的新机制，并揭示了该复合体在SAM和花原基发育过程中的不同功能。在开花植物中，DNA–FD–14-3-3通过DNA–FT相互作用以及减少FD蛋白的液相凝聚（从而促进二聚化）来招募FT进入成花素激活复合体，最终实现FT的招募。

Molecular Design.title: Photoinduced twist and untwist of moiré superlattices
Molecular Design.summary: Nature, Published online: 12 November 2025;doi:10.1038/s41586-025-09707-3Femtosecond photoexcitation drives a coherent twist–untwist motion of the moiré superlattice in 2° and 57° twisted WSe2/MoSe2 heterobilayers.
Molecular Design.abstract: Two-dimensional moiré materials are formed by artificially stacking atomically thin monolayers. Correlated and topological quantum phases can be engineered by precise choice of stacking geometry1–3. These designer electronic properties depend crucially on interlayer coupling and atomic registry4,5. An open question is how the atomic registry responds on ultrafast timescales to optical excitation and whether the moiré geometry can be dynamically reconfigured to tune emergent phenomena in real time. Here we show that femtosecond photoexcitation drives a coherent twist–untwist motion of the moiré superlattice in 2° and 57° twisted WSe2/MoSe2 heterobilayers, resolved directly by ultrafast electron diffraction. On above-band-gap photoexcitation, the moiré superlattice diffraction features are enhanced within 1 ps and subsequently suppressed several picoseconds after, deviating markedly from typical photoinduced lattice heating. Kinetic diffraction analysis, supported by simulations of the sample dynamics, indicates a peak-to-trough local twist angle modulation of 0.6°, correlated with a sub-THz frequency moiré phonon. This motion is driven by ultrafast charge transfer that transiently increases interlayer attraction. Our results could lead to ultrafast control of moiré periodic lattice distortions and, by extension, the local moiré potential that shapes excitons, polarons and correlation-driven behaviours. Femtosecond photoexcitation drives a coherent twist–untwist motion of the moiré superlattice in 2° and 57° twisted WSe2/MoSe2 heterobilayers.
Molecular Design.authors_short: Duncan, Cameron J. R. et al., Liu, Fang
Molecular Design.title_cn: 光致莫尔超晶格的扭转与解扭
Molecular Design.abstract_cn: 二维莫尔材料通过人工堆叠原子级薄的单层材料而形成。通过精确选择堆叠几何结构，可以设计出关联和拓扑量子相。这些设计出的电子特性关键取决于层间耦合和原子对准。一个悬而未决的问题是，原子对准如何在超快时间尺度上响应光激发，以及莫尔几何结构是否能够动态重构以实时调控涌现现象。本文展示了飞秒光激发驱动2°和57°扭曲WSe2/MoSe2异质双层中莫尔超晶格的相干扭转-解扭运动，并通过超快电子衍射直接解析。在高于带隙的光激发下，莫尔超晶格衍射特征在1皮秒内增强，随后在几皮秒后被抑制，这与典型的光致晶格加热现象显著不同。动力学衍射分析，辅以样品动力学模拟，表明局部扭转角存在0.6°的峰谷调制，这与亚太赫兹频率的莫尔声子相关联。这种运动是由超快电荷转移驱动的，该转移瞬时增强了层间吸引力。我们的研究结果有望实现对莫尔周期性晶格畸变的超快控制，并进而实现对塑造激子、极化子和关联驱动行为的局部莫尔势的超快调控。飞秒光激发驱动2°和57°扭曲WSe2/MoSe2异质双层中莫尔超晶格的相干扭转-解扭运动。

Molecular Design.title: A molecularly impermeable polymer from two-dimensional polyaramids
Molecular Design.summary: Nature, Published online: 12 November 2025;doi:10.1038/s41586-025-09674-9Two-dimensional polyaramid polymers are synthesized to form nanofilms that exhibit the lowest gas permeability of any polymer by orders of magnitude, despite lacking crystallinity, enabling molecular-scale nanomechanical resonators and barrier materials.
Molecular Design.abstract: All polymers exhibit gas permeability through the free volume of entangled polymer chains1–3. By contrast, two-dimensional (2D) materials including graphene stack densely and can exhibit molecular impermeability4–6. Solution-synthesized 2D polymers that exhibit the latter by poly-condensation have been a longstanding goal. Herein, we demonstrate self-supporting, spin-coated 2D polyaramid nanofilms that exhibit nitrogen permeability below 3.1 × 10−9 Barrer, nearly four orders of magnitude lower than every class of existing polymer, and similar for other gases tested (helium, argon, oxygen, methane and sulfur hexafluoride). Optical interference during the pressurization of nanofilm-coated microwells allows measurement of mechanosensitive rim opening and sealing, creating gas-filled bulges that are stable exceeding three years. This discovery enables 2D polymer resonators with high resonance frequencies (about 8 MHz) and quality factors up to 537, similar to graphene. A 60-nm coating of air-sensitive perovskites reduces the lattice degradation rate 14-fold with an oxygen permeability of 3.3 × 10−8 Barrer. Molecularly impermeable polymers promise the next generation of barriers that are synthetically processable, chemically amenable and maximize molecular rejection with minimal material, ultimately advancing sustainability goals. Two-dimensional polyaramid polymers are synthesized to form nanofilms that exhibit the lowest gas permeability of any polymer by orders of magnitude, despite lacking crystallinity, enabling molecular-scale nanomechanical resonators and barrier materials.
Molecular Design.authors_short: Ritt, Cody L. et al., Strano, Michael S.
Molecular Design.title_cn: 由二维聚芳酰胺制备的分子不渗透聚合物
Molecular Design.abstract_cn: 所有聚合物都通过缠结聚合物链的自由体积表现出气体渗透性1–3。相比之下，包括石墨烯在内的二维(2D)材料堆叠紧密，能够表现出分子不渗透性4–6。通过缩聚反应合成的、能表现出分子不渗透性的溶液法二维聚合物，一直是长期以来的研究目标。在本文中，我们展示了自支撑、旋涂的二维聚芳酰胺纳米薄膜，其氮气渗透率低于3.1 × 10−9 Barrer，比现有各类聚合物低近四个数量级，对其他测试气体（氦气、氩气、氧气、甲烷和六氟化硫）也表现出相似的低渗透性。纳米薄膜涂覆微孔在加压过程中的光学干涉，使得机械敏感边缘的开启和密封得以测量，从而形成可稳定超过三年的充气凸起。这一发现使得二维聚合物谐振器能够实现高谐振频率（约8 MHz）和高达537的品质因数，与石墨烯相似。一层60纳米厚的涂层可用于保护对空气敏感的钙钛矿，将其晶格降解速率降低14倍，氧气渗透率为3.3 × 10−8 Barrer。分子不渗透聚合物有望成为下一代屏障材料，它们具有合成可加工性、化学适应性，并能以最少的材料实现最大的分子排斥，最终推动可持续发展目标的实现。二维聚芳酰胺聚合物被合成以形成纳米薄膜，尽管缺乏结晶度，但其气体渗透率比任何其他聚合物低数个数量级，从而实现了分子尺度的纳米机械谐振器和屏障材料。

Molecular Design.title: Proteomic sensors for quantitative multiplexed and spatial monitoring of kinase signaling
Molecular Design.summary: Nature Communications, Published online: 13 November 2025;doi:10.1038/s41467-025-65950-2Understanding kinase action requires precise quantitative and spatial measurements of their activity in vivo. Here the authors develop a proteomic kinase activity sensor technique (ProKAS) enabling multiplexed spatial, kinetic, and screening analyses of kinase activities via mass spectrometry.
Molecular Design.abstract: Understanding kinase action requires precise quantitative measurements of their activity in vivo. In addition, the ability to capture spatial information of kinase activity is crucial to deconvolute complex signaling networks, interrogate multifaceted kinase actions, and assess drug effects or genetic perturbations. Here we develop a proteomic kinase activity sensor technique (ProKAS) for the analysis of kinase signaling using mass spectrometry. ProKAS is based on a tandem array of peptide sensors with amino acid barcodes that allow multiplexed analysis for spatial, kinetic, and screening applications. We engineered a ProKAS module to simultaneously monitor the activities of the DNA damage response kinases ATR, ATM, and CHK1 in response to genotoxic drugs, while also uncovering differences between these signaling responses in the nucleus, cytosol, and replication factories. Furthermore, we developed an in silico approach for the rational design of specific substrate peptides expandable to other kinases. Overall, ProKAS is a versatile system for systematically and spatially probing kinase action in cells. Understanding kinase action requires precise quantitative and spatial measurements of their activity in vivo. Here the authors develop a proteomic kinase activity sensor technique (ProKAS) enabling multiplexed spatial, kinetic, and screening analyses of kinase activities via mass spectrometry.
Molecular Design.authors_short: Comstock, William J. et al., Smolka, Marcus B.
Molecular Design.title_cn: 蛋白质组学传感器用于激酶信号传导的定量、多重和空间监测
Molecular Design.abstract_cn: 理解激酶的作用需要对其体内活性进行精确的定量测量。此外，捕获激酶活性的空间信息对于解析复杂的信号网络、探究多方面的激酶作用以及评估药物效应或基因扰动至关重要。在本文中，我们开发了一种基于质谱的蛋白质组学激酶活性传感器技术（ProKAS），用于分析激酶信号传导。ProKAS基于带有氨基酸条形码的串联肽传感器阵列，可实现空间、动力学和筛选应用的多重分析。我们设计了一个ProKAS模块，用于同时监测DNA损伤响应激酶ATR、ATM和CHK1在基因毒性药物作用下的活性，并揭示了这些信号响应在细胞核、细胞质和复制工厂之间的差异。此外，我们开发了一种计算方法（in silico approach），用于合理设计可扩展至其他激酶的特异性底物肽。总之，ProKAS是一个多功能系统，可用于系统性地、空间性地探测细胞中的激酶作用。理解激酶的作用需要对其体内活性进行精确的定量和空间测量。本文中，作者开发了一种蛋白质组学激酶活性传感器技术（ProKAS），该技术能够通过质谱实现激酶活性的多重空间、动力学和筛选分析。

Molecular Design.title: SynGFN: learning across chemical space with generative flow-based molecular discovery
Molecular Design.summary: Nature Computational Science, Published online: 13 November 2025;doi:10.1038/s43588-025-00902-wA persistent gap from theoretical molecules to experimentally viable compounds has hindered the practical adoption of generative algorithms. This study proposes SynGFN as a bridge linking molecular design and synthesis, accelerating exploration and producing diverse, synthesizable, high-performance molecules.
Molecular Design.abstract: In recent years, artificial intelligence has advanced the design–make–test–analyze cycle, transforming molecular discovery. Despite these advances, the compartmentalized approach to computer-aided molecular design and synthesis remains a critical bottleneck, limiting further optimization of the design–make–test–analyze cycle. Here, to this end, we introduce SynGFN, which models molecular design as a cascade of simulated chemical reactions, enabling the assembly of molecules from synthesizable building blocks. SynGFN features two key ingredients: (1) a hierarchically pretrained policy network that accelerates learning across diverse distributions of desirable molecules in chemical spaces, and (2) a multifidelity acquisition framework to alleviate the cost of reward evaluations. These technical developments collectively endow SynGFN with the capability to explore a chemical space up to an order of magnitude larger (measured in terms of #Circles) than that of other synthesis-aware generative models, while identifying the most diverse, synthesizable and high-performance molecules. We demonstrate SynGFN’s potential impacts by designing inhibitors for GluN1/GluN3A, a therapeutic target for neuropsychiatric disorders. A persistent gap from theoretical molecules to experimentally viable compounds has hindered the practical adoption of generative algorithms. This study proposes SynGFN as a bridge linking molecular design and synthesis, accelerating exploration and producing diverse, synthesizable, high-performance molecules.
Molecular Design.authors_short: Zhu, Yuchen et al., Hsieh, Chang-Yu
Molecular Design.title_cn: SynGFN：基于生成流的分子发现，实现跨化学空间学习
Molecular Design.abstract_cn: 近年来，人工智能推动了“设计-合成-测试-分析”循环的发展，从而革新了分子发现领域。尽管取得了这些进展，但计算机辅助分子设计和合成的割裂方法仍然是一个关键瓶颈，限制了“设计-合成-测试-分析”循环的进一步优化。为此，我们引入了SynGFN，它将分子设计建模为一系列模拟化学反应，从而能够从可合成的构建块组装分子。SynGFN具有两个关键要素：(1) 一个分层预训练的策略网络，可加速在化学空间中多样化理想分子分布上的学习；(2) 一个多保真度采集框架，以减轻奖励评估的成本。这些技术发展共同赋予SynGFN探索比其他合成感知生成模型大一个数量级（以#Circles衡量）的化学空间的能力，同时识别出最多样化、可合成且高性能的分子。我们通过设计GluN1/GluN3A（一种神经精神疾病的治疗靶点）的抑制剂，展示了SynGFN的潜在影响。从理论分子到实验可行化合物之间长期存在的鸿沟阻碍了生成算法的实际应用。本研究提出SynGFN作为连接分子设计与合成的桥梁，加速了探索并生成了多样化、可合成且高性能的分子。

Neuroscience.title: Rare genetic variants confer a high risk of ADHD and implicate neuronal biology
Neuroscience.summary: Nature, Published online: 12 November 2025;doi:10.1038/s41586-025-09702-8An analysis of rare genetic variants identifies three genes—MAP1A, ANO8 and ANK2—that have a role in attention deficit hyperactivity disorder (ADHD) and investigates the potential underlying biological mechanisms.
Neuroscience.abstract: Attention deficit hyperactivity disorder (ADHD) is a childhood-onset neurodevelopmental disorder with a large genetic component1. It affects around 5% of children and 2.5% of adults2, and is associated with several severe outcomes3–11. Common genetic variants associated with the disorder have been identified12,13, but the role of rare variants in ADHD is mostly unknown. Here, by analysing rare coding variants in exome-sequencing data from 8,895 individuals with ADHD and 53,780 control individuals, we identify three genes (MAP1A, ANO8 and ANK2; P < 3.07 × 10−6; odds ratios 5.55–15.13) that are implicated in ADHD. The protein–protein interaction networks of these three genes were enriched for rare-variant risk genes of other neurodevelopmental disorders, and for genes involved in cytoskeleton organization, synapse function and RNA processing. Top associated rare-variant risk genes showed increased expression across pre- and postnatal brain developmental stages and in several neuronal cell types, including GABAergic (γ-aminobutyric-acid-producing) and dopaminergic neurons. Deleterious variants were associated with lower socioeconomic status and lower levels of education in individuals with ADHD, and a decrease of 2.25 intelligence quotient (IQ) points per rare deleterious variant in a sample of adults with ADHD (n = 962). Individuals with ADHD and intellectual disability showed an increased load of rare variants overall, whereas other psychiatric comorbidities had an increased load only for specific gene sets associated with those comorbidities. This suggests that psychiatric comorbidity in ADHD is driven mainly by rare variants in specific genes, rather than by a general increased load across constrained genes. An analysis of rare genetic variants identifies three genes—MAP1A, ANO8 and ANK2—that have a role in attention deficit hyperactivity disorder (ADHD) and investigates the potential underlying biological mechanisms.
Neuroscience.authors_short: Demontis, Ditte et al., Børglum, Anders D.
Neuroscience.title_cn: 罕见遗传变异赋予注意缺陷多动障碍高风险并揭示神经元生物学机制
Neuroscience.abstract_cn: 注意缺陷多动障碍 (ADHD) 是一种儿童期起病的神经发育障碍，具有显著的遗传组分1。它影响约5%的儿童和2.5%的成人2，并与多种严重不良结局相关3–11。尽管与该疾病相关的常见遗传变异已被识别12,13，但罕见变异在ADHD中的作用尚不明确。本研究通过分析来自8,895名ADHD患者和53,780名对照个体的外显子组测序数据中的罕见编码变异，识别出三个与ADHD相关的基因 (MAP1A, ANO8 和 ANK2; P < 3.07 × 10−6; 优势比 5.55–15.13)。这三个基因的蛋白质-蛋白质相互作用网络富集了其他神经发育障碍的罕见变异风险基因，以及参与细胞骨架组织、突触功能和RNA加工的基因。与ADHD最相关的罕见变异风险基因在产前和产后大脑发育阶段以及多种神经元细胞类型（包括GABA能神经元和多巴胺能神经元）中表现出更高的表达。有害变异与ADHD患者较低的社会经济地位和受教育水平相关，并且在ADHD成人样本 (n = 962) 中，每个罕见有害变异导致智商 (IQ) 平均下降2.25分。患有ADHD和智力障碍的个体总体上表现出罕见变异负荷增加，而其他精神共病仅在与这些共病相关的特定基因集中表现出负荷增加。这表明ADHD中的精神共病主要由特定基因中的罕见变异驱动，而非受限基因的普遍负荷增加所致。对罕见遗传变异的分析识别出三个在注意缺陷多动障碍 (ADHD) 中发挥作用的基因——MAP1A、ANO8和ANK2——并探讨了其潜在的生物学机制。

Neuroscience.title: In situ structural mechanism of epothilone-B-induced CNS axon regeneration
Neuroscience.summary: Nature, Published online: 12 November 2025;doi:10.1038/s41586-025-09654-zA combined cryo-electron tomography and cryo-electron microscopy pipeline was developed to inflict axonal damage and monitor the cellular response induced by epothilone B, revealing that microtubule polymerization at and beyond the lesion site promote axon regeneration.
Neuroscience.abstract: Axons in the adult central nervous system (CNS) do not regenerate following injury, in contrast to neurons in the peripheral nervous system and neuronal growth during embryonic development. The molecular mechanisms that prevent regeneration of neurons in the CNS remain largely unknown1,2. Here, to address the intracellular response to injury, we developed an in situ cryo-electron tomography and cryo-electron microscopy platform to mimic axonal damage and present the structural mechanism underlying thalamic axon regeneration induced by the drug epothilone B. We observed that stabilized microtubules extend beyond the injury site, generating membrane tension and driving membrane expansion. Cryo-electron microscopy reveals the in situ structure of microtubules at 3.19 Å resolution, which engage epothilone B within the microtubule lattice at the regenerating front. During repair, tubulin clusters are delivered and incorporated into polymerizing microtubules at the regenerating site. These microtubule shoots serve as scaffolds for various types of vesicles and endoplasmic reticulum, facilitating the supply of materials necessary for axon repair until membrane tension normalizes. We demonstrate the unexpected ability of neuronal cells to adjust to strain induced by epothilone B, which creates homeostatic imbalances and activates axons to regeneration mode. A combined cryo-electron tomography and cryo-electron microscopy pipeline was developed to inflict axonal damage and monitor the cellular response induced by epothilone B, revealing that microtubule polymerization at and beyond the lesion site promote axon regeneration.
Neuroscience.authors_short: Bodakuntla, Satish et al., Mizuno, Naoko
Neuroscience.title_cn: 埃博霉素B诱导的中枢神经系统轴突再生的原位结构机制
Neuroscience.abstract_cn: 与周围神经系统中的神经元以及胚胎发育过程中的神经元生长不同，成年中枢神经系统（CNS）的轴突在损伤后无法再生。阻止CNS神经元再生的分子机制在很大程度上仍不清楚1,2。为了探究损伤后的细胞内响应，我们开发了一个原位冷冻电子断层扫描和冷冻电子显微镜平台，以模拟轴突损伤，并揭示了药物埃博霉素B诱导的丘脑轴突再生的结构机制。我们观察到，稳定的微管延伸至损伤部位之外，产生膜张力并驱动膜扩张。冷冻电子显微镜以3.19 Å的分辨率揭示了微管的原位结构，显示埃博霉素B在再生前沿与微管晶格结合。在修复过程中，微管蛋白簇被输送并整合到再生部位正在聚合的微管中。这些微管“芽”作为各种囊泡和内质网的支架，促进轴突修复所需物质的供应，直至膜张力恢复正常。我们证明了神经细胞具有出乎意料的能力，能够适应埃博霉素B诱导的应变，这种应变会产生稳态失衡并激活轴突进入再生模式。我们开发了一种结合冷冻电子断层扫描和冷冻电子显微镜的流程，用于造成轴突损伤并监测埃博霉素B诱导的细胞响应，结果表明损伤部位及损伤部位之外的微管聚合促进了轴突再生。

Neuroscience.title: iPEX enables micrometre-resolution deep spatial proteomics via tissue expansion
Neuroscience.summary: Nature, Published online: 12 November 2025;doi:10.1038/s41586-025-09734-0Isotropic tissue magnification is integrated with matrix-assisted laser desorption/ionization mass spectrometry imaging to enable untargeted spatial proteomics at micrometre resolution and with high protein identification rates in multiple tissue types.
Neuroscience.abstract: The number of spatial omics technologies being developed is increasing1. However, a missing tool is one that can locate proteins in tissues in an untargeted manner at high spatial resolution and coverage. Here we present in situ imaging proteomics via expansion (iPEX), which integrates isotropic tissue magnification2 with matrix-assisted laser desorption/ionization (MALDI) mass spectrometry imaging. iPEX provides scalable spatial resolution down to the micrometre scale and substantially increases the sensitivity of protein identification by 10–100-fold. Using the retina as a model, iPEX enabled the construction of spatial proteomic maps with high precision, the visualization of single-cell layers and extrasomatic structures and the identification of colocalized proteins. iPEX was readily applied to diverse tissues, including brain, intestine, liver and organoids, detecting 600–1,500 proteins at 1–5-µm effective pixel size. The application of iPEX to depict spatial proteomic maps in brains of mice with 5xFAD Alzheimer’s disease revealed an early-onset mitochondrial aberrancy. Notably, in young mice, the peroxisomal acetyl-CoA acyltransferase ACAA1A—of which the N392S mutant is a monogenic risk factor in Alzheimer’s disease3—was downregulated. ACAA1 depletion blocked the biosynthesis of long-chain polyunsaturated fatty acids, including docosahexaenoic acid, in multiple cellular contexts. These lipidome alterations were restored in cells overexpressing wild-type ACAA1 but not ACAA1(N392S), which suggests that the dysregulation of long-chain polyunsaturated fatty acids has an early role in neurodegeneration. Together, these results demonstrate that iPEX facilitates untargeted spatial proteomics at micrometre resolution for diverse applications. Isotropic tissue magnification is integrated with matrix-assisted laser desorption/ionization mass spectrometry imaging to enable untargeted spatial proteomics at micrometre resolution and with high protein identification rates in multiple tissue types.
Neuroscience.authors_short: Wang, Fengxiang et al., Zou, Yilong
Neuroscience.title_cn: iPEX通过组织膨胀技术实现微米级深度空间蛋白质组学
Neuroscience.abstract_cn: 空间组学技术正日益发展。然而，目前仍缺乏一种能够以高空间分辨率和覆盖度，非靶向地定位组织中蛋白质的工具。本文介绍了一种通过膨胀实现的体内成像蛋白质组学（iPEX）技术，该技术将各向同性组织放大技术与基质辅助激光解吸/电离（MALDI）质谱成像相结合。iPEX可提供低至微米级的可扩展空间分辨率，并将蛋白质识别灵敏度显著提高了10至100倍。以视网膜为模型，iPEX能够高精度地构建空间蛋白质组图谱，可视化单细胞层和体外结构，并识别共定位蛋白质。iPEX易于应用于多种组织，包括大脑、肠道、肝脏和类器官，在1-5微米的有效像素尺寸下检测到600-1500种蛋白质。将iPEX应用于描绘5xFAD阿尔茨海默病小鼠大脑中的空间蛋白质组图谱，揭示了早期线粒体异常。值得注意的是，在年轻小鼠中，过氧化物酶体乙酰辅酶A酰基转移酶ACAA1A（其N392S突变体是阿尔茨海默病的单基因风险因素）表达下调。ACAA1的缺失阻断了多种细胞环境中长链多不饱和脂肪酸（包括二十二碳六烯酸）的生物合成。这些脂质组改变在过表达野生型ACAA1的细胞中得到恢复，但在过表达ACAA1(N392S)的细胞中未能恢复，这表明长链多不饱和脂肪酸的失调在神经退行性疾病中具有早期作用。综上所述，这些结果表明iPEX能够实现微米级分辨率的非靶向空间蛋白质组学，并具有广泛的应用前景。该技术通过将各向同性组织放大技术与基质辅助激光解吸/电离质谱成像相结合，在多种组织类型中实现了微米级分辨率和高蛋白质识别率的非靶向空间蛋白质组学。

Neuroscience.title: Aligning machine and human visual representations across abstraction levels
Neuroscience.summary: Nature, Published online: 12 November 2025;doi:10.1038/s41586-025-09631-6Aligning foundation models with human judgments enables them to more accurately approximate human behaviour and uncertainty across various levels of visual abstraction, while additionally improving their generalization performance.
Neuroscience.abstract: Deep neural networks have achieved success across a wide range of applications, including as models of human behaviour and neural representations in vision tasks1,2. However, neural network training and human learning differ in fundamental ways, and neural networks often fail to generalize as robustly as humans do3,4, raising questions regarding the similarity of their underlying representations. We need to determine what is missing for modern learning systems to exhibit more human-aligned behaviour. Here we highlight a key misalignment between vision models and humans: whereas human conceptual knowledge is hierarchically organized from fine- to coarse-scale distinctions (for example, ref. 5), model representations do not accurately capture all these levels of abstraction. To address this misalignment, we first train a teacher model to imitate human judgements, then transfer human-aligned structure from its representations to refine the representations of pretrained state-of-the-art vision foundation models via fine-tuning. These human-aligned models more accurately approximate human behaviour and uncertainty across a wide range of similarity tasks, including a dataset of human judgements spanning multiple levels of semantic abstractions. They also perform better on a diverse set of machine learning tasks, increasing generalization and out-of-distribution robustness. Thus, infusing neural networks with additional human knowledge yields a best-of-both-worlds representation that is both more consistent with human cognitive judgements and more practically useful, paving the way towards more robust, interpretable and human-aligned artificial intelligence systems. Aligning foundation models with human judgments enables them to more accurately approximate human behaviour and uncertainty across various levels of visual abstraction, while additionally improving their generalization performance.
Neuroscience.authors_short: Muttenthaler, Lukas et al., Lampinen, Andrew K.
Neuroscience.title_cn: 跨抽象层级对齐机器与人类视觉表征
Neuroscience.abstract_cn: 深度神经网络已在广泛应用中取得成功，包括作为视觉任务中人类行为和神经表征的模型。然而，神经网络训练与人类学习在根本上存在差异，且神经网络在泛化能力上往往不如人类鲁棒，这引发了对其底层表征相似性的质疑。我们需要确定现代学习系统要展现出更符合人类的行为还缺少什么。在此，我们强调了视觉模型与人类之间的一个关键错位：人类概念知识是按从精细到粗略的区分（例如，参考文献5）分层组织的，而模型表征未能准确捕捉所有这些抽象层次。为解决这一错位，我们首先训练一个教师模型来模仿人类判断，然后通过微调，将其表征中与人类对齐的结构迁移到预训练的SOTA视觉基础模型中，以优化其表征。这些与人类对齐的模型在广泛的相似性任务中，包括一个涵盖多个语义抽象层次的人类判断数据集，能更准确地模拟人类行为和不确定性。它们还在多样化的机器学习任务中表现更佳，提高了泛化能力和分布外鲁棒性。因此，将额外的人类知识注入神经网络，能够产生一种兼具优势的表征，它既更符合人类认知判断，又更具实际应用价值，为构建更鲁棒、可解释和与人类对齐的人工智能系统铺平了道路。将基础模型与人类判断对齐，使其能够更准确地模拟人类在不同视觉抽象层次上的行为和不确定性，同时还能提高其泛化性能。

Neuroscience.title: Convolutional architectures are cortex-aligned de novo
Neuroscience.summary: Nature Machine Intelligence, Published online: 13 November 2025;doi:10.1038/s42256-025-01142-3Kazemian et al. report that untrained convolutional networks with wide layers predict primate visual cortex responses nearly as well as task-optimized networks, revealing how architectural constraints shape brain-like representations in deep networks.
Neuroscience.abstract: What underlies the emergence of cortex-aligned representations in deep neural network models of vision? Earlier work suggested that shared architectural constraints were a major factor, but the success of widely varied architectures after pretraining raises critical questions about the importance of architectural constraints. Here we show that in wide networks with minimal training, architectural inductive biases have a prominent role. We examined networks with varied architectures but no pretraining and quantified their ability to predict image representations in the visual cortices of monkeys and humans. We found that cortex-aligned representations emerge in convolutional architectures that combine two key manipulations of dimensionality: compression in the spatial domain, through pooling, and expansion in the feature domain by increasing the number of channels. We further show that the inductive biases of convolutional architectures are critical for obtaining performance gains from feature expansion—dimensionality manipulations were relatively ineffective in other architectures and in convolutional models with targeted lesions. Our findings suggest that the architectural constraints of convolutional networks are sufficiently close to the constraints of biological vision to allow many aspects of cortical visual representation to emerge even before synaptic connections have been tuned through experience. Kazemian et al. report that untrained convolutional networks with wide layers predict primate visual cortex responses nearly as well as task-optimized networks, revealing how architectural constraints shape brain-like representations in deep networks.
Neuroscience.authors_short: Kazemian, Atlas et al., Bonner, Michael F.
Neuroscience.title_cn: 卷积架构的皮层对齐是其固有的
Neuroscience.abstract_cn: 视觉深度神经网络模型中与皮层对齐的表征是如何产生的？此前研究表明，共享的架构约束是一个主要因素，但预训练后各种架构的成功引发了对架构约束重要性的质疑。本研究表明，在经过最少训练的宽网络中，架构归纳偏置发挥着重要作用。我们考察了具有不同架构但未经预训练的网络，并量化了它们预测猴子和人类视觉皮层图像表征的能力。我们发现，与皮层对齐的表征出现在卷积架构中，这些架构结合了维度操作的两个关键方面：通过池化在空间域进行压缩，以及通过增加通道数在特征域进行扩展。我们进一步表明，卷积架构的归纳偏置对于从特征扩展中获得性能提升至关重要——维度操作在其他架构以及经过靶向损伤的卷积模型中相对无效。我们的研究结果表明，卷积网络的架构约束与生物视觉的约束足够接近，使得皮层视觉表征的许多方面甚至在突触连接通过经验调整之前就能出现。Kazemian 等人报告称，未经训练的宽层卷积网络预测灵长类动物视觉皮层反应的能力几乎与任务优化的网络相当，揭示了架构约束如何在深度网络中塑造类脑表征。

Neuroscience.title: Jaxley: differentiable simulation enables large-scale training of detailed biophysical models of neural dynamics
Neuroscience.summary: Nature Methods, Published online: 13 November 2025;doi:10.1038/s41592-025-02895-wJaxley is a versatile platform for biophysical modeling in neuroscience. It allows efficiently simulating large-scale biophysical models on CPUs, GPUs and TPUs. Model parameters can be optimized with gradient descent via backpropagation of error.
Neuroscience.abstract: Biophysical neuron models provide insights into cellular mechanisms underlying neural computations. A central challenge has been to identify parameters of detailed biophysical models such that they match physiological measurements or perform computational tasks. Here we describe a framework for simulating biophysical models in neuroscience—Jaxley—which addresses this challenge. By making use of automatic differentiation and GPU acceleration, Jaxley enables optimizing large-scale biophysical models with gradient descent. Jaxley can learn biophysical neuron models to match voltage or two-photon calcium recordings, sometimes orders of magnitude more efficiently than previous methods. Jaxley also makes it possible to train biophysical neuron models to perform computational tasks. We train a recurrent neural network to perform working memory tasks, and a network of morphologically detailed neurons with 100,000 parameters to solve a computer vision task. Jaxley improves the ability to build large-scale data- or task-constrained biophysical models, creating opportunities for investigating the mechanisms underlying neural computations across multiple scales. Jaxley is a versatile platform for biophysical modeling in neuroscience. It allows efficiently simulating large-scale biophysical models on CPUs, GPUs and TPUs. Model parameters can be optimized with gradient descent via backpropagation of error.
Neuroscience.authors_short: Deistler, Michael et al., Macke, Jakob H.
Neuroscience.title_cn: Jaxley：可微分模拟赋能神经动力学详细生物物理模型的大规模训练
Neuroscience.abstract_cn: 神经元生物物理模型为理解神经计算背后的细胞机制提供了深刻见解。然而，一个核心挑战是如何识别详细生物物理模型的参数，使其能够匹配生理测量数据或执行特定的计算任务。本文介绍了一个用于神经科学中生物物理模型模拟的框架——Jaxley，它旨在解决这一挑战。通过利用自动微分和GPU加速，Jaxley能够通过梯度下降优化大规模生物物理模型。Jaxley可以学习神经元生物物理模型以匹配电压或双光子钙记录，其效率有时比现有方法高出数个数量级。Jaxley还使得训练生物物理神经元模型以执行计算任务成为可能。我们训练了一个循环神经网络来执行工作记忆任务，并训练了一个包含10万个参数的形态学详细神经元网络来解决计算机视觉任务。Jaxley提升了构建大规模数据或任务约束生物物理模型的能力，为跨尺度研究神经计算的潜在机制创造了机会。Jaxley是一个多功能的神经科学生物物理建模平台，它允许在CPU、GPU和TPU上高效模拟大规模生物物理模型。模型参数可以通过误差反向传播利用梯度下降进行优化。

Neuroscience.title: Solving sparse finite element problems on neuromorphic hardware
Neuroscience.summary: Nature Machine Intelligence, Published online: 13 November 2025;doi:10.1038/s42256-025-01143-2Theilman and Aimone introduce a natively spiking algorithm for solving partial differential equations on large-scale neuromorphic computers and demonstrate the algorithm on Intel’s Loihi 2 neuromorphic research chip.
Neuroscience.abstract: The finite element method (FEM) is one of the most important and ubiquitous numerical methods for solving partial differential equations (PDEs) on computers for scientific and engineering discovery. Applying the FEM to larger and more detailed scientific models has driven advances in high-performance computing for decades. Here we demonstrate that scalable spiking neuromorphic hardware can directly implement the FEM by constructing a spiking neural network that solves the large, sparse, linear systems of equations at the core of the FEM. We show that for the Poisson equation, a fundamental PDE in science and engineering, our neural circuit achieves meaningful levels of numerical accuracy and close to ideal scaling on modern, inherently parallel and energy-efficient neuromorphic hardware, specifically Intel’s Loihi 2 neuromorphic platform. We illustrate extensions to irregular mesh geometries in both two and three dimensions as well as other PDEs such as linear elasticity. Our spiking neural network is constructed from a recurrent network model of the brain’s motor cortex and, in contrast to black-box deep artificial neural network-based methods for PDEs, directly translates the well-understood and trusted mathematics of the FEM to a natively spiking neuromorphic algorithm. Theilman and Aimone introduce a natively spiking algorithm for solving partial differential equations on large-scale neuromorphic computers and demonstrate the algorithm on Intel’s Loihi 2 neuromorphic research chip.
Neuroscience.authors_short: Theilman, Bradley H. & Aimone, James B.
Neuroscience.title_cn: 在神经拟态硬件上求解稀疏有限元问题
Neuroscience.abstract_cn: 有限元方法 (FEM) 是科学和工程探索中，用于在计算机上求解偏微分方程 (PDE) 的最重要和最普遍的数值方法之一。几十年来，将有限元方法应用于更大、更详细的科学模型，推动了高性能计算的发展。本文证明，可扩展的脉冲神经拟态硬件可以通过构建一个脉冲神经网络来直接实现有限元方法，该网络能够求解有限元方法核心的大型稀疏线性方程组。我们展示了，对于科学和工程中的基本偏微分方程——泊松方程，我们的神经电路在现代、固有的并行且节能的神经拟态硬件（特别是英特尔的Loihi 2神经拟态平台）上，实现了有意义的数值精度和接近理想的扩展性。我们还展示了其在二维和三维不规则网格几何以及其他偏微分方程（如线性弹性）中的扩展应用。我们的脉冲神经网络是基于大脑运动皮层的循环网络模型构建的，与基于黑盒深度人工神经网络的偏微分方程求解方法不同，它将有限元方法成熟且可靠的数学原理直接转化为一种原生的脉冲神经拟态算法。Theilman和Aimone介绍了一种用于在大规模神经拟态计算机上求解偏微分方程的原生脉冲算法，并在英特尔的Loihi 2神经拟态研究芯片上进行了演示。

Neuroscience.title: Depression genetics through the lens of age at onset
Neuroscience.summary: Nature Genetics, Published online: 13 November 2025;doi:10.1038/s41588-025-02402-zA study drawing on biobank and registry data from five Nordic countries reveals distinct genetic associations for early- and late-onset major depressive disorder and differences in their genetic architectures and relationships with other traits. Stratification by age at onset can uncover risk effects relevant to severe outcomes and inform prevention strategies.
Neuroscience.abstract: A study drawing on biobank and registry data from five Nordic countries reveals distinct genetic associations for early- and late-onset major depressive disorder and differences in their genetic architectures and relationships with other traits. Stratification by age at onset can uncover risk effects relevant to severe outcomes and inform prevention strategies.
Neuroscience.title_cn: 发病年龄视角下的抑郁症遗传学
Neuroscience.abstract_cn: 一项利用来自五个北欧国家的生物样本库和登记数据进行的研究揭示，早发型和晚发型重度抑郁症具有独特的遗传关联，并且在遗传结构以及与其他性状的关系上存在差异。根据发病年龄进行分层，有助于揭示与严重结局相关的风险效应，并为制定预防策略提供依据。

Neuroscience.title: Differentiable simulation expands frontiers for biophysical neural models
Neuroscience.summary: Nature Methods, Published online: 13 November 2025;doi:10.1038/s41592-025-02933-7JAXLEY, a differentiable simulator, leverages automatic differentiation and GPU acceleration to make large-scale biophysical neuron model optimization feasible. This approach uniquely combines biological accuracy with advanced machine-learning optimization techniques, allowing for efficient hyperparameter tuning and the exploration of neural computation mechanisms at scale.
Neuroscience.abstract: JAXLEY, a differentiable simulator, leverages automatic differentiation and GPU acceleration to make large-scale biophysical neuron model optimization feasible. This approach uniquely combines biological accuracy with advanced machine-learning optimization techniques, allowing for efficient hyperparameter tuning and the exploration of neural computation mechanisms at scale.
Neuroscience.title_cn: 可微分模拟拓展了生物物理神经模型的研究前沿
Neuroscience.abstract_cn: JAXLEY，一个可微分模拟器，利用自动微分和GPU加速，使大规模生物物理神经模型的优化成为可能。这种方法独特地将生物学精度与先进的机器学习优化技术相结合，从而实现高效的超参数调优以及大规模神经计算机制的探索。

Neuroscience.title: Stimulus-modulated approach to steady state (SASS): a flexible paradigm for event-related fMRI
Neuroscience.summary: Nature Methods, Published online: 13 November 2025;doi:10.1038/s41592-025-02902-0Stimulus-modulated approach to steady state (SASS) is an acquisition scheme for event-related fMRI that generates data with high temporal signal-to-noise ratios interspaced with acquisition-free periods for stimulus presentation or response recording. It is demonstrated in auditory and visual stimulation paradigms in marmosets at 9.4 T and in human participants at 3 T.
Neuroscience.abstract: Functional magnetic resonance imaging (fMRI) studies discard the initial volumes acquired during the approach of the magnetization to its steady-state value. Here we leverage the higher temporal signal-to-noise ratio of these initial volumes to increase the sensitivity of event-related fMRI experiments. We introduce acquisition-free periods (AFPs) that permit the full recovery of the magnetization, followed by an acquisition block of fMRI volumes. An appropriately placed stimulus in the AFP produces a blood oxygenation level-dependent response that peaks during the initial high temporal signal-to-noise ratio phase of the acquisition block. Using humans and monkeys (Callithrix jacchus) at different field strengths, we demonstrate up to a ~50% reduction in the number of trials needed to achieve a given statistical threshold relative to conventional fMRI. The silent AFP can be exploited for the presentation of auditory stimuli or uncontaminated electrophysiological recording and its variable duration allows aperiodic stimulus or response-locked signal averaging as well as gating to physiology or motion. Stimulus-modulated approach to steady state (SASS) is an acquisition scheme for event-related fMRI that generates data with high temporal signal-to-noise ratios interspaced with acquisition-free periods for stimulus presentation or response recording. It is demonstrated in auditory and visual stimulation paradigms in marmosets at 9.4 T and in human participants at 3 T.
Neuroscience.authors_short: Mathew, Renil et al., Menon, Ravi S.
Neuroscience.title_cn: 刺激调制稳态逼近 (SASS)：一种用于事件相关fMRI的灵活范式
Neuroscience.abstract_cn: 功能性磁共振成像 (fMRI) 研究通常会丢弃磁化强度达到稳态过程中采集的初始体数据。本研究利用这些初始体数据较高的时间信噪比，以提高事件相关fMRI实验的灵敏度。我们引入了无采集期 (AFPs)，允许磁化强度完全恢复，随后进行fMRI体数据的采集。在无采集期内适当呈现的刺激会产生血氧水平依赖性 (BOLD) 反应，该反应在采集期的初始高时间信噪比阶段达到峰值。通过在不同场强下对人类和狨猴 (Callithrix jacchus) 进行研究，我们证明与传统fMRI相比，达到给定统计阈值所需的试验次数可减少约50%。静默的无采集期可用于呈现听觉刺激或进行无干扰的电生理记录，其可变持续时间允许非周期性刺激或响应锁定信号平均，以及与生理或运动的门控。刺激调制稳态逼近 (SASS) 是一种事件相关fMRI采集方案，它生成具有高时间信噪比的数据，并穿插无采集期用于刺激呈现或响应记录。该方案已在9.4 T场强的狨猴和3 T场强的人类受试者的听觉和视觉刺激范式中得到验证。

Structure.title: In situ structural mechanism of epothilone-B-induced CNS axon regeneration
Structure.summary: Nature, Published online: 12 November 2025;doi:10.1038/s41586-025-09654-zA combined cryo-electron tomography and cryo-electron microscopy pipeline was developed to inflict axonal damage and monitor the cellular response induced by epothilone B, revealing that microtubule polymerization at and beyond the lesion site promote axon regeneration.
Structure.abstract: Axons in the adult central nervous system (CNS) do not regenerate following injury, in contrast to neurons in the peripheral nervous system and neuronal growth during embryonic development. The molecular mechanisms that prevent regeneration of neurons in the CNS remain largely unknown1,2. Here, to address the intracellular response to injury, we developed an in situ cryo-electron tomography and cryo-electron microscopy platform to mimic axonal damage and present the structural mechanism underlying thalamic axon regeneration induced by the drug epothilone B. We observed that stabilized microtubules extend beyond the injury site, generating membrane tension and driving membrane expansion. Cryo-electron microscopy reveals the in situ structure of microtubules at 3.19 Å resolution, which engage epothilone B within the microtubule lattice at the regenerating front. During repair, tubulin clusters are delivered and incorporated into polymerizing microtubules at the regenerating site. These microtubule shoots serve as scaffolds for various types of vesicles and endoplasmic reticulum, facilitating the supply of materials necessary for axon repair until membrane tension normalizes. We demonstrate the unexpected ability of neuronal cells to adjust to strain induced by epothilone B, which creates homeostatic imbalances and activates axons to regeneration mode. A combined cryo-electron tomography and cryo-electron microscopy pipeline was developed to inflict axonal damage and monitor the cellular response induced by epothilone B, revealing that microtubule polymerization at and beyond the lesion site promote axon regeneration.
Structure.authors_short: Bodakuntla, Satish et al., Mizuno, Naoko
Structure.title_cn: 埃博霉素B诱导的中枢神经系统轴突再生的原位结构机制
Structure.abstract_cn: 与周围神经系统中的神经元以及胚胎发育过程中的神经元生长不同，成年中枢神经系统（CNS）的轴突在损伤后无法再生。阻止CNS神经元再生的分子机制在很大程度上仍不清楚1,2。为了探究损伤后的细胞内响应，我们开发了一个原位冷冻电子断层扫描和冷冻电子显微镜平台，以模拟轴突损伤，并揭示了药物埃博霉素B诱导的丘脑轴突再生的结构机制。我们观察到，稳定的微管延伸至损伤部位之外，产生膜张力并驱动膜扩张。冷冻电子显微镜以3.19 Å的分辨率揭示了微管的原位结构，显示埃博霉素B在再生前沿与微管晶格结合。在修复过程中，微管蛋白簇被输送并整合到再生部位正在聚合的微管中。这些微管“芽”作为各种囊泡和内质网的支架，促进轴突修复所需物质的供应，直至膜张力恢复正常。我们证明了神经细胞具有出乎意料的能力，能够适应埃博霉素B诱导的应变，这种应变会产生稳态失衡并激活轴突进入再生模式。我们开发了一种结合冷冻电子断层扫描和冷冻电子显微镜的流程，用于造成轴突损伤并监测埃博霉素B诱导的细胞响应，结果表明损伤部位及损伤部位之外的微管聚合促进了轴突再生。

Structure.title: Photoinduced twist and untwist of moiré superlattices
Structure.summary: Nature, Published online: 12 November 2025;doi:10.1038/s41586-025-09707-3Femtosecond photoexcitation drives a coherent twist–untwist motion of the moiré superlattice in 2° and 57° twisted WSe2/MoSe2 heterobilayers.
Structure.abstract: Two-dimensional moiré materials are formed by artificially stacking atomically thin monolayers. Correlated and topological quantum phases can be engineered by precise choice of stacking geometry1–3. These designer electronic properties depend crucially on interlayer coupling and atomic registry4,5. An open question is how the atomic registry responds on ultrafast timescales to optical excitation and whether the moiré geometry can be dynamically reconfigured to tune emergent phenomena in real time. Here we show that femtosecond photoexcitation drives a coherent twist–untwist motion of the moiré superlattice in 2° and 57° twisted WSe2/MoSe2 heterobilayers, resolved directly by ultrafast electron diffraction. On above-band-gap photoexcitation, the moiré superlattice diffraction features are enhanced within 1 ps and subsequently suppressed several picoseconds after, deviating markedly from typical photoinduced lattice heating. Kinetic diffraction analysis, supported by simulations of the sample dynamics, indicates a peak-to-trough local twist angle modulation of 0.6°, correlated with a sub-THz frequency moiré phonon. This motion is driven by ultrafast charge transfer that transiently increases interlayer attraction. Our results could lead to ultrafast control of moiré periodic lattice distortions and, by extension, the local moiré potential that shapes excitons, polarons and correlation-driven behaviours. Femtosecond photoexcitation drives a coherent twist–untwist motion of the moiré superlattice in 2° and 57° twisted WSe2/MoSe2 heterobilayers.
Structure.authors_short: Duncan, Cameron J. R. et al., Liu, Fang
Structure.title_cn: 光致莫尔超晶格的扭转与解扭
Structure.abstract_cn: 二维莫尔材料通过人工堆叠原子级薄的单层材料而形成。通过精确选择堆叠几何结构，可以设计出关联和拓扑量子相。这些设计出的电子特性关键取决于层间耦合和原子对准。一个悬而未决的问题是，原子对准如何在超快时间尺度上响应光激发，以及莫尔几何结构是否能够动态重构以实时调控涌现现象。本文展示了飞秒光激发驱动2°和57°扭曲WSe2/MoSe2异质双层中莫尔超晶格的相干扭转-解扭运动，并通过超快电子衍射直接解析。在高于带隙的光激发下，莫尔超晶格衍射特征在1皮秒内增强，随后在几皮秒后被抑制，这与典型的光致晶格加热现象显著不同。动力学衍射分析，辅以样品动力学模拟，表明局部扭转角存在0.6°的峰谷调制，这与亚太赫兹频率的莫尔声子相关联。这种运动是由超快电荷转移驱动的，该转移瞬时增强了层间吸引力。我们的研究结果有望实现对莫尔周期性晶格畸变的超快控制，并进而实现对塑造激子、极化子和关联驱动行为的局部莫尔势的超快调控。飞秒光激发驱动2°和57°扭曲WSe2/MoSe2异质双层中莫尔超晶格的相干扭转-解扭运动。

Structure.title: A molecularly impermeable polymer from two-dimensional polyaramids
Structure.summary: Nature, Published online: 12 November 2025;doi:10.1038/s41586-025-09674-9Two-dimensional polyaramid polymers are synthesized to form nanofilms that exhibit the lowest gas permeability of any polymer by orders of magnitude, despite lacking crystallinity, enabling molecular-scale nanomechanical resonators and barrier materials.
Structure.abstract: All polymers exhibit gas permeability through the free volume of entangled polymer chains1–3. By contrast, two-dimensional (2D) materials including graphene stack densely and can exhibit molecular impermeability4–6. Solution-synthesized 2D polymers that exhibit the latter by poly-condensation have been a longstanding goal. Herein, we demonstrate self-supporting, spin-coated 2D polyaramid nanofilms that exhibit nitrogen permeability below 3.1 × 10−9 Barrer, nearly four orders of magnitude lower than every class of existing polymer, and similar for other gases tested (helium, argon, oxygen, methane and sulfur hexafluoride). Optical interference during the pressurization of nanofilm-coated microwells allows measurement of mechanosensitive rim opening and sealing, creating gas-filled bulges that are stable exceeding three years. This discovery enables 2D polymer resonators with high resonance frequencies (about 8 MHz) and quality factors up to 537, similar to graphene. A 60-nm coating of air-sensitive perovskites reduces the lattice degradation rate 14-fold with an oxygen permeability of 3.3 × 10−8 Barrer. Molecularly impermeable polymers promise the next generation of barriers that are synthetically processable, chemically amenable and maximize molecular rejection with minimal material, ultimately advancing sustainability goals. Two-dimensional polyaramid polymers are synthesized to form nanofilms that exhibit the lowest gas permeability of any polymer by orders of magnitude, despite lacking crystallinity, enabling molecular-scale nanomechanical resonators and barrier materials.
Structure.authors_short: Ritt, Cody L. et al., Strano, Michael S.
Structure.title_cn: 由二维聚芳酰胺制备的分子不渗透聚合物
Structure.abstract_cn: 所有聚合物都通过缠结聚合物链的自由体积表现出气体渗透性1–3。相比之下，包括石墨烯在内的二维(2D)材料堆叠紧密，能够表现出分子不渗透性4–6。通过缩聚反应合成的、能表现出分子不渗透性的溶液法二维聚合物，一直是长期以来的研究目标。在本文中，我们展示了自支撑、旋涂的二维聚芳酰胺纳米薄膜，其氮气渗透率低于3.1 × 10−9 Barrer，比现有各类聚合物低近四个数量级，对其他测试气体（氦气、氩气、氧气、甲烷和六氟化硫）也表现出相似的低渗透性。纳米薄膜涂覆微孔在加压过程中的光学干涉，使得机械敏感边缘的开启和密封得以测量，从而形成可稳定超过三年的充气凸起。这一发现使得二维聚合物谐振器能够实现高谐振频率（约8 MHz）和高达537的品质因数，与石墨烯相似。一层60纳米厚的涂层可用于保护对空气敏感的钙钛矿，将其晶格降解速率降低14倍，氧气渗透率为3.3 × 10−8 Barrer。分子不渗透聚合物有望成为下一代屏障材料，它们具有合成可加工性、化学适应性，并能以最少的材料实现最大的分子排斥，最终推动可持续发展目标的实现。二维聚芳酰胺聚合物被合成以形成纳米薄膜，尽管缺乏结晶度，但其气体渗透率比任何其他聚合物低数个数量级，从而实现了分子尺度的纳米机械谐振器和屏障材料。

Structure.title: A combined biochemical and computational approach provides evidence for membrane remodelling by the structural scaffold of the endocytic TPLATE complex
Structure.summary: Nature Plants, Published online: 12 November 2025;doi:10.1038/s41477-025-02146-yThe manuscript uses an integrative approach to generate a comprehensive structure of the multisubunit endocytic TPLATE complex and to study its membrane targeting and its role in membrane deformation during the initial phase of plant endocytosis.
Structure.abstract: Eukaryotic cells maintain homeostasis of their outer membrane by controlled internalization of lipid and protein constituents via endocytosis. Endocytosis is evolutionary conserved and uses similarly folded domains. How these structural folds are combined into proteins and protein complexes, however, differs between eukaryotic kingdoms. The TPLATE complex (TPC) in plants is an evolutionary ancient protein module that combines several protein domains with a conserved role in endocytosis into a single octameric protein complex. Its molecular architecture, lipid-nucleated condensate formation and requirement for clathrin cage curvature revealed its function in endocytosis initiation in plants. Mechanistic understanding of how this complex drives membrane deformation during plant endocytosis is, however, lacking. Here we used an integrative structural approach to obtain a precise molecular structure of the TPC of Arabidopsis thaliana. In addition, our approach allowed visualizing the structural flexibility that hallmarks this enigmatic complex. We prove that the intrinsic structural flexibility is required for its functionality and membrane recruitment. The membrane-binding interface consists of several domains with differential lipid preferences. Finally, we demonstrate via molecular dynamics simulations that the crescent shape of the structured part of the complex is sufficient for membrane curvature generation. Our mechanistic insight, obtained by a combined biochemical and computational approach, shows that the structured part of the TPC likely contributes to the execution of plant endocytosis, which does not depend on cytoskeletal-based force generation. The manuscript uses an integrative approach to generate a comprehensive structure of the multisubunit endocytic TPLATE complex and to study its membrane targeting and its role in membrane deformation during the initial phase of plant endocytosis.
Structure.authors_short: Kraus, Julia M. et al., Van Damme, Daniël
Structure.title_cn: 结合生化与计算方法揭示内吞TPLATE复合体结构支架介导的膜重塑机制
Structure.abstract_cn: 真核细胞通过内吞作用受控内化脂质和蛋白质组分，从而维持其外膜的稳态。内吞作用在进化上是保守的，并利用相似折叠的结构域。然而，这些结构折叠如何组合成蛋白质和蛋白质复合体，在不同真核生物界之间存在差异。植物中的TPLATE复合体（TPC）是一个进化上古老的蛋白质模块，它将多个在内吞作用中具有保守作用的蛋白质结构域组合成一个单一的八聚体蛋白质复合体。其分子结构、脂质诱导的凝聚体形成以及对网格蛋白笼曲率的需求揭示了其在植物内吞起始中的功能。然而，关于该复合体如何在植物内吞过程中驱动膜变形的机制理解仍然缺乏。在此，我们采用了一种整合结构学方法，获得了拟南芥TPC的精确分子结构。此外，我们的方法还能够可视化该神秘复合体所特有的结构柔性。我们证明了其固有的结构柔性对其功能和膜招募至关重要。膜结合界面由多个具有不同脂质偏好的结构域组成。最后，我们通过分子动力学模拟证明，该复合体结构化部分的月牙形足以产生膜曲率。我们通过结合生化与计算方法获得的机制洞察表明，TPC的结构化部分可能有助于植物内吞作用的执行，且该过程不依赖于基于细胞骨架的力生成。本研究采用整合方法，构建了多亚基内吞TPLATE复合体的全面结构，并研究了其在植物内吞起始阶段的膜靶向及其在膜变形中的作用。

Structure.title: MISO: microfluidic protein isolation enables single-particle cryo-EM structure determination from a single cell colony
Structure.summary: Nature Methods, Published online: 13 November 2025;doi:10.1038/s41592-025-02894-xThe micro isolation (MISO) method combines microfluidics-based protein purification with cryo-EM grid preparation, enabling cryo-EM structure determination of soluble and membrane proteins starting from less than 1 µg of a target protein.
Structure.abstract: Single-particle cryogenic electron microscopy (cryo-EM) enables reconstruction of atomic-resolution 3D maps of proteins by visualizing thousands to millions of purified protein particles embedded in vitreous ice. This corresponds to picograms of purified protein, which can potentially be isolated from a few thousand cells. Hence, cryo-EM holds the potential of a very sensitive analytical method for delivering high-resolution protein structure as a readout. In practice, millions of times more starting biological material is required to prepare cryo-EM grids. Here we show that using a micro isolation (MISO) method, which combines microfluidics-based protein purification with cryo-EM grid preparation, cryo-EM structures of soluble bacterial and eukaryotic membrane proteins can be solved starting from less than 1 µg of a target protein and progressing from cells to cryo-EM grids within a few hours. This scales down the amount of starting biological material hundreds to thousands of times, opening possibilities for the structural characterization of hitherto inaccessible proteins. The micro isolation (MISO) method combines microfluidics-based protein purification with cryo-EM grid preparation, enabling cryo-EM structure determination of soluble and membrane proteins starting from less than 1 µg of a target protein.
Structure.authors_short: Eluru, Gangadhar et al., Efremov, Rouslan G.
Structure.title_cn: MISO：微流控蛋白分离助力单细胞集落的单颗粒冷冻电镜结构测定
Structure.abstract_cn: 单颗粒冷冻电子显微镜（cryo-EM）通过观察包埋在玻璃态冰中的数千至数百万个纯化蛋白质颗粒，能够重建蛋白质的原子分辨率三维结构图。这相当于皮克级的纯化蛋白质，理论上可以从数千个细胞中分离得到。因此，cryo-EM 有潜力成为一种非常灵敏的分析方法，以高分辨率蛋白质结构作为输出。然而，在实际操作中，制备 cryo-EM 样品网格需要多达数百万倍的起始生物材料。本文展示了一种微分离（MISO）方法，该方法结合了基于微流控的蛋白质纯化与 cryo-EM 样品网格制备，能够从少于 1 微克的靶蛋白开始，并在数小时内从细胞到 cryo-EM 样品网格，解析可溶性细菌和真核膜蛋白的 cryo-EM 结构。这使得起始生物材料的用量减少了数百至数千倍，为迄今难以获得的蛋白质的结构表征开辟了可能性。微分离（MISO）方法结合了基于微流控的蛋白质纯化与 cryo-EM 样品网格制备，使得从少于 1 微克的靶蛋白开始即可进行可溶性蛋白和膜蛋白的 cryo-EM 结构测定。

Structure.title: Confocal Airy beam oblique light-sheet tomography for brain-wide cell type distribution and morphology
Structure.summary: Nature Methods, Published online: 13 November 2025;doi:10.1038/s41592-025-02888-9Confocal Airy beam integrated with single-photon oblique light-sheet tomography (CAB-OLST) is a high-throughput imaging approach for brain-wide mapping of neurons, as demonstrated in cleared mouse brains.
Structure.abstract: Advanced brain-wide mapping is critical for addressing complex questions in neuroscience. However, current imaging methods are limited by throughput, resolution and signal-to-noise ratio, constraining their broader applicability. Here, we present confocal Airy beam integrated with single-photon oblique light-sheet tomography (CAB-OLST): a system that integrates single-photon excitation with a scanned Airy beam light sheet, virtual slit detection and automated mechanical sectioning. CAB-OLST enables high-throughput, high-resolution and high-signal-to-noise ratio volumetric imaging, achieving an optical resolution of 0.77 μm × 0.49 μm × 2.61 μm. This allows for mouse brain-wide cell type distribution mapping at a voxel size of 0.37 μm × 0.37 μm × 1.77 μm in 10 h and single-neuron projectome imaging with a voxel size of 0.26 μm × 0.26 μm × 1.06 μm over 58 h. Compared to existing light-sheet and point-scanning systems, CAB-OLST provides a scalable and robust platform for comprehensive neuronal morphology reconstruction and high-precision cell atlas generation. Confocal Airy beam integrated with single-photon oblique light-sheet tomography (CAB-OLST) is a high-throughput imaging approach for brain-wide mapping of neurons, as demonstrated in cleared mouse brains.
Structure.authors_short: Qi, Xiaoli et al., Osten, Pavel
Structure.title_cn: 共聚焦艾里光束斜光片断层成像技术用于全脑细胞类型分布和形态学研究
Structure.abstract_cn: 先进的全脑图谱绘制对于解决神经科学中的复杂问题至关重要。然而，当前的成像方法在通量、分辨率和信噪比方面存在局限性，限制了其更广泛的应用。在此，我们提出了一种结合了共聚焦艾里光束和单光子斜光片断层成像技术（CAB-OLST）的系统：该系统集成了单光子激发、扫描艾里光束光片、虚拟狭缝检测和自动化机械切片。CAB-OLST 实现了高通量、高分辨率和高信噪比的体积成像，光学分辨率达到 0.77 μm × 0.49 μm × 2.61 μm。这使得在10小时内以0.37 μm × 0.37 μm × 1.77 μm的体素尺寸绘制小鼠全脑细胞类型分布图成为可能，并在58小时内以0.26 μm × 0.26 μm × 1.06 μm的体素尺寸进行单神经元投射组成像。与现有的光片和点扫描系统相比，CAB-OLST 为全面的神经元形态重建和高精度细胞图谱生成提供了一个可扩展且稳健的平台。共聚焦艾里光束结合单光子斜光片断层成像技术（CAB-OLST）是一种高通量成像方法，用于神经元的全脑图谱绘制，已在透明化小鼠大脑中得到验证。

Structure.title: Structural basis of G6P/Pi transport and inhibition in SLC37A4
Structure.summary: Nature Structural & Molecular Biology, Published online: 12 November 2025;doi:10.1038/s41594-025-01711-5Zhou et al. report cryo-electron microscopy structures of human SLC37A4 in four states, elucidating conformational transitions during glucose-6-phosphate/phosphate transport and S-4048 inhibition. This study links structural mechanisms to glycogen storage disease type Ib pathology, offering therapeutic insights.
Structure.abstract: Glycogen storage disease type Ib (GSD-Ib), caused by loss-of-function mutations in the endoplasmic reticulum transporter SLC37A4, disrupts glucose homeostasis through impaired glucose-6-phosphate (G6P)/phosphate (Pi) antiport. Despite its central role in glycogen metabolism and immune regulation, the structural mechanisms governing SLC37A4’s transport cycle and pathological dysfunction remain elusive. Here we report cryo-electron microscopy structures of human SLC37A4 in four functional states, capturing conformational transitions between lumen-facing and cytoplasm-facing states. Combined with mutational analysis, molecular dynamics simulations and functional assays, we identify a conserved substrate-binding pocket that alternately accommodates G6P and Pi through electrostatic complementarity and domain-dependent interactions. We further demonstrate that the high-affinity inhibitor S-4048 sterically occludes the cytoplasmic entry pathway by trapping the transporter in a cytoplasm-facing conformation. Our work elucidates the molecular pathology of GSD-Ib-linked mutations and provides a structural framework for developing therapies targeting this transporter in metabolic diseases. Zhou et al. report cryo-electron microscopy structures of human SLC37A4 in four states, elucidating conformational transitions during glucose-6-phosphate/phosphate transport and S-4048 inhibition. This study links structural mechanisms to glycogen storage disease type Ib pathology, offering therapeutic insights.
Structure.authors_short: Zhou, Dong et al., Zhang, Zhe
Structure.title_cn: SLC37A4中G6P/Pi转运及其抑制的结构基础
Structure.abstract_cn: 糖原贮积病Ib型（GSD-Ib）是由内质网转运蛋白SLC37A4的功能缺失突变引起的，通过葡萄糖-6-磷酸（G6P）/磷酸（Pi）逆向转运受损而扰乱葡萄糖稳态。尽管SLC37A4在糖原代谢和免疫调节中发挥核心作用，但其转运循环和病理功能障碍的结构机制仍不清楚。本研究报道了人SLC37A4在四种功能状态下的冷冻电镜结构，捕获了其在腔面朝向和细胞质面朝向状态之间的构象转变。结合突变分析、分子动力学模拟和功能测定，我们鉴定了一个保守的底物结合口袋，该口袋通过静电互补和结构域依赖性相互作用交替结合G6P和Pi。我们进一步证明，高亲和力抑制剂S-4048通过将转运蛋白捕获在细胞质面朝向的构象中，空间性地阻断了细胞质进入途径。我们的工作阐明了GSD-Ib相关突变的分子病理学，并为开发针对代谢疾病中该转运蛋白的疗法提供了结构框架。

Structure.title: Structural basis of glucose-6-phosphate transport by human SLC37A2
Structure.summary: Nature Structural & Molecular Biology, Published online: 12 November 2025;doi:10.1038/s41594-025-01712-4Lai and Xu et al. used cryo-electron microscopy and functional analyses to elucidate the glucose-6-phosphate uniport mechanism of human solute carrier family 37 member 2 and its structural dynamics, offering insights into glucose metabolism and related disorders.
Structure.abstract: Glucose-6-phosphate (G6P) transporters are crucial for glucose metabolism by mediating G6P transport from the cytoplasm to endoplasmic reticulum (ER). However, their transport mechanisms remain poorly understood. Here, we elucidate the structural and functional basis of human solute carrier family 37 member 2 (SLC37A2), a G6P transporter implicated in metabolic regulation and macrophage inflammation. We show that SLC37A2 functions as a uniporter, facilitating G6P transport independent of inorganic phosphate gradients. Structures of SLC37A2 in the apo and G6P-bound states reveal a dimeric architecture. Both the ER luminal-open and cytosolic-open structures are captured, showing the structural dynamics during G6P transport. G6P is coordinated by SLC37A2 through interactions with its phosphate and hydroxyl groups. Furthermore, mapping mutations associated with glycogen storage disease type Ib onto SLC37A2 highlights residues essential for transport activity. Together, this work provides structural insights into G6P transport and establishes a framework for understanding related metabolic disorders. Lai and Xu et al. used cryo-electron microscopy and functional analyses to elucidate the glucose-6-phosphate uniport mechanism of human solute carrier family 37 member 2 and its structural dynamics, offering insights into glucose metabolism and related disorders.
Structure.authors_short: Lai, Qinxuan et al., Liu, Xin
Structure.title_cn: 人源SLC37A2介导葡萄糖-6-磷酸转运的结构基础
Structure.abstract_cn: 葡萄糖-6-磷酸 (G6P) 转运蛋白通过介导G6P从细胞质到内质网 (ER) 的转运，对葡萄糖代谢至关重要。然而，其转运机制仍知之甚少。本研究阐明了人源溶质载体家族37成员2 (SLC37A2) 的结构和功能基础，SLC37A2是一种与代谢调节和巨噬细胞炎症相关的G6P转运蛋白。我们发现SLC37A2作为一种单向转运蛋白发挥作用，独立于无机磷酸梯度促进G6P转运。SLC37A2在脱辅基和G6P结合状态下的结构揭示了其二聚体构象。我们捕获了内质网腔开放和细胞质开放两种构象，展示了G6P转运过程中的结构动态变化。G6P通过与SLC37A2的磷酸基团和羟基相互作用而被SLC37A2结合。此外，将与糖原贮积病Ib型相关的突变映射到SLC37A2上，突出了对转运活性至关重要的残基。综上所述，这项工作为G6P转运提供了结构见解，并为理解相关代谢疾病建立了框架。Lai和Xu等人利用冷冻电镜和功能分析阐明了人源溶质载体家族37成员2的葡萄糖-6-磷酸单向转运机制及其结构动态，为葡萄糖代谢和相关疾病提供了见解。

Clinical & Medicine.title: Spatial fibroblast niches define Crohn’s fistulae
Clinical & Medicine.summary: Nature, Published online: 12 November 2025;doi:10.1038/s41586-025-09744-ySpatial transcriptomic analysis of cells in intestinal fistulae of patients with Crohn’s disease reveals the existence of specialized fistula-associated cell states with distinct signalling profiles and extracellular matrix architecture.
Clinical & Medicine.abstract: Crohn’s disease often presents with fistulae, abnormal tunnels that connect the intestine to the skin or other organs. Despite their profound effect on morbidity, the molecular basis of fistula formation remains unclear, largely owing to the challenge of capturing intact fistula tracts and their inherent heterogeneity1–3. Here we construct a subcellular-resolution spatial atlas of 68 intestinal fistulae spanning diverse anatomical locations. We describe fistula-associated epithelial, immune and stromal cell states, revealing abnormal zonation of growth factors and morphogens linked to establishment of tunnelling anatomy. We identify fistula-associated stromal (FAS) fibroblasts, which are assembled in concentric layers: a proliferative, lumen-adjacent zone beneath neutrophil and macrophage-rich granulation tissue, an active lesion core of FAS cells and a quiescent, pro-fibrotic outer zone. We examine the architecture of the extracellular matrix in the fistula tract and demonstrate that FAS populations associate with distinct collagen structures, exhibiting properties ranging from proliferation, migration and extracellular matrix remodelling to dense collagen deposition and fibrosis. We define niches supporting epithelialization of fistula tunnels and a FAS-like population that is detected at the base of ulcers in non-penetrating Crohn’s disease. Our study demonstrates that common molecular pathways and cellular niches underpin fistulae across intestinal locations, revealing the cellular protagonists of fistula establishment and persistence. This resource will inform the development of model systems and interventions to mitigate aberrant fibroblast activity while preserving their regenerative properties in Crohn’s disease. Spatial transcriptomic analysis of cells in intestinal fistulae of patients with Crohn’s disease reveals the existence of specialized fistula-associated cell states with distinct signalling profiles and extracellular matrix architecture.
Clinical & Medicine.authors_short: McGregor, Colleen et al., Simmons, Alison
Clinical & Medicine.title_cn: 空间成纤维细胞生态位界定克罗恩病瘘管
Clinical & Medicine.abstract_cn: 克罗恩病常伴有瘘管形成，即连接肠道与皮肤或其他器官的异常通道。尽管瘘管对患者发病率有深远影响，但其形成的分子基础仍不明确，这主要归因于获取完整瘘管组织以及其固有的异质性所面临的挑战。在本研究中，我们构建了涵盖不同解剖位置的68个肠道瘘管的亚细胞分辨率空间图谱。我们描述了与瘘管相关的上皮细胞、免疫细胞和基质细胞状态，揭示了与隧道状结构形成相关的生长因子和形态发生素的异常分区。我们鉴定出瘘管相关基质（FAS）成纤维细胞，它们呈同心层状排列：一个位于中性粒细胞和巨噬细胞丰富的肉芽组织下方、邻近管腔的增殖区，一个由FAS细胞组成的活跃病灶核心区，以及一个静止的、促纤维化的外层区。我们检查了瘘管中细胞外基质的结构，并证明FAS细胞群与独特的胶原结构相关，表现出从增殖、迁移、细胞外基质重塑到致密胶原沉积和纤维化等多种特性。我们定义了支持瘘管隧道上皮化的生态位，并在非穿透性克罗恩病溃疡底部检测到一种FAS样细胞群。我们的研究表明，共同的分子通路和细胞生态位是肠道不同部位瘘管形成的基础，揭示了瘘管建立和持续存在的细胞主角。对克罗恩病患者肠道瘘管细胞进行空间转录组分析，揭示了具有独特信号传导特征和细胞外基质结构的特异性瘘管相关细胞状态的存在。这一资源将为开发模型系统和干预措施提供信息，以减轻异常成纤维细胞的活性，同时保留其在克罗恩病中的再生特性。

Clinical & Medicine.title: GREGoR: accelerating genomics for rare diseases
Clinical & Medicine.summary: Nature, Published online: 12 November 2025;doi:10.1038/s41586-025-09613-8The GREGoR consortium provides foundational resources and substrates for the future of rare disease genomics.
Clinical & Medicine.abstract: Rare diseases are collectively common, affecting approximately 1 in 20 individuals worldwide. In recent years, rapid progress has been made in rare disease diagnostics due to advances in next-generation sequencing, development of new computational and functional genomics approaches to prioritize genes and variants and increased global sharing of clinical and genetic data. However, more than half of individuals suspected to have a rare disease lack a genetic diagnosis. The Genomics Research to Elucidate the Genetics of Rare Diseases (GREGoR) Consortium was initiated to study thousands of challenging rare disease cases and families and apply, standardize and evaluate emerging genomics technologies and analytics to accelerate their adoption in clinical practice. Furthermore, all data generated, currently representing over 7,500 individuals from over 3,000 families, are rapidly made available to researchers worldwide through the Analysis, Visualization and Informatics Lab-space (AnVIL) to catalyse global efforts to develop approaches for genetic diagnoses in rare diseases. Most of these families have undergone previous clinical genetic testing but remained unsolved, with most being exome-negative. Here we describe the collaborative research framework, datasets and discoveries comprising GREGoR that will provide foundational resources and substrates for the future of rare disease genomics. The GREGoR consortium provides foundational resources and substrates for the future of rare disease genomics.
Clinical & Medicine.authors_short: Dawood, Moez et al., Montgomery, Stephen B.
Clinical & Medicine.title_cn: GREGoR：加速罕见病基因组学研究
Clinical & Medicine.abstract_cn: 罕见病总体而言并不少见，全球约每20人中就有1人受其影响。近年来，由于新一代测序技术的进步、用于优先排序基因和变异的新型计算和功能基因组学方法的发展，以及临床和遗传数据全球共享的增加，罕见病诊断取得了快速进展。然而，超过一半的疑似罕见病患者仍缺乏基因诊断。基因组学研究阐明罕见病遗传学（GREGoR）联盟的成立旨在研究数千例具有挑战性的罕见病病例和家系，并应用、标准化和评估新兴基因组学技术和分析方法，以加速其在临床实践中的应用。此外，所有生成的数据（目前代表来自3000多个家系的7500多名个体）通过分析、可视化和信息学实验室空间（AnVIL）迅速向全球研究人员开放，以促进全球在罕见病基因诊断方法开发方面的努力。这些家系中的大多数此前已接受过临床基因检测，但仍未获得明确诊断，其中大部分为外显子组阴性。本文描述了GREGoR的协作研究框架、数据集和发现，这些将为罕见病基因组学的未来提供基础资源和基石。GREGoR联盟为罕见病基因组学的未来提供了基础资源和基石。

Clinical & Medicine.title: Estimation and mapping of the missing heritability of human phenotypes
Clinical & Medicine.summary: Nature, Published online: 12 November 2025;doi:10.1038/s41586-025-09720-6WGS data were used from 347,630 individuals with European ancestry in the UK Biobank to obtain high-precision estimates of coding and non-coding rare variant heritability for 34 complex traits and diseases.
Clinical & Medicine.abstract: Rare coding variants shape inter-individual differences in human phenotypes1. However, the contribution of rare non-coding variants to those differences remains poorly characterized. Here we analyse whole-genome sequence (WGS) data from 347,630 individuals with European ancestry in the UK Biobank2,3 to quantify the relative contribution of 40 million single-nucleotide and short indel variants (with a minor allele frequency (MAF) larger than 0.01%) to the heritability of 34 complex traits and diseases. On average across phenotypes, we find that WGS captures approximately 88% of the pedigree-based narrow sense heritability: that is, 20% from rare variants (MAF < 1%) and 68% from common variants (MAF ≥ 1%). We show that coding and non-coding genetic variants account for 21% and 79% of the rare-variant WGS-based heritability, respectively. We identified 15 traits with no significant difference between WGS-based and pedigree-based heritability estimates, suggesting their heritability is fully accounted for by WGS data. Finally, we performed genome-wide association analyses of all 34 phenotypes and, overall, identified 11,243 common-variant associations and 886 rare-variant associations. Altogether, our study provides high-precision estimates of rare-variant heritability, explains the heritability of many phenotypes and demonstrates for lipid traits that more than 25% of rare-variant heritability can be mapped to specific loci using fewer than 500,000 fully sequenced genomes. WGS data were used from 347,630 individuals with European ancestry in the UK Biobank to obtain high-precision estimates of coding and non-coding rare variant heritability for 34 complex traits and diseases.
Clinical & Medicine.authors_short: Wainschtein, Pierrick et al., Yengo, Loic
Clinical & Medicine.title_cn: 人类表型缺失遗传力的估算与定位
Clinical & Medicine.abstract_cn: 稀有编码变异塑造了人类表型个体间的差异。然而，稀有非编码变异对这些差异的贡献仍未得到充分阐明。本研究分析了来自英国生物样本库中347,630名欧洲血统个体的全基因组测序（WGS）数据，以量化4000万个单核苷酸和短插入缺失变异（次要等位基因频率（MAF）大于0.01%）对34种复杂性状和疾病遗传力的相对贡献。平均而言，我们发现WGS数据捕获了约88%的基于家系的狭义遗传力：其中20%来自稀有变异（MAF < 1%），68%来自常见变异（MAF ≥ 1%）。我们进一步表明，编码和非编码遗传变异分别占基于WGS的稀有变异遗传力的21%和79%。我们确定了15种性状，其基于WGS和基于家系的遗传力估计值之间没有显著差异，这表明它们的遗传力可以完全由WGS数据解释。最后，我们对所有34种表型进行了全基因组关联分析，总共识别出11,243个常见变异关联和886个稀有变异关联。综上所述，我们的研究提供了稀有变异遗传力的高精度估计，解释了许多表型的遗传力，并针对脂质性状表明，使用少于50万个全测序基因组，超过25%的稀有变异遗传力可以定位到特定基因座。英国生物样本库中347,630名欧洲血统个体的WGS数据被用于获得34种复杂性状和疾病的编码和非编码稀有变异遗传力的高精度估计。

Clinical & Medicine.title: Mortality impacts of rainfall and sea-level rise in a developing megacity
Clinical & Medicine.summary: Nature, Published online: 12 November 2025;doi:10.1038/s41586-025-09730-4High-resolution rainfall, tide and mortaility data are used to quantify the impact of rainfall and flooding on urban health in Mumbai, India, revealing an order-of-magnitude discrepency between observed and officially reported mortality impacts, with slum residents bearing most of the burden.
Clinical & Medicine.abstract: Rainfall and flooding frequently disrupt the lives of urban residents worldwide, posing substantial public health risks1,2. Rapid urbanization is exposing larger and more vulnerable populations to flooding3, while climate change intensifies rainfall patterns4,5 and rising sea levels impair drainage systems6–11. Despite the growing recognition and urgency of these hazards, the health impacts of rainfall remain poorly understood, and those of sea-level rise are entirely unquantified. Here we estimate the mortality consequences of rainfall in one of the world’s largest cities—Mumbai, India. We integrate high-resolution data on rainfall, tides and mortality to analyse how unmanaged rainfall, and its interaction with tidal dynamics, contribute to urban health risks. We find that rainfall causes more than 8% of Mumbai’s deaths during the monsoon season, and that more than 80% of this burden is borne by slum residents. Children face the biggest increase in mortality risk from rainfall, and women face a greater risk than men. We also demonstrate that mortality risk from rainfall increases sharply during high tides and use this relationship to evaluate how rising sea levels could amplify rainfall-induced mortality in the absence of adaptation. Our findings reveal that the mortality impacts of rainfall are an order of magnitude larger than is documented by official statistics12,13, highlighting the urgent need for investment in improved drainage, sanitation and waste-management infrastructure. High-resolution rainfall, tide and mortaility data are used to quantify the impact of rainfall and flooding on urban health in Mumbai, India, revealing an order-of-magnitude discrepency between observed and officially reported mortality impacts, with slum residents bearing most of the burden.
Clinical & Medicine.authors_short: Bearpark, Tom et al., Patankar, Archana
Clinical & Medicine.title_cn: 发展中特大城市中降雨和海平面上升对死亡率的影响
Clinical & Medicine.abstract_cn: 降雨和洪涝灾害频繁扰乱全球城市居民的正常生活，构成重大的公共卫生风险。快速的城市化使更多、更脆弱的人群面临洪涝威胁，而气候变化则加剧了降雨模式，海平面上升也损害了排水系统。尽管这些灾害的认知度和紧迫性日益增加，但降雨对健康的影响仍知之甚少，海平面上升的影响则完全未被量化。本文旨在评估全球最大城市之一——印度孟买——降雨造成的死亡后果。我们整合了高分辨率的降雨、潮汐和死亡率数据，以分析未经有效管理的降雨及其与潮汐动力学的相互作用如何导致城市健康风险。研究发现，在季风季节，降雨导致孟买超过8%的死亡，其中80%以上的负担由贫民窟居民承担。儿童面临降雨导致的死亡风险增幅最大，女性的风险高于男性。我们还表明，降雨导致的死亡风险在涨潮期间急剧增加，并利用这一关系评估了在缺乏适应措施的情况下，海平面上升如何加剧降雨引起的死亡率。我们的研究结果揭示，降雨造成的死亡影响比官方统计数据记录的要高出一个数量级，这凸显了对改善排水、卫生和废物管理基础设施进行投资的紧迫性。本研究利用高分辨率的降雨、潮汐和死亡率数据量化了印度孟买降雨和洪涝对城市健康的影响，揭示了观测到的死亡影响与官方报告之间存在一个数量级的差异，其中贫民窟居民承受了大部分负担。

Clinical & Medicine.title: SIGLEC12 mediates plasma membrane rupture during necroptotic cell death
Clinical & Medicine.summary: Nature, Published online: 12 November 2025;doi:10.1038/s41586-025-09741-1CRISPR–Cas9-based genome-wide screening shows that SIGLEC12 mediates plasma membrane rupture in cells undergoing necroptosis, possibly through a human-specific mechanism, indicating its potential as a therapeutic target.
Clinical & Medicine.abstract: Necroptosis is a form of lytic cell death that is overactivated during infections and in inflammatory pathologies1. NINJ1 was recently found to be a mediator of plasma membrane rupture (PMR) during pyroptosis, toxin-induced necrosis, apoptosis, and ferroptosis2,3, but the mediator of PMR during necroptotic cell death remained unknown. Here, using a CRISPR–Cas9-based genome-wide knockout approach, we identify SIGLEC12 as a key mediator of necroptosis downstream of MLKL at the PMR step. Cells with knockdown or knockout of SIGLEC12 are defective in necroptosis-induced PMR and demonstrate ballooning morphology. During necroptosis, SIGLEC12 undergoes dephosphorylation, interacts with MLKL, forms cytosolic puncta and assembles into fibrils. Notably, SIGLEC12 is cleaved by TMPRSS4 during necroptosis to produce a 20-kDa fragment highly homologous to NINJ1, and this cleavage event is required and sufficient to induce PMR during necroptosis. A SIGLEC12 variant associated with cancer (Ser458Phe) and a variant found in the general human population (Arg528Trp) attenuate SIGLEC12 cleavage by TMPRSS4. Knockout of Siglec12 in mouse cells does not affect PMR, suggesting a species-specific role. Our identification of SIGLEC12 as a mediator of PMR expands our understanding of how programmed necrosis is executed and offers new approaches for targeting this proinflammatory form of cell death in human diseases. CRISPR–Cas9-based genome-wide screening shows that SIGLEC12 mediates plasma membrane rupture in cells undergoing necroptosis, possibly through a human-specific mechanism, indicating its potential as a therapeutic target.
Clinical & Medicine.authors_short: Noh, Hyunjin et al., Najafov, Ayaz
Clinical & Medicine.title_cn: SIGLEC12介导坏死性凋亡过程中的质膜破裂
Clinical & Medicine.abstract_cn: 坏死性凋亡是一种裂解性细胞死亡形式，在感染和炎症性病理过程中会过度激活。最近发现NINJ1是焦亡、毒素诱导的坏死、凋亡和铁死亡过程中质膜破裂（PMR）的介质，但坏死性凋亡过程中PMR的介质仍不清楚。本研究中，我们利用CRISPR-Cas9基因组范围敲除方法，鉴定出SIGLEC12是MLKL下游、坏死性凋亡PMR步骤的关键介质。SIGLEC12敲低或敲除的细胞在坏死性凋亡诱导的PMR中存在缺陷，并表现出气球状形态。在坏死性凋亡过程中，SIGLEC12发生去磷酸化，与MLKL相互作用，形成胞质斑点并组装成纤维。值得注意的是，在坏死性凋亡过程中，SIGLEC12被TMPRSS4裂解，产生一个与NINJ1高度同源的20 kDa片段，并且该裂解事件是诱导坏死性凋亡PMR的必要且充分条件。与癌症相关的SIGLEC12变体（Ser458Phe）和在普通人群中发现的变体（Arg528Trp）均能减弱TMPRSS4对SIGLEC12的裂解。小鼠细胞中Siglec12的敲除不影响PMR，这表明其具有物种特异性作用。我们将SIGLEC12鉴定为PMR的介质，这扩展了我们对程序性坏死执行机制的理解，并为在人类疾病中靶向这种促炎性细胞死亡形式提供了新方法。基于CRISPR-Cas9的基因组范围筛选表明，SIGLEC12在经历坏死性凋亡的细胞中介导质膜破裂，可能通过一种人类特异性机制，这预示着其作为治疗靶点的潜力。

Clinical & Medicine.title: Ecology and spread of the North American H5N1 epizootic
Clinical & Medicine.summary: Nature, Published online: 12 November 2025;doi:10.1038/s41586-025-09737-xThe panzootic of highly pathogenic H5N1 since 2021 was driven by around nine introductions into the Atlantic and Pacific flyways, followed by rapid dissemination through wild migratory birds, primarily Anseriformes.
Clinical & Medicine.abstract: Since late 2021, a panzootic of highly pathogenic H5N1 has devastated wild birds, agriculture and mammals. Here an analysis of 1,818 haemagglutinin sequences from wild birds, domestic birds and mammals reveals that the North American panzootic was driven by around nine introductions into the Atlantic and Pacific flyways, followed by rapid dissemination through wild, migratory birds. Transmission was primarily driven by Anseriformes, while non-canonical species acted as dead-end hosts. In contrast to the epizootic of 2015 (refs. 1,2), outbreaks in domestic birds were driven by around 46–113 independent introductions from wild birds that persisted for up to 6 months. Backyard birds were infected around 9 days earlier on average than commercial poultry, suggesting potential as early-warning signals for transmission upticks. We pinpoint wild birds as critical drivers of the epizootic, implying that enhanced surveillance in wild birds and strategies that reduce transmission at the wild–agriculture interface will be key for future tracking and outbreak prevention. The panzootic of highly pathogenic H5N1 since 2021 was driven by around nine introductions into the Atlantic and Pacific flyways, followed by rapid dissemination through wild migratory birds, primarily Anseriformes.
Clinical & Medicine.authors_short: Damodaran, Lambodhar et al., Moncla, Louise H.
Clinical & Medicine.title_cn: 北美H5N1动物流行病的生态学与传播
Clinical & Medicine.abstract_cn: 自2021年末以来，高致病性H5N1的全球性动物疫情（panzootic）已对野生鸟类、农业和哺乳动物造成了严重破坏。本研究通过分析来自野生鸟类、家禽和哺乳动物的1,818个血凝素序列，揭示了北美洲的H5N1大流行是由大约九次引入大西洋和太平洋迁徙路线所驱动的，随后通过野生候鸟迅速传播。传播主要由雁形目鸟类驱动，而非典型物种则充当了终末宿主。与2015年的动物流行病（参考文献1,2）相比，家禽疫情是由来自野生鸟类的大约46-113次独立引入所驱动的，这些引入持续了长达6个月。平均而言，庭院饲养的禽鸟比商业家禽早约9天被感染，这表明它们可能作为传播上升的早期预警信号。我们指出野生鸟类是此次动物流行病的关键驱动因素，这意味着加强对野生鸟类的监测以及在野生动物-农业界面减少传播的策略，将是未来追踪和预防疫情的关键。自2021年以来，高致病性H5N1的全球性动物疫情是由大约九次引入大西洋和太平洋迁徙路线所驱动的，随后通过野生候鸟（主要是雁形目鸟类）迅速传播。

Clinical & Medicine.title: Genome-wide association analyses identify distinct genetic architectures for early-onset and late-onset depression
Clinical & Medicine.summary: Nature Genetics, Published online: 13 November 2025;doi:10.1038/s41588-025-02396-8Genome-wide association analyses leveraging Nordic biobanks with longitudinal health registries identify differences in the genetic architectures of early-onset and late-onset major depressive disorder and in their genetic correlations with related traits.
Clinical & Medicine.abstract: Major depressive disorder (MDD) is a common and heterogeneous disorder of complex etiology. Studying more homogeneous groups stratified according to clinical characteristics, such as age of onset, can improve the identification of the underlying genetic causes and lead to more targeted treatment strategies. We leveraged Nordic biobanks with longitudinal health registries to investigate differences in the genetic architectures of early-onset (eoMDD; n = 46,708 cases) and late-onset (loMDD; n = 37,168 cases) MDD. We identified 12 genomic loci for eoMDD and two for loMDD. Overall, the two MDD subtypes correlated moderately (genetic correlation, rg = 0.58) and differed in their genetic correlations with related traits. These findings suggest that eoMDD and loMDD have partially distinct genetic signatures, with a specific developmental brain signature for eoMDD. Importantly, we demonstrate that polygenic risk scores (PRS) for eoMDD predict suicide attempts within the first 10 years after the initial diagnosis: the absolute risk for suicide attempt was 26% in the top PRS decile, compared to 12% and 20% in the bottom decile and the intermediate group, respectively. Taken together, our findings can inform precision psychiatry approaches for MDD. Genome-wide association analyses leveraging Nordic biobanks with longitudinal health registries identify differences in the genetic architectures of early-onset and late-onset major depressive disorder and in their genetic correlations with related traits.
Clinical & Medicine.authors_short: Shorter, John R. et al., Lu, Yi
Clinical & Medicine.title_cn: 全基因组关联分析揭示早发型和迟发型抑郁症的独特遗传结构
Clinical & Medicine.abstract_cn: 重度抑郁症（MDD）是一种常见且异质性高的疾病，其病因复杂。根据临床特征（如发病年龄）对更同质的群体进行研究，有助于更好地识别潜在的遗传病因，并制定更具针对性的治疗策略。我们利用北欧生物样本库及其纵向健康登记数据，调查了早发型（eoMDD；46,708例）和迟发型（loMDD；37,168例）MDD的遗传结构差异。我们为eoMDD识别出12个基因组位点，为loMDD识别出2个基因组位点。总体而言，这两种MDD亚型之间存在中度相关性（遗传相关性，rg = 0.58），并且它们与相关性状的遗传相关性也存在差异。这些发现表明，eoMDD和loMDD具有部分独特的遗传特征，其中eoMDD具有特定的发育性大脑特征。重要的是，我们证明了eoMDD的多基因风险评分（PRS）可以预测初次诊断后10年内的自杀企图：在PRS最高十分位数中，自杀企图的绝对风险为26%，而最低十分位数和中间组分别为12%和20%。综上所述，我们的研究结果可为MDD的精准精神病学方法提供信息。利用北欧生物样本库和纵向健康登记数据的全基因组关联分析，揭示了早发型和迟发型重度抑郁症在遗传结构及其与相关性状的遗传相关性方面的差异。

Clinical & Medicine.title: Ultra-mild bisulfite outperforms existing methods for 5-methylcytosine detection with low input DNA
Clinical & Medicine.summary: Nature Communications, Published online: 13 November 2025;doi:10.1038/s41467-025-66033-yDNA methylation is a critical biomarker for disease detection, yet current methods often compromise DNA integrity or lack sufficient accuracy. Here, the authors introduce Ultra-Mild Bisulfite Sequencing, a technique that enables highly sensitive, robust, and accurate detection of 5mC.
Clinical & Medicine.abstract: We present Ultra-Mild Bisulfite Sequencing (UMBS-seq), a method for 5-methylcytosine (5mC) detection that minimizes DNA degradation and background noise. UMBS-seq outperforms conventional bisulfite and enzymatic methyl-sequencing (EM-seq) methods in library yield, complexity, and conversion efficiency when applied to low-input DNA samples. In particular, its effectiveness with low-input cell-free DNA (cfDNA) and hybridization-based target capture highlights its potential for clinical applications, including 5mC biomarker detection and early disease diagnosis. DNA methylation is a critical biomarker for disease detection, yet current methods often compromise DNA integrity or lack sufficient accuracy. Here, the authors introduce Ultra-Mild Bisulfite Sequencing, a technique that enables highly sensitive, robust, and accurate detection of 5mC.
