Clinical & Medicine.authors_short: Dai, Qing et al., He, Chuan
Clinical & Medicine.title_cn: 超温和亚硫酸氢盐法在低起始量DNA检测5-甲基胞嘧啶方面优于现有方法
Clinical & Medicine.abstract_cn: 我们提出了一种超温和亚硫酸氢盐测序（UMBS-seq）方法，用于5-甲基胞嘧啶（5mC）检测，该方法能最大限度地减少DNA降解并降低背景噪音。在应用于低起始量DNA样本时，UMBS-seq在文库产量、复杂性和转化效率方面均优于传统的亚硫酸氢盐测序和酶促甲基化测序（EM-seq）方法。尤其值得一提的是，其在低起始量无细胞DNA（cfDNA）和基于杂交的靶向捕获方面的有效性，凸显了其在临床应用中的巨大潜力，包括5mC生物标志物检测和早期疾病诊断。DNA甲基化是疾病检测的关键生物标志物，然而现有方法往往会损害DNA完整性或缺乏足够的准确性。本文中，作者引入了超温和亚硫酸氢盐测序技术，该技术能够实现5mC的高灵敏度、稳健且准确的检测。

Clinical & Medicine.title: Depression genetics through the lens of age at onset
Clinical & Medicine.summary: Nature Genetics, Published online: 13 November 2025;doi:10.1038/s41588-025-02402-zA study drawing on biobank and registry data from five Nordic countries reveals distinct genetic associations for early- and late-onset major depressive disorder and differences in their genetic architectures and relationships with other traits. Stratification by age at onset can uncover risk effects relevant to severe outcomes and inform prevention strategies.
Clinical & Medicine.abstract: A study drawing on biobank and registry data from five Nordic countries reveals distinct genetic associations for early- and late-onset major depressive disorder and differences in their genetic architectures and relationships with other traits. Stratification by age at onset can uncover risk effects relevant to severe outcomes and inform prevention strategies.
Clinical & Medicine.title_cn: 发病年龄视角下的抑郁症遗传学
Clinical & Medicine.abstract_cn: 一项利用来自五个北欧国家的生物样本库和登记数据进行的研究揭示，早发型和晚发型重度抑郁症具有独特的遗传关联，并且在遗传结构以及与其他性状的关系上存在差异。根据发病年龄进行分层，有助于揭示与严重结局相关的风险效应，并为制定预防策略提供依据。

Clinical & Medicine.title: Non-apoptotic caspase-8 is critical for orchestrating exaggerated inflammation during severe SARS-CoV-2 infection
Clinical & Medicine.summary: Nature Communications, Published online: 13 November 2025;doi:10.1038/s41467-025-65098-zDuring SARS-CoV-2 infection caspase-8 fuels harmful inflammation independent of apoptosis. Genetic loss of caspase-8 reduces cytokine levels, lowers viral load and mitigates disease severity, revealing non-apoptotic caspase-8 as a key driver of severe COVID-19.
Clinical & Medicine.abstract: Inflammation and excess cytokine release are hallmarks of severe COVID-19. While programmed cell death is known to drive inflammation, its role in SARS-CoV-2 pathogenesis remains unclear. Using gene-targeted murine COVID-19 models, we here find that caspase-8 is critical for cytokine release and inflammation. Loss of caspase-8 reduces disease severity and viral load in mice, and this occurs independently of its apoptotic function. Instead, reduction in SARS-CoV-2 pathology is linked to decreased IL-1β levels and inflammation. Loss of pyroptosis and necroptosis mediators in gene-targeted animals provides no additional benefits in mitigating disease outcomes beyond that conferred by loss of caspase-8. Spatial transcriptomic and proteomic analyses of caspase-8-deficient mice confirm that improved outcomes are due to reduced pro-inflammatory responses, rather than changes in cell death signalling. Elevated expression of caspase-8 and cFLIP in infected lungs, alongside caspase-8-mediated cleavage of N4BP1, a suppressor of NF-kB signalling, indicates a role of this signalling axis in pathological inflammation. Collectively, these findings highlight non-apoptotic functions of caspase-8 as a driver of severe COVID-19 through modulation of inflammation, not through the induction of apoptosis. During SARS-CoV-2 infection caspase-8 fuels harmful inflammation independent of apoptosis. Genetic loss of caspase-8 reduces cytokine levels, lowers viral load and mitigates disease severity, revealing non-apoptotic caspase-8 as a key driver of severe COVID-19.
Clinical & Medicine.authors_short: M. Bader, Stefanie et al., Doerflinger, Marcel
Clinical & Medicine.title_cn: 非凋亡性Caspase-8在严重SARS-CoV-2感染中介导过度炎症的关键作用
Clinical & Medicine.abstract_cn: 炎症和过度的细胞因子释放是重症COVID-19的标志。尽管已知程序性细胞死亡会驱动炎症，但其在SARS-CoV-2发病机制中的作用仍不清楚。本研究利用基因靶向小鼠COVID-19模型发现，Caspase-8对细胞因子释放和炎症至关重要。Caspase-8的缺失可降低小鼠的疾病严重程度和病毒载量，且这一过程独立于其凋亡功能。相反，SARS-CoV-2病理的减轻与IL-1β水平和炎症的降低有关。在基因靶向动物中，焦亡和坏死性凋亡介质的缺失在减轻疾病结局方面并未提供超出Caspase-8缺失所带来的额外益处。对Caspase-8缺陷小鼠进行空间转录组学和蛋白质组学分析证实，改善的结局是由于促炎反应的减少，而非细胞死亡信号传导的变化。感染肺中Caspase-8和cFLIP的表达升高，以及Caspase-8介导的N4BP1（一种NF-kB信号传导抑制剂）的裂解，表明该信号轴在病理性炎症中发挥作用。总而言之，这些发现强调了Caspase-8的非凋亡功能是重症COVID-19的关键驱动因素，它通过调节炎症而非诱导凋亡来促进疾病进展。在SARS-CoV-2感染期间，Caspase-8独立于凋亡驱动有害炎症，其基因缺失可降低细胞因子水平、减少病毒载量并减轻疾病严重程度。

Genetics & Epigenetics.title: Estimation and mapping of the missing heritability of human phenotypes
Genetics & Epigenetics.summary: Nature, Published online: 12 November 2025;doi:10.1038/s41586-025-09720-6WGS data were used from 347,630 individuals with European ancestry in the UK Biobank to obtain high-precision estimates of coding and non-coding rare variant heritability for 34 complex traits and diseases.
Genetics & Epigenetics.abstract: Rare coding variants shape inter-individual differences in human phenotypes1. However, the contribution of rare non-coding variants to those differences remains poorly characterized. Here we analyse whole-genome sequence (WGS) data from 347,630 individuals with European ancestry in the UK Biobank2,3 to quantify the relative contribution of 40 million single-nucleotide and short indel variants (with a minor allele frequency (MAF) larger than 0.01%) to the heritability of 34 complex traits and diseases. On average across phenotypes, we find that WGS captures approximately 88% of the pedigree-based narrow sense heritability: that is, 20% from rare variants (MAF < 1%) and 68% from common variants (MAF ≥ 1%). We show that coding and non-coding genetic variants account for 21% and 79% of the rare-variant WGS-based heritability, respectively. We identified 15 traits with no significant difference between WGS-based and pedigree-based heritability estimates, suggesting their heritability is fully accounted for by WGS data. Finally, we performed genome-wide association analyses of all 34 phenotypes and, overall, identified 11,243 common-variant associations and 886 rare-variant associations. Altogether, our study provides high-precision estimates of rare-variant heritability, explains the heritability of many phenotypes and demonstrates for lipid traits that more than 25% of rare-variant heritability can be mapped to specific loci using fewer than 500,000 fully sequenced genomes. WGS data were used from 347,630 individuals with European ancestry in the UK Biobank to obtain high-precision estimates of coding and non-coding rare variant heritability for 34 complex traits and diseases.
Genetics & Epigenetics.authors_short: Wainschtein, Pierrick et al., Yengo, Loic
Genetics & Epigenetics.title_cn: 人类表型缺失遗传力的估算与定位
Genetics & Epigenetics.abstract_cn: 稀有编码变异塑造了人类表型个体间的差异。然而，稀有非编码变异对这些差异的贡献仍未得到充分阐明。本研究分析了来自英国生物样本库中347,630名欧洲血统个体的全基因组测序（WGS）数据，以量化4000万个单核苷酸和短插入缺失变异（次要等位基因频率（MAF）大于0.01%）对34种复杂性状和疾病遗传力的相对贡献。平均而言，我们发现WGS数据捕获了约88%的基于家系的狭义遗传力：其中20%来自稀有变异（MAF < 1%），68%来自常见变异（MAF ≥ 1%）。我们进一步表明，编码和非编码遗传变异分别占基于WGS的稀有变异遗传力的21%和79%。我们确定了15种性状，其基于WGS和基于家系的遗传力估计值之间没有显著差异，这表明它们的遗传力可以完全由WGS数据解释。最后，我们对所有34种表型进行了全基因组关联分析，总共识别出11,243个常见变异关联和886个稀有变异关联。综上所述，我们的研究提供了稀有变异遗传力的高精度估计，解释了许多表型的遗传力，并针对脂质性状表明，使用少于50万个全测序基因组，超过25%的稀有变异遗传力可以定位到特定基因座。英国生物样本库中347,630名欧洲血统个体的WGS数据被用于获得34种复杂性状和疾病的编码和非编码稀有变异遗传力的高精度估计。

Genetics & Epigenetics.title: An ancient recombination desert is a speciation supergene in placental mammals
Genetics & Epigenetics.summary: Nature, Published online: 12 November 2025;doi:10.1038/s41586-025-09740-2Deep learning methods identified a large and evolutionarily conserved X-linked low recombination region in placental mammals that serves as both a barrier to gene flow in hybridizing lineages and an accurate phylogenomic marker.
Genetics & Epigenetics.abstract: Gene flow between biological species is a common and often adaptive evolutionary phenomenon throughout the tree of life1–4. Given the pervasive nature of genetic exchange, a daunting challenge is how best to infer the correct relationships between species from the complex collection of histories arrayed across genomes5. The local rate of meiotic recombination influences the distribution of signatures of, and barriers to, gene flow during the early stages of speciation6. Still, a broader understanding of this relationship and its application to accurately discerning phylogeny is lacking due to a scarcity of recombination maps. Here we applied deep learning methods to genome alignments from 22 divergent placental mammal species to infer the evolution of the recombination landscape. We identified a large and evolutionarily conserved X-linked recombination desert constituting 30% of the chromosome. Recombination-aware phylogenomic analyses from 94 species revealed that the X-linked recombination desert is an ancient and recurrent barrier to gene flow and retains the species history when introgression dominates genome-wide ancestry. The functional basis for this supergene is manifold, enriched with genes that influence sex chromosome silencing and reproduction traits. Because the locus underpins reproductive isolation across ordinal lineages, it may represent a reliable marker for resolving challenging relationships across the mammalian phylogeny. Deep learning methods identified a large and evolutionarily conserved X-linked low recombination region in placental mammals that serves as both a barrier to gene flow in hybridizing lineages and an accurate phylogenomic marker.
Genetics & Epigenetics.authors_short: Foley, Nicole M. et al., Murphy, William J.
Genetics & Epigenetics.title_cn: 胎盘哺乳动物中一个古老的重组荒漠是物种形成的超级基因
Genetics & Epigenetics.abstract_cn: 生物物种间的基因流是生命之树中普遍存在的、且通常具有适应性的进化现象1–4。鉴于遗传交换的普遍性，一个艰巨的挑战是如何从基因组中复杂的历史集合中，最佳地推断物种间的正确关系5。减数分裂重组的局部速率影响着物种形成早期基因流的特征分布及其屏障6。然而，由于重组图谱的稀缺，对这种关系及其在准确识别系统发育中的应用仍缺乏更广泛的理解。本研究中，我们应用深度学习方法分析了来自22种不同胎盘哺乳动物的基因组比对数据，以推断重组图景的演化。我们识别出一个大型且进化上保守的X染色体连锁重组荒漠，其构成了该染色体的30%。对94个物种进行的重组感知系统基因组分析揭示，该X染色体连锁重组荒漠是一个古老且反复出现的基因流屏障，并在基因渗入主导全基因组祖先时保留了物种历史。这个超级基因的功能基础是多方面的，富含影响性染色体沉默和生殖性状的基因。由于该基因座支撑着跨目谱系的生殖隔离，它可能代表了一个可靠的标记，用于解决哺乳动物系统发育中具有挑战性的关系。深度学习方法在胎盘哺乳动物中识别出一个大型且进化上保守的X染色体连锁低重组区域，该区域既是杂交谱系中基因流的屏障，也是一个准确的系统基因组标记。

Genetics & Epigenetics.title: GREGoR: accelerating genomics for rare diseases
Genetics & Epigenetics.summary: Nature, Published online: 12 November 2025;doi:10.1038/s41586-025-09613-8The GREGoR consortium provides foundational resources and substrates for the future of rare disease genomics.
Genetics & Epigenetics.abstract: Rare diseases are collectively common, affecting approximately 1 in 20 individuals worldwide. In recent years, rapid progress has been made in rare disease diagnostics due to advances in next-generation sequencing, development of new computational and functional genomics approaches to prioritize genes and variants and increased global sharing of clinical and genetic data. However, more than half of individuals suspected to have a rare disease lack a genetic diagnosis. The Genomics Research to Elucidate the Genetics of Rare Diseases (GREGoR) Consortium was initiated to study thousands of challenging rare disease cases and families and apply, standardize and evaluate emerging genomics technologies and analytics to accelerate their adoption in clinical practice. Furthermore, all data generated, currently representing over 7,500 individuals from over 3,000 families, are rapidly made available to researchers worldwide through the Analysis, Visualization and Informatics Lab-space (AnVIL) to catalyse global efforts to develop approaches for genetic diagnoses in rare diseases. Most of these families have undergone previous clinical genetic testing but remained unsolved, with most being exome-negative. Here we describe the collaborative research framework, datasets and discoveries comprising GREGoR that will provide foundational resources and substrates for the future of rare disease genomics. The GREGoR consortium provides foundational resources and substrates for the future of rare disease genomics.
Genetics & Epigenetics.authors_short: Dawood, Moez et al., Montgomery, Stephen B.
Genetics & Epigenetics.title_cn: GREGoR：加速罕见病基因组学研究
Genetics & Epigenetics.abstract_cn: 罕见病总体而言并不少见，全球约每20人中就有1人受其影响。近年来，由于新一代测序技术的进步、用于优先排序基因和变异的新型计算和功能基因组学方法的发展，以及临床和遗传数据全球共享的增加，罕见病诊断取得了快速进展。然而，超过一半的疑似罕见病患者仍缺乏基因诊断。基因组学研究阐明罕见病遗传学（GREGoR）联盟的成立旨在研究数千例具有挑战性的罕见病病例和家系，并应用、标准化和评估新兴基因组学技术和分析方法，以加速其在临床实践中的应用。此外，所有生成的数据（目前代表来自3000多个家系的7500多名个体）通过分析、可视化和信息学实验室空间（AnVIL）迅速向全球研究人员开放，以促进全球在罕见病基因诊断方法开发方面的努力。这些家系中的大多数此前已接受过临床基因检测，但仍未获得明确诊断，其中大部分为外显子组阴性。本文描述了GREGoR的协作研究框架、数据集和发现，这些将为罕见病基因组学的未来提供基础资源和基石。GREGoR联盟为罕见病基因组学的未来提供了基础资源和基石。

Genetics & Epigenetics.title: Rare genetic variants confer a high risk of ADHD and implicate neuronal biology
Genetics & Epigenetics.summary: Nature, Published online: 12 November 2025;doi:10.1038/s41586-025-09702-8An analysis of rare genetic variants identifies three genes—MAP1A, ANO8 and ANK2—that have a role in attention deficit hyperactivity disorder (ADHD) and investigates the potential underlying biological mechanisms.
Genetics & Epigenetics.abstract: Attention deficit hyperactivity disorder (ADHD) is a childhood-onset neurodevelopmental disorder with a large genetic component1. It affects around 5% of children and 2.5% of adults2, and is associated with several severe outcomes3–11. Common genetic variants associated with the disorder have been identified12,13, but the role of rare variants in ADHD is mostly unknown. Here, by analysing rare coding variants in exome-sequencing data from 8,895 individuals with ADHD and 53,780 control individuals, we identify three genes (MAP1A, ANO8 and ANK2; P < 3.07 × 10−6; odds ratios 5.55–15.13) that are implicated in ADHD. The protein–protein interaction networks of these three genes were enriched for rare-variant risk genes of other neurodevelopmental disorders, and for genes involved in cytoskeleton organization, synapse function and RNA processing. Top associated rare-variant risk genes showed increased expression across pre- and postnatal brain developmental stages and in several neuronal cell types, including GABAergic (γ-aminobutyric-acid-producing) and dopaminergic neurons. Deleterious variants were associated with lower socioeconomic status and lower levels of education in individuals with ADHD, and a decrease of 2.25 intelligence quotient (IQ) points per rare deleterious variant in a sample of adults with ADHD (n = 962). Individuals with ADHD and intellectual disability showed an increased load of rare variants overall, whereas other psychiatric comorbidities had an increased load only for specific gene sets associated with those comorbidities. This suggests that psychiatric comorbidity in ADHD is driven mainly by rare variants in specific genes, rather than by a general increased load across constrained genes. An analysis of rare genetic variants identifies three genes—MAP1A, ANO8 and ANK2—that have a role in attention deficit hyperactivity disorder (ADHD) and investigates the potential underlying biological mechanisms.
Genetics & Epigenetics.authors_short: Demontis, Ditte et al., Børglum, Anders D.
Genetics & Epigenetics.title_cn: 罕见遗传变异赋予注意缺陷多动障碍高风险并揭示神经元生物学机制
Genetics & Epigenetics.abstract_cn: 注意缺陷多动障碍 (ADHD) 是一种儿童期起病的神经发育障碍，具有显著的遗传组分1。它影响约5%的儿童和2.5%的成人2，并与多种严重不良结局相关3–11。尽管与该疾病相关的常见遗传变异已被识别12,13，但罕见变异在ADHD中的作用尚不明确。本研究通过分析来自8,895名ADHD患者和53,780名对照个体的外显子组测序数据中的罕见编码变异，识别出三个与ADHD相关的基因 (MAP1A, ANO8 和 ANK2; P < 3.07 × 10−6; 优势比 5.55–15.13)。这三个基因的蛋白质-蛋白质相互作用网络富集了其他神经发育障碍的罕见变异风险基因，以及参与细胞骨架组织、突触功能和RNA加工的基因。与ADHD最相关的罕见变异风险基因在产前和产后大脑发育阶段以及多种神经元细胞类型（包括GABA能神经元和多巴胺能神经元）中表现出更高的表达。有害变异与ADHD患者较低的社会经济地位和受教育水平相关，并且在ADHD成人样本 (n = 962) 中，每个罕见有害变异导致智商 (IQ) 平均下降2.25分。患有ADHD和智力障碍的个体总体上表现出罕见变异负荷增加，而其他精神共病仅在与这些共病相关的特定基因集中表现出负荷增加。这表明ADHD中的精神共病主要由特定基因中的罕见变异驱动，而非受限基因的普遍负荷增加所致。对罕见遗传变异的分析识别出三个在注意缺陷多动障碍 (ADHD) 中发挥作用的基因——MAP1A、ANO8和ANK2——并探讨了其潜在的生物学机制。

Genetics & Epigenetics.title: Convergent genome evolution shaped the emergence of terrestrial animals
Genetics & Epigenetics.summary: Nature, Published online: 12 November 2025;doi:10.1038/s41586-025-09722-4Comparisons of 154 genomes from 21 animal phyla and outgroups have been used to reconstruct ancestral adaptation to life on land across 11 distinct terrestrialization events, revealing strong evidence for convergent genomic evolution across the animal kingdom and recurring periods of terrestrial colonization.
Genetics & Epigenetics.abstract: The challenges associated with the transition of life from water to land are profound1, yet they have been met in many distinct animal lineages2–5. These constitute a series of independent evolutionary experiments from which we can decipher the role of contingency versus convergence in the adaptation of animal genomes. Here we compare 154 genomes from 21 animal phyla and their outgroups to reconstruct the protein-coding content of the ancestral genomes linked to 11 animal terrestrialization events, and to produce a timescale of terrestrialization. We uncover distinct patterns of gene gain and loss underlying each transition to land, but similar biological functions emerged recurrently pointing to specific adaptations as key to life on land. We show that semi-terrestrial species evolved convergent functional patterns, in contrast with fully terrestrial lineages that followed different paths to land. Our timeline supports three temporal windows of land colonization by animals during the last 487 million years, each associated with specific ecological contexts. Although each lineage exhibits distinct adaptations, there is strong evidence of convergent genome evolution across the animal kingdom suggesting that, in large part, adaptation to life on land is predictable, linking genes to ecosystems. Comparisons of 154 genomes from 21 animal phyla and outgroups have been used to reconstruct ancestral adaptation to life on land across 11 distinct terrestrialization events, revealing strong evidence for convergent genomic evolution across the animal kingdom and recurring periods of terrestrial colonization.
Genetics & Epigenetics.authors_short: Wei, Jialin et al., Paps, Jordi
Genetics & Epigenetics.title_cn: 趋同基因组演化塑造了陆生动物的起源
Genetics & Epigenetics.abstract_cn: 生命从水生到陆生的转变面临着巨大的挑战1，然而，许多不同的动物谱系2–5都成功应对了这些挑战。这些构成了系列独立的演化实验，从中我们可以解读动物基因组适应过程中偶然性与趋同性的作用。本研究比较了来自21个动物门及其外群的154个基因组，以重建与11次动物陆生化事件相关的祖先基因组的蛋白质编码内容，并绘制了陆生化的时间线。我们揭示了每次陆生转变背后基因获得和丢失的不同模式，但相似的生物学功能反复出现，表明特定的适应是陆生生活的关键。我们发现半陆生物种演化出了趋同的功能模式，而完全陆生谱系则遵循了不同的陆生路径。我们的时间线支持在过去4.87亿年间动物陆地定居的三个时间窗口，每个窗口都与特定的生态环境相关。尽管每个谱系都表现出独特的适应性，但动物界普遍存在趋同基因组演化的有力证据，这表明陆生生活的适应在很大程度上是可预测的，将基因与生态系统联系起来。通过比较来自21个动物门及其外群的154个基因组，本研究重建了11次不同陆生化事件中祖先对陆生生活的适应，揭示了动物界趋同基因组演化的有力证据以及陆地定居的反复时期。

Genetics & Epigenetics.title: SIGLEC12 mediates plasma membrane rupture during necroptotic cell death
Genetics & Epigenetics.summary: Nature, Published online: 12 November 2025;doi:10.1038/s41586-025-09741-1CRISPR–Cas9-based genome-wide screening shows that SIGLEC12 mediates plasma membrane rupture in cells undergoing necroptosis, possibly through a human-specific mechanism, indicating its potential as a therapeutic target.
Genetics & Epigenetics.abstract: Necroptosis is a form of lytic cell death that is overactivated during infections and in inflammatory pathologies1. NINJ1 was recently found to be a mediator of plasma membrane rupture (PMR) during pyroptosis, toxin-induced necrosis, apoptosis, and ferroptosis2,3, but the mediator of PMR during necroptotic cell death remained unknown. Here, using a CRISPR–Cas9-based genome-wide knockout approach, we identify SIGLEC12 as a key mediator of necroptosis downstream of MLKL at the PMR step. Cells with knockdown or knockout of SIGLEC12 are defective in necroptosis-induced PMR and demonstrate ballooning morphology. During necroptosis, SIGLEC12 undergoes dephosphorylation, interacts with MLKL, forms cytosolic puncta and assembles into fibrils. Notably, SIGLEC12 is cleaved by TMPRSS4 during necroptosis to produce a 20-kDa fragment highly homologous to NINJ1, and this cleavage event is required and sufficient to induce PMR during necroptosis. A SIGLEC12 variant associated with cancer (Ser458Phe) and a variant found in the general human population (Arg528Trp) attenuate SIGLEC12 cleavage by TMPRSS4. Knockout of Siglec12 in mouse cells does not affect PMR, suggesting a species-specific role. Our identification of SIGLEC12 as a mediator of PMR expands our understanding of how programmed necrosis is executed and offers new approaches for targeting this proinflammatory form of cell death in human diseases. CRISPR–Cas9-based genome-wide screening shows that SIGLEC12 mediates plasma membrane rupture in cells undergoing necroptosis, possibly through a human-specific mechanism, indicating its potential as a therapeutic target.
Genetics & Epigenetics.authors_short: Noh, Hyunjin et al., Najafov, Ayaz
Genetics & Epigenetics.title_cn: SIGLEC12介导坏死性凋亡过程中的质膜破裂
Genetics & Epigenetics.abstract_cn: 坏死性凋亡是一种裂解性细胞死亡形式，在感染和炎症性病理过程中会过度激活。最近发现NINJ1是焦亡、毒素诱导的坏死、凋亡和铁死亡过程中质膜破裂（PMR）的介质，但坏死性凋亡过程中PMR的介质仍不清楚。本研究中，我们利用CRISPR-Cas9基因组范围敲除方法，鉴定出SIGLEC12是MLKL下游、坏死性凋亡PMR步骤的关键介质。SIGLEC12敲低或敲除的细胞在坏死性凋亡诱导的PMR中存在缺陷，并表现出气球状形态。在坏死性凋亡过程中，SIGLEC12发生去磷酸化，与MLKL相互作用，形成胞质斑点并组装成纤维。值得注意的是，在坏死性凋亡过程中，SIGLEC12被TMPRSS4裂解，产生一个与NINJ1高度同源的20 kDa片段，并且该裂解事件是诱导坏死性凋亡PMR的必要且充分条件。与癌症相关的SIGLEC12变体（Ser458Phe）和在普通人群中发现的变体（Arg528Trp）均能减弱TMPRSS4对SIGLEC12的裂解。小鼠细胞中Siglec12的敲除不影响PMR，这表明其具有物种特异性作用。我们将SIGLEC12鉴定为PMR的介质，这扩展了我们对程序性坏死执行机制的理解，并为在人类疾病中靶向这种促炎性细胞死亡形式提供了新方法。基于CRISPR-Cas9的基因组范围筛选表明，SIGLEC12在经历坏死性凋亡的细胞中介导质膜破裂，可能通过一种人类特异性机制，这预示着其作为治疗靶点的潜力。

Genetics & Epigenetics.title: Depression genetics through the lens of age at onset
Genetics & Epigenetics.summary: Nature Genetics, Published online: 13 November 2025;doi:10.1038/s41588-025-02402-zA study drawing on biobank and registry data from five Nordic countries reveals distinct genetic associations for early- and late-onset major depressive disorder and differences in their genetic architectures and relationships with other traits. Stratification by age at onset can uncover risk effects relevant to severe outcomes and inform prevention strategies.
Genetics & Epigenetics.abstract: A study drawing on biobank and registry data from five Nordic countries reveals distinct genetic associations for early- and late-onset major depressive disorder and differences in their genetic architectures and relationships with other traits. Stratification by age at onset can uncover risk effects relevant to severe outcomes and inform prevention strategies.
Genetics & Epigenetics.title_cn: 发病年龄视角下的抑郁症遗传学
Genetics & Epigenetics.abstract_cn: 一项利用来自五个北欧国家的生物样本库和登记数据进行的研究揭示，早发型和晚发型重度抑郁症具有独特的遗传关联，并且在遗传结构以及与其他性状的关系上存在差异。根据发病年龄进行分层，有助于揭示与严重结局相关的风险效应，并为制定预防策略提供依据。

Genetics & Epigenetics.title: Genome-wide association analyses identify distinct genetic architectures for early-onset and late-onset depression
Genetics & Epigenetics.summary: Nature Genetics, Published online: 13 November 2025;doi:10.1038/s41588-025-02396-8Genome-wide association analyses leveraging Nordic biobanks with longitudinal health registries identify differences in the genetic architectures of early-onset and late-onset major depressive disorder and in their genetic correlations with related traits.
Genetics & Epigenetics.abstract: Major depressive disorder (MDD) is a common and heterogeneous disorder of complex etiology. Studying more homogeneous groups stratified according to clinical characteristics, such as age of onset, can improve the identification of the underlying genetic causes and lead to more targeted treatment strategies. We leveraged Nordic biobanks with longitudinal health registries to investigate differences in the genetic architectures of early-onset (eoMDD; n = 46,708 cases) and late-onset (loMDD; n = 37,168 cases) MDD. We identified 12 genomic loci for eoMDD and two for loMDD. Overall, the two MDD subtypes correlated moderately (genetic correlation, rg = 0.58) and differed in their genetic correlations with related traits. These findings suggest that eoMDD and loMDD have partially distinct genetic signatures, with a specific developmental brain signature for eoMDD. Importantly, we demonstrate that polygenic risk scores (PRS) for eoMDD predict suicide attempts within the first 10 years after the initial diagnosis: the absolute risk for suicide attempt was 26% in the top PRS decile, compared to 12% and 20% in the bottom decile and the intermediate group, respectively. Taken together, our findings can inform precision psychiatry approaches for MDD. Genome-wide association analyses leveraging Nordic biobanks with longitudinal health registries identify differences in the genetic architectures of early-onset and late-onset major depressive disorder and in their genetic correlations with related traits.
Genetics & Epigenetics.authors_short: Shorter, John R. et al., Lu, Yi
Genetics & Epigenetics.title_cn: 全基因组关联分析揭示早发型和迟发型抑郁症的独特遗传结构
Genetics & Epigenetics.abstract_cn: 重度抑郁症（MDD）是一种常见且异质性高的疾病，其病因复杂。根据临床特征（如发病年龄）对更同质的群体进行研究，有助于更好地识别潜在的遗传病因，并制定更具针对性的治疗策略。我们利用北欧生物样本库及其纵向健康登记数据，调查了早发型（eoMDD；46,708例）和迟发型（loMDD；37,168例）MDD的遗传结构差异。我们为eoMDD识别出12个基因组位点，为loMDD识别出2个基因组位点。总体而言，这两种MDD亚型之间存在中度相关性（遗传相关性，rg = 0.58），并且它们与相关性状的遗传相关性也存在差异。这些发现表明，eoMDD和loMDD具有部分独特的遗传特征，其中eoMDD具有特定的发育性大脑特征。重要的是，我们证明了eoMDD的多基因风险评分（PRS）可以预测初次诊断后10年内的自杀企图：在PRS最高十分位数中，自杀企图的绝对风险为26%，而最低十分位数和中间组分别为12%和20%。综上所述，我们的研究结果可为MDD的精准精神病学方法提供信息。利用北欧生物样本库和纵向健康登记数据的全基因组关联分析，揭示了早发型和迟发型重度抑郁症在遗传结构及其与相关性状的遗传相关性方面的差异。

Genetics & Epigenetics.title: Computationally efficient meta-analysis of gene-based tests using summary statistics in large-scale genetic studies
Genetics & Epigenetics.summary: Nature Genetics, Published online: 12 November 2025;doi:10.1038/s41588-025-02390-0REMETA is a method for meta-analyzing gene-based associations using summary statistics, integrating with REGENIE and improving computational efficiency for large studies with many phenotypes.
Genetics & Epigenetics.abstract: Meta-analysis of gene-based tests using single-variant summary statistics is a powerful strategy for genetic association studies. However, current approaches require sharing the covariance matrix between variants for each study and trait of interest. For large-scale studies with many phenotypes, these matrices can be cumbersome to calculate, store and share. Here, to address this challenge, we present REMETA—an efficient tool for meta-analysis of gene-based tests. REMETA uses a single sparse covariance reference file per study that is rescaled for each phenotype using single-variant summary statistics. We develop new methods for binary traits with case–control imbalance, and to estimate allele frequencies, genotype counts and effect sizes of burden tests. We demonstrate the performance and advantages of our approach through meta-analysis of five traits in 469,376 samples in UK Biobank. The open-source REMETA software will facilitate meta-analysis across large-scale exome sequencing studies from diverse studies that cannot easily be combined. REMETA is a method for meta-analyzing gene-based associations using summary statistics, integrating with REGENIE and improving computational efficiency for large studies with many phenotypes.
Genetics & Epigenetics.authors_short: Joseph, Tyler A. et al., Marchini, Jonathan
Genetics & Epigenetics.title_cn: 大规模遗传学研究中基于汇总统计量的基因检验高效荟萃分析
Genetics & Epigenetics.abstract_cn: 利用单变异汇总统计量进行基于基因检验的荟萃分析是遗传关联研究的有力策略。然而，现有方法要求在每个研究和感兴趣的性状之间共享变异体间的协方差矩阵。对于具有众多表型的大规模研究，这些矩阵的计算、存储和共享可能非常繁琐。为应对这一挑战，我们在此提出REMETA——一个用于基于基因检验荟萃分析的高效工具。REMETA为每个研究使用一个稀疏协方差参考文件，该文件利用单变异汇总统计量针对每个表型进行重新缩放。我们开发了针对病例-对照不平衡的二元性状的新方法，并用于估计等位基因频率、基因型计数和负担检验的效应大小。我们通过对英国生物样本库中469,376个样本的五种性状进行荟萃分析，证明了我们方法的性能和优势。开源的REMETA软件将促进来自不同研究、难以轻易合并的大规模外显子组测序研究的荟萃分析。REMETA是一种利用汇总统计量对基于基因的关联进行荟萃分析的方法，它与REGENIE集成，并提高了具有众多表型的大规模研究的计算效率。

Genetics & Epigenetics.title: Ultra-mild bisulfite outperforms existing methods for 5-methylcytosine detection with low input DNA
Genetics & Epigenetics.summary: Nature Communications, Published online: 13 November 2025;doi:10.1038/s41467-025-66033-yDNA methylation is a critical biomarker for disease detection, yet current methods often compromise DNA integrity or lack sufficient accuracy. Here, the authors introduce Ultra-Mild Bisulfite Sequencing, a technique that enables highly sensitive, robust, and accurate detection of 5mC.
Genetics & Epigenetics.abstract: We present Ultra-Mild Bisulfite Sequencing (UMBS-seq), a method for 5-methylcytosine (5mC) detection that minimizes DNA degradation and background noise. UMBS-seq outperforms conventional bisulfite and enzymatic methyl-sequencing (EM-seq) methods in library yield, complexity, and conversion efficiency when applied to low-input DNA samples. In particular, its effectiveness with low-input cell-free DNA (cfDNA) and hybridization-based target capture highlights its potential for clinical applications, including 5mC biomarker detection and early disease diagnosis. DNA methylation is a critical biomarker for disease detection, yet current methods often compromise DNA integrity or lack sufficient accuracy. Here, the authors introduce Ultra-Mild Bisulfite Sequencing, a technique that enables highly sensitive, robust, and accurate detection of 5mC.
Genetics & Epigenetics.authors_short: Dai, Qing et al., He, Chuan
Genetics & Epigenetics.title_cn: 超温和亚硫酸氢盐法在低起始量DNA检测5-甲基胞嘧啶方面优于现有方法
Genetics & Epigenetics.abstract_cn: 我们提出了一种超温和亚硫酸氢盐测序（UMBS-seq）方法，用于5-甲基胞嘧啶（5mC）检测，该方法能最大限度地减少DNA降解并降低背景噪音。在应用于低起始量DNA样本时，UMBS-seq在文库产量、复杂性和转化效率方面均优于传统的亚硫酸氢盐测序和酶促甲基化测序（EM-seq）方法。尤其值得一提的是，其在低起始量无细胞DNA（cfDNA）和基于杂交的靶向捕获方面的有效性，凸显了其在临床应用中的巨大潜力，包括5mC生物标志物检测和早期疾病诊断。DNA甲基化是疾病检测的关键生物标志物，然而现有方法往往会损害DNA完整性或缺乏足够的准确性。本文中，作者引入了超温和亚硫酸氢盐测序技术，该技术能够实现5mC的高灵敏度、稳健且准确的检测。

Single-cell & Spatial omics.title: Spatial fibroblast niches define Crohn’s fistulae
Single-cell & Spatial omics.summary: Nature, Published online: 12 November 2025;doi:10.1038/s41586-025-09744-ySpatial transcriptomic analysis of cells in intestinal fistulae of patients with Crohn’s disease reveals the existence of specialized fistula-associated cell states with distinct signalling profiles and extracellular matrix architecture.
Single-cell & Spatial omics.abstract: Crohn’s disease often presents with fistulae, abnormal tunnels that connect the intestine to the skin or other organs. Despite their profound effect on morbidity, the molecular basis of fistula formation remains unclear, largely owing to the challenge of capturing intact fistula tracts and their inherent heterogeneity1–3. Here we construct a subcellular-resolution spatial atlas of 68 intestinal fistulae spanning diverse anatomical locations. We describe fistula-associated epithelial, immune and stromal cell states, revealing abnormal zonation of growth factors and morphogens linked to establishment of tunnelling anatomy. We identify fistula-associated stromal (FAS) fibroblasts, which are assembled in concentric layers: a proliferative, lumen-adjacent zone beneath neutrophil and macrophage-rich granulation tissue, an active lesion core of FAS cells and a quiescent, pro-fibrotic outer zone. We examine the architecture of the extracellular matrix in the fistula tract and demonstrate that FAS populations associate with distinct collagen structures, exhibiting properties ranging from proliferation, migration and extracellular matrix remodelling to dense collagen deposition and fibrosis. We define niches supporting epithelialization of fistula tunnels and a FAS-like population that is detected at the base of ulcers in non-penetrating Crohn’s disease. Our study demonstrates that common molecular pathways and cellular niches underpin fistulae across intestinal locations, revealing the cellular protagonists of fistula establishment and persistence. This resource will inform the development of model systems and interventions to mitigate aberrant fibroblast activity while preserving their regenerative properties in Crohn’s disease. Spatial transcriptomic analysis of cells in intestinal fistulae of patients with Crohn’s disease reveals the existence of specialized fistula-associated cell states with distinct signalling profiles and extracellular matrix architecture.
Single-cell & Spatial omics.authors_short: McGregor, Colleen et al., Simmons, Alison
Single-cell & Spatial omics.title_cn: 空间成纤维细胞生态位界定克罗恩病瘘管
Single-cell & Spatial omics.abstract_cn: 克罗恩病常伴有瘘管形成，即连接肠道与皮肤或其他器官的异常通道。尽管瘘管对患者发病率有深远影响，但其形成的分子基础仍不明确，这主要归因于获取完整瘘管组织以及其固有的异质性所面临的挑战。在本研究中，我们构建了涵盖不同解剖位置的68个肠道瘘管的亚细胞分辨率空间图谱。我们描述了与瘘管相关的上皮细胞、免疫细胞和基质细胞状态，揭示了与隧道状结构形成相关的生长因子和形态发生素的异常分区。我们鉴定出瘘管相关基质（FAS）成纤维细胞，它们呈同心层状排列：一个位于中性粒细胞和巨噬细胞丰富的肉芽组织下方、邻近管腔的增殖区，一个由FAS细胞组成的活跃病灶核心区，以及一个静止的、促纤维化的外层区。我们检查了瘘管中细胞外基质的结构，并证明FAS细胞群与独特的胶原结构相关，表现出从增殖、迁移、细胞外基质重塑到致密胶原沉积和纤维化等多种特性。我们定义了支持瘘管隧道上皮化的生态位，并在非穿透性克罗恩病溃疡底部检测到一种FAS样细胞群。我们的研究表明，共同的分子通路和细胞生态位是肠道不同部位瘘管形成的基础，揭示了瘘管建立和持续存在的细胞主角。对克罗恩病患者肠道瘘管细胞进行空间转录组分析，揭示了具有独特信号传导特征和细胞外基质结构的特异性瘘管相关细胞状态的存在。这一资源将为开发模型系统和干预措施提供信息，以减轻异常成纤维细胞的活性，同时保留其在克罗恩病中的再生特性。

Single-cell & Spatial omics.title: iPEX enables micrometre-resolution deep spatial proteomics via tissue expansion
Single-cell & Spatial omics.summary: Nature, Published online: 12 November 2025;doi:10.1038/s41586-025-09734-0Isotropic tissue magnification is integrated with matrix-assisted laser desorption/ionization mass spectrometry imaging to enable untargeted spatial proteomics at micrometre resolution and with high protein identification rates in multiple tissue types.
Single-cell & Spatial omics.abstract: The number of spatial omics technologies being developed is increasing1. However, a missing tool is one that can locate proteins in tissues in an untargeted manner at high spatial resolution and coverage. Here we present in situ imaging proteomics via expansion (iPEX), which integrates isotropic tissue magnification2 with matrix-assisted laser desorption/ionization (MALDI) mass spectrometry imaging. iPEX provides scalable spatial resolution down to the micrometre scale and substantially increases the sensitivity of protein identification by 10–100-fold. Using the retina as a model, iPEX enabled the construction of spatial proteomic maps with high precision, the visualization of single-cell layers and extrasomatic structures and the identification of colocalized proteins. iPEX was readily applied to diverse tissues, including brain, intestine, liver and organoids, detecting 600–1,500 proteins at 1–5-µm effective pixel size. The application of iPEX to depict spatial proteomic maps in brains of mice with 5xFAD Alzheimer’s disease revealed an early-onset mitochondrial aberrancy. Notably, in young mice, the peroxisomal acetyl-CoA acyltransferase ACAA1A—of which the N392S mutant is a monogenic risk factor in Alzheimer’s disease3—was downregulated. ACAA1 depletion blocked the biosynthesis of long-chain polyunsaturated fatty acids, including docosahexaenoic acid, in multiple cellular contexts. These lipidome alterations were restored in cells overexpressing wild-type ACAA1 but not ACAA1(N392S), which suggests that the dysregulation of long-chain polyunsaturated fatty acids has an early role in neurodegeneration. Together, these results demonstrate that iPEX facilitates untargeted spatial proteomics at micrometre resolution for diverse applications. Isotropic tissue magnification is integrated with matrix-assisted laser desorption/ionization mass spectrometry imaging to enable untargeted spatial proteomics at micrometre resolution and with high protein identification rates in multiple tissue types.
Single-cell & Spatial omics.authors_short: Wang, Fengxiang et al., Zou, Yilong
Single-cell & Spatial omics.title_cn: iPEX通过组织膨胀技术实现微米级深度空间蛋白质组学
Single-cell & Spatial omics.abstract_cn: 空间组学技术正日益发展。然而，目前仍缺乏一种能够以高空间分辨率和覆盖度，非靶向地定位组织中蛋白质的工具。本文介绍了一种通过膨胀实现的体内成像蛋白质组学（iPEX）技术，该技术将各向同性组织放大技术与基质辅助激光解吸/电离（MALDI）质谱成像相结合。iPEX可提供低至微米级的可扩展空间分辨率，并将蛋白质识别灵敏度显著提高了10至100倍。以视网膜为模型，iPEX能够高精度地构建空间蛋白质组图谱，可视化单细胞层和体外结构，并识别共定位蛋白质。iPEX易于应用于多种组织，包括大脑、肠道、肝脏和类器官，在1-5微米的有效像素尺寸下检测到600-1500种蛋白质。将iPEX应用于描绘5xFAD阿尔茨海默病小鼠大脑中的空间蛋白质组图谱，揭示了早期线粒体异常。值得注意的是，在年轻小鼠中，过氧化物酶体乙酰辅酶A酰基转移酶ACAA1A（其N392S突变体是阿尔茨海默病的单基因风险因素）表达下调。ACAA1的缺失阻断了多种细胞环境中长链多不饱和脂肪酸（包括二十二碳六烯酸）的生物合成。这些脂质组改变在过表达野生型ACAA1的细胞中得到恢复，但在过表达ACAA1(N392S)的细胞中未能恢复，这表明长链多不饱和脂肪酸的失调在神经退行性疾病中具有早期作用。综上所述，这些结果表明iPEX能够实现微米级分辨率的非靶向空间蛋白质组学，并具有广泛的应用前景。该技术通过将各向同性组织放大技术与基质辅助激光解吸/电离质谱成像相结合，在多种组织类型中实现了微米级分辨率和高蛋白质识别率的非靶向空间蛋白质组学。

Single-cell & Spatial omics.title: SpaMWGDA: Identifying spatial domains of spatial transcriptomes using multi-view weighted fusion graph convolutional network and data augmentation
Single-cell & Spatial omics.summary: by Lin Yuan, Boyuan Meng, Qingxiang Wang, Chunyu Hu, Cuihong Wang, De-Shuang HuangThe rapid development of spatial transcriptomics (ST) has made it possible to effectively integrate gene expression and spatial information of cells and accurately identify spatial domains. A large number of deep learning (DL)-based methods have been proposed to perform spatial domain identification and achieved impressive results. However, these methods have some limitations. First, these methods rely on a fixed similarity metric and cannot fully utilize neighborhood information. Second, they cannot efficiently and adaptively integrate key information when fusing and reconstructing gene expression using purely additive methods. Finally, these methods ignore key nonlinear features and introduce noise during clustering. To address these limitations, we propose a novel DL model SpaMWGDA based on multi-view weighted fused graph convolutional network (GCN) and data augmentation. By modeling spatial information using different similarity metrics, the model is able to successfully capture comprehensive neighborhood information of the spot features. By combining data augmentation and contrastive learning, SpaMWGDA is able to learn key gene expressions. SpaMWGDA uses a multi-view GCN encoder to model the similarities between spatial information and gene features, and uses a view-level attention mechanism for weighted fusion to adaptively learn the dependencies between them and learn the key features of each view. Experimental results not only demonstrate that SpaMWGDA outperforms competing methods in spatial domain identification and trajectory inference but also show the ability of SpaMWGDA to analyse tissue structure and function. The source code for SpaMWGDA is available at https://github.com/nathanyl/SpaMWGDA .

Single-cell & Spatial omics.authors_short: Lin Yuan et al., De-Shuang Huang
Single-cell & Spatial omics.title_cn: SpaMWGDA：基于多视图加权融合图卷积网络和数据增强的空间转录组空间域识别
Single-cell & Spatial omics.abstract_cn: 空间转录组 (ST) 技术的快速发展，使得有效整合细胞基因表达和空间信息并准确识别空间域成为可能。大量基于深度学习 (DL) 的方法已被提出用于空间域识别，并取得了显著成果。然而，这些方法存在一些局限性。首先，它们依赖固定的相似性度量，无法充分利用邻域信息。其次，当使用纯加性方法融合和重构基因表达时，它们无法高效自适应地整合关键信息。最后，这些方法忽略了关键的非线性特征，并在聚类过程中引入了噪声。为解决这些局限性，我们提出了一种基于多视图加权融合图卷积网络 (GCN) 和数据增强的新型深度学习模型 SpaMWGDA。通过使用不同的相似性度量对空间信息进行建模，该模型能够成功捕获斑点特征的全面邻域信息。通过结合数据增强和对比学习，SpaMWGDA 能够学习关键的基因表达。SpaMWGDA 利用多视图 GCN 编码器对空间信息和基因特征之间的相似性进行建模，并采用视图级注意力机制进行加权融合，以自适应地学习它们之间的依赖关系并提取每个视图的关键特征。实验结果不仅表明 SpaMWGDA 在空间域识别和轨迹推断方面优于现有竞争方法，还展示了其分析组织结构和功能的能力。SpaMWGDA 的源代码可在 https://github.com/nathanyl/SpaMWGDA 获取。

Plants.title: Florigen activation complex forms via multifaceted assembly in Arabidopsis
Plants.summary: Nature, Published online: 12 November 2025;doi:10.1038/s41586-025-09704-6In flowering plants, DNA–FD–14-3-3 recruits FT to the florigen activation complex both through DNA–FT interactions and by reducing liquid phase condensation of FD protein, which promotes dimerization, leading to FT recruitment.
Plants.abstract: Florigen, encoded by FT genes, is synthesized in leaves and transported to the shoot apical meristem (SAM) to induce flower development1–3. At the SAM, 14-3-3 proteins are proposed to act as receptors for FT protein and to mediate the indirect interaction between FT and the basic leucine zipper (bZIP) transcription factor FD to form the florigen activation complex (FAC) that activates transcription of flowering genes4–6. Here we demonstrate a different mechanism of FAC assembly, diverse functions for the 14-3-3 proteins within the complex, and an unexpected spatiotemporal distribution of the FAC. We show that FT is not recruited by 14-3-3 alone, but that it interacts with the DNA–FD–14-3-3 complex through two interfaces, one of which binds DNA via the unstructured C terminus of FT. We also find that interaction of 14-3-3 proteins with the C terminus of phosphorylated FD reduces liquid phase condensation of the intrinsically disordered FD protein, allowing it to bind DNA, and that the 14-3-3 proteins strengthen DNA binding of FD by promoting dimerization, which ultimately results in the recruitment of FT. Unexpectedly, we also find that after FT movement to the shoot apex, FT and FD are co-transcribed in young floral primordia, forming a boundary with the suppressed bract and allowing formation of the FAC during the first stages of floral development. Our studies propose a new mechanism by which the florigen FT transcriptional complex is formed, and indicate distinct functions for the complex during SAM and floral primordium development. In flowering plants, DNA–FD–14-3-3 recruits FT to the florigen activation complex both through DNA–FT interactions and by reducing liquid phase condensation of FD protein, which promotes dimerization, leading to FT recruitment.
Plants.authors_short: Gao, He et al., Coupland, George
Plants.title_cn: 拟南芥中成花素激活复合体通过多途径组装形成
Plants.abstract_cn: 成花素（Florigen）由FT基因编码，在叶片中合成后被转运至茎尖分生组织（SAM），以诱导花朵发育1–3。在SAM中，14-3-3蛋白被认为是FT蛋白的受体，并介导FT与碱性亮氨酸拉链（bZIP）转录因子FD之间的间接相互作用，从而形成激活开花基因转录的成花素激活复合体（FAC）4–6。本研究揭示了FAC组装的一种不同机制、复合体中14-3-3蛋白的多种功能以及FAC出乎意料的时空分布。我们发现FT并非单独由14-3-3招募，而是通过两个界面与DNA–FD–14-3-3复合体相互作用，其中一个界面通过FT的非结构化C末端结合DNA。我们还发现，14-3-3蛋白与磷酸化FD的C末端相互作用，可减少内在无序FD蛋白的液相凝聚，使其能够结合DNA；并且14-3-3蛋白通过促进二聚化来增强FD的DNA结合能力，最终导致FT的招募。出乎意料的是，我们还发现，在FT转运至茎尖后，FT和FD在幼花原基中共同转录，与受抑制的苞片形成边界，并允许FAC在花朵发育的最初阶段形成。我们的研究提出了一种成花素FT转录复合体形成的新机制，并揭示了该复合体在SAM和花原基发育过程中的不同功能。在开花植物中，DNA–FD–14-3-3通过DNA–FT相互作用以及减少FD蛋白的液相凝聚（从而促进二聚化）来招募FT进入成花素激活复合体，最终实现FT的招募。

Plants.title: Developmentally regulated genes drive phylogenomic splits in ovule evolution
Plants.summary: Nature Communications, Published online: 13 November 2025;doi:10.1038/s41467-025-65399-3Making use of phylogenomic and transcriptome analysis of 20 plant species, including 14 gymnosperms, Sondervan et al. uncover candidate ovule genes and find that orthologs with differential tissue expression patterns across species most influence major evolutionary splits of seed plants.
Plants.abstract: The evolution of seeds transformed life on earth and is responsible for our most important food crops. Gymnosperms, the oldest living seed plants, are an untapped genomic reservoir for genes involved in seed evolution. To tap this resource, we assemble deep transcriptomes of 14 gymnosperms, four angiosperms, and two ferns and identified 22,429 phylogenetically informative ortholog groups. We observe that genes differentially expressed in ovules or leaves provide the majority of phylogenomic support for the evolutionary splits between 1) seed and non-seed plants; 2) gymnosperms and angiosperms; and/or 3) within gymnosperms (conifers vs. “ancient” gymnosperms). Our gymnosperm data identifies unreported candidate ovule regulated genes in Arabidopsis. Moreover, prior knowledge from Arabidopsis helps uncover 4,076 candidate ovule genes that influence these evolutionary splits. We validate the expression of candidate ovule genes in gymnosperm-specific ovule structures. Our work provides a resource for seed gene discovery, conservation, and crop improvement. Making use of phylogenomic and transcriptome analysis of 20 plant species, including 14 gymnosperms, Sondervan et al. uncover candidate ovule genes and find that orthologs with differential tissue expression patterns across species most influence major evolutionary splits of seed plants.
Plants.authors_short: Sondervan, Veronica M. et al., Coruzzi, Gloria M.
Plants.title_cn: 发育调控基因驱动胚珠进化中的系统基因组学分化
Plants.abstract_cn: 种子的进化改变了地球上的生命，并催生了我们最重要的粮食作物。裸子植物作为现存最古老的种子植物，是种子进化相关基因尚未开发的基因组宝库。为了利用这一资源，我们组装了14种裸子植物、4种被子植物和2种蕨类植物的深度转录组，并鉴定了22,429个具有系统发育信息价值的直系同源基因组。我们发现，在胚珠或叶片中差异表达的基因，为以下进化分化提供了主要的系统基因组学支持：1) 种子植物与非种子植物之间；2) 裸子植物与被子植物之间；和/或 3) 裸子植物内部（针叶树与“古老”裸子植物之间）。我们的裸子植物数据在拟南芥中识别出未曾报道的胚珠调控候选基因。此外，来自拟南芥的现有知识有助于揭示4,076个影响这些进化分化的胚珠候选基因。我们验证了候选胚珠基因在裸子植物特有胚珠结构中的表达。我们的工作为种子基因的发现、保护和作物改良提供了资源。Sondervan等人利用对包括14种裸子植物在内的20种植物物种进行的系统基因组学和转录组分析，揭示了胚珠候选基因，并发现跨物种具有差异组织表达模式的直系同源基因对种子植物的主要进化分化影响最大。

Plants.title: Mutual inhibition between EPFL2 and auxin extends the intervals of periodic leaf morphogenesis
Plants.summary: Nature Communications, Published online: 13 November 2025;doi:10.1038/s41467-025-65792-yPlant development is characterized by periodic morphogenesis, yet regulatory mechanisms underlying the periodicity remain unknown. Tameshige et al. reveal that bistable cellular status modulates the spatial pattern of periodic leaf morphogenesis.
Plants.abstract: Rules behind the spatial arrangement of repetitive modules are key principles of multicellular morphogenesis. In plant shoots, PIN-FORMED 1 (PIN1)-mediated polar auxin transport instructs periodic formation of auxin maxima, which develop into lateral organs or leaf serrations. However, it remains unknown how the intervals of regularly arising auxin maxima are controlled. Here we show that a cysteine rich peptide EPIDERMAL PATTERNING FACTOR-LIKE 2 (EPFL2) dose-dependently determines the intervals of auxin maxima during serration formation in leaf primordia. EPFL2 constitutes a mutually repressive relationship with cellular auxin response, thereby produces bistable states. Based on our computational simulations, we propose that the bistability modulates the periodicity of PIN1-mediated auxin maxima formation. Moreover, EPFL2 ensures precise phyllotactic angles, underscoring the general role of EPFL2 in auxin-mediated shoot patterning. This study illustrates that the intercoupling between EPFL2-auxin bistable module and PIN1-mediated polar auxin transport underpins versatile periodicity in auxin maxima formation during shoot development. Plant development is characterized by periodic morphogenesis, yet regulatory mechanisms underlying the periodicity remain unknown. Tameshige et al. reveal that bistable cellular status modulates the spatial pattern of periodic leaf morphogenesis.
Plants.authors_short: Tameshige, Toshiaki et al., Ikeuchi, Momoko
Plants.title_cn: EPFL2与生长素的相互抑制延长了周期性叶片形态发生的间隔
Plants.abstract_cn: 重复模块的空间排列规律是多细胞形态发生的关键原理。在植物茎尖，PIN-FORMED 1 (PIN1) 介导的极性生长素运输指导生长素最大值的周期性形成，这些最大值随后发育成侧生器官或叶片锯齿。然而，周期性出现的生长素最大值的间隔如何被调控仍不清楚。本研究表明，富含半胱氨酸的肽EPIDERMAL PATTERNING FACTOR-LIKE 2 (EPFL2) 在叶原基锯齿形成过程中，剂量依赖性地决定了生长素最大值的间隔。EPFL2与细胞生长素响应之间存在相互抑制关系，从而产生双稳态。基于我们的计算模拟，我们提出这种双稳态调节了PIN1介导的生长素最大值形成的周期性。此外，EPFL2确保了精确的叶序角，突出了EPFL2在生长素介导的茎尖模式形成中的普遍作用。这项研究阐明了EPFL2-生长素双稳态模块与PIN1介导的极性生长素运输之间的相互耦合，是茎尖发育过程中生长素最大值形成多样化周期性的基础。植物发育以周期性形态发生为特征，但其周期性背后的调控机制仍不清楚。Tameshige 等人揭示了双稳态细胞状态调节了周期性叶片形态发生的空间模式。

Plants.title: A combined biochemical and computational approach provides evidence for membrane remodelling by the structural scaffold of the endocytic TPLATE complex
Plants.summary: Nature Plants, Published online: 12 November 2025;doi:10.1038/s41477-025-02146-yThe manuscript uses an integrative approach to generate a comprehensive structure of the multisubunit endocytic TPLATE complex and to study its membrane targeting and its role in membrane deformation during the initial phase of plant endocytosis.
Plants.abstract: Eukaryotic cells maintain homeostasis of their outer membrane by controlled internalization of lipid and protein constituents via endocytosis. Endocytosis is evolutionary conserved and uses similarly folded domains. How these structural folds are combined into proteins and protein complexes, however, differs between eukaryotic kingdoms. The TPLATE complex (TPC) in plants is an evolutionary ancient protein module that combines several protein domains with a conserved role in endocytosis into a single octameric protein complex. Its molecular architecture, lipid-nucleated condensate formation and requirement for clathrin cage curvature revealed its function in endocytosis initiation in plants. Mechanistic understanding of how this complex drives membrane deformation during plant endocytosis is, however, lacking. Here we used an integrative structural approach to obtain a precise molecular structure of the TPC of Arabidopsis thaliana. In addition, our approach allowed visualizing the structural flexibility that hallmarks this enigmatic complex. We prove that the intrinsic structural flexibility is required for its functionality and membrane recruitment. The membrane-binding interface consists of several domains with differential lipid preferences. Finally, we demonstrate via molecular dynamics simulations that the crescent shape of the structured part of the complex is sufficient for membrane curvature generation. Our mechanistic insight, obtained by a combined biochemical and computational approach, shows that the structured part of the TPC likely contributes to the execution of plant endocytosis, which does not depend on cytoskeletal-based force generation. The manuscript uses an integrative approach to generate a comprehensive structure of the multisubunit endocytic TPLATE complex and to study its membrane targeting and its role in membrane deformation during the initial phase of plant endocytosis.

Plants.title_cn: 结合生化与计算方法揭示内吞TPLATE复合体结构支架介导的膜重塑机制
Plants.abstract_cn: 真核细胞通过内吞作用受控内化脂质和蛋白质组分，从而维持其外膜的稳态。内吞作用在进化上是保守的，并利用相似折叠的结构域。然而，这些结构折叠如何组合成蛋白质和蛋白质复合体，在不同真核生物界之间存在差异。植物中的TPLATE复合体（TPC）是一个进化上古老的蛋白质模块，它将多个在内吞作用中具有保守作用的蛋白质结构域组合成一个单一的八聚体蛋白质复合体。其分子结构、脂质诱导的凝聚体形成以及对网格蛋白笼曲率的需求揭示了其在植物内吞起始中的功能。然而，关于该复合体如何在植物内吞过程中驱动膜变形的机制理解仍然缺乏。在此，我们采用了一种整合结构学方法，获得了拟南芥TPC的精确分子结构。此外，我们的方法还能够可视化该神秘复合体所特有的结构柔性。我们证明了其固有的结构柔性对其功能和膜招募至关重要。膜结合界面由多个具有不同脂质偏好的结构域组成。最后，我们通过分子动力学模拟证明，该复合体结构化部分的月牙形足以产生膜曲率。我们通过结合生化与计算方法获得的机制洞察表明，TPC的结构化部分可能有助于植物内吞作用的执行，且该过程不依赖于基于细胞骨架的力生成。本研究采用整合方法，构建了多亚基内吞TPLATE复合体的全面结构，并研究了其在植物内吞起始阶段的膜靶向及其在膜变形中的作用。

Plants.title: Improving the accuracy of automated labeling of specimen images datasets via a confidence-based process
Plants.summary: by Quentin Bateux, Jonathan Koss, Patrick W. Sweeney, Erika Edwards, Nelson Rios, Aaron M. DollarThe digitization of natural history collections over the past three decades has unlocked a treasure trove of specimen imagery and metadata. There is great interest in making this data more useful by further labeling it with additional trait data, and modern “deep learning” machine learning techniques utilizing convolutional neural nets (CNNs) and similar networks show particular promise to reduce the amount of required manual labeling by human experts, making the process much faster and less expensive. However, in most cases, the accuracy of these approaches is too low for reliable utilization of the automatic labeling, typically in the range of 80-85% accuracy. In this paper, we present and validate an approach that can greatly improve this accuracy, essentially by examining the “confidence” that the network has in the generated label as well as utilizing a user-defined threshold to reject labels that fall below a chosen level. We demonstrate that a naive model that produced 86% initial accuracy can achieve improved performance - over 95% accuracy (rejecting about 40% of the labels) or over 99% accuracy (rejecting about 65%) by selecting higher confidence thresholds. This gives flexibility to adapt existing models to the statistical requirements of various types of research and has the potential to move these automatic labeling approaches from being unusably inaccurate to being an invaluable new tool. After validating the approach in a number of ways, we annotate the reproductive state of a large dataset of over 600,000 herbarium specimens. The analysis of the results points at under-investigated correlations as well as general alignment with known trends. By sharing this new dataset alongside this work, we want to allow biologists to gather insights for their own research questions, at their chosen point of accuracy/coverage trade-off.

Plants.title_cn: 通过基于置信度的方法提高标本图像数据集自动化标注的准确性
Plants.abstract_cn: 过去三十年间，自然历史收藏品的数字化工作，为标本图像和元数据带来了巨大的宝藏。人们对通过额外性状数据进一步标注这些数据以提高其可用性抱有浓厚兴趣。现代“深度学习”机器学习技术，利用卷积神经网络（CNNs）及类似网络，在减少人工专家手动标注量方面展现出巨大潜力，从而使该过程更快、成本更低。然而，在大多数情况下，这些方法的准确性过低（通常在80-85%之间），无法可靠地利用自动化标注。本文提出并验证了一种能够显著提高准确性的方法，其核心在于检查网络对生成标签的“置信度”，并利用用户定义的阈值来拒绝低于选定水平的标签。我们证明，通过选择更高的置信度阈值，一个初始准确率为86%的朴素模型可以实现性能提升——达到95%以上的准确率（拒绝约40%的标签）或99%以上的准确率（拒绝约65%的标签）。这为现有模型适应各类研究的统计要求提供了灵活性，并有望使这些自动化标注方法从不可靠的低准确率工具转变为宝贵的新工具。在通过多种方式验证该方法后，我们对超过60万份植物标本的大型数据集的生殖状态进行了标注。结果分析揭示了一些未被充分研究的相关性，并与已知趋势总体一致。通过与这项工作一同分享这个新数据集，我们希望生物学家能够根据其选择的准确性/覆盖率权衡点，为自己的研究问题获取见解。

Plants.title: PRC1-mediated H2A.Zub promotes gene expression by preventing H3.1K27me1 incorporation in Arabidopsis
Plants.summary: PcG complexes are pivotal in orchestrating the transition from embryonic to vegetative development in plants. However, the mechanisms underlying the gene expression reprogramming that takes place during this d...
Plants.abstract: PcG complexes are pivotal in orchestrating the transition from embryonic to vegetative development in plants. However, the mechanisms underlying the gene expression reprogramming that takes place during this developmental transition are still not fully understood. Several studies suggest that incorporating PcG modifications into distinct histone variants may play a key role in this process. However, while PRC2-mediated H3K27me3 is essential for gene repression, the timing of PRC2 action on canonical H3.1 or variant H3.3 remains unclear. Furthermore, the exact role of PRC1 in transcriptional regulation is still unresolved, partly owing to limited knowledge of the conditions under which this complex monoubiquitinates canonical H2A or H2A.Z variant. Here, we demonstrate that H2A.Z undergoes monoubiquitination during the seed-to-seedling transition. H2A.Zub facilitates the recruitment of PRC2 to mediate H3.3 trimethylation, repressing seed-specific genes; however, H2A.Zub also promotes the activation of vegetative-specific genes by preventing H3K27me1 incorporation into H3.1. Notably, the histone demethylase REF6 initiates this process by removing two methyl groups from stably repressed H3.1K27me3-marked genes, enabling the subsequent H2A.Zub incorporation. This result suggests that REF6 activity is a critical early step in PRC1-mediated transcriptional activation. Our findings reveal the long-sought mechanism by which PRC1 participates in transcriptional activation. We demonstrate that PRC1-mediated H2A.Zub, acting as a “switcher”, plays a pivotal role in reprogramming active and repressed genes during the transition from embryonic to vegetative development. Moreover, our results provide new insights into the intricate relationship between histone modifications and histone variants in reprogramming and maintaining gene expression patterns.

Plants.title_cn: PRC1介导的H2A.Z单泛素化通过阻止H3.1K27me1掺入促进拟南芥基因表达
Plants.abstract_cn: PcG复合体在植物从胚胎发育到营养生长的转变过程中起着关键的调控作用。然而，在这一发育转变过程中发生的基因表达重编程的潜在机制仍未完全阐明。一些研究表明，将PcG修饰整合到不同的组蛋白变体中可能在此过程中发挥关键作用。然而，尽管PRC2介导的H3K27me3对基因抑制至关重要，但PRC2作用于经典H3.1或变体H3.3的时机仍不清楚。此外，PRC1在转录调控中的确切作用仍未解决，部分原因是由于对该复合体对经典H2A或H2A.Z变体进行单泛素化的条件了解有限。在本研究中，我们证明H2A.Z在种子到幼苗的转变过程中发生单泛素化。H2A.Zub促进PRC2的招募以介导H3.3三甲基化，从而抑制种子特异性基因；然而，H2A.Zub也通过阻止H3K27me1掺入H3.1来促进营养生长特异性基因的激活。值得注意的是，组蛋白去甲基化酶REF6通过从稳定抑制的H3.1K27me3标记基因中去除两个甲基来启动这一过程，从而使随后的H2A.Zub掺入成为可能。这一结果表明REF6活性是PRC1介导的转录激活中的一个关键早期步骤。我们的发现揭示了PRC1参与转录激活的长期寻求的机制。我们证明，PRC1介导的H2A.Zub作为一个“转换器”，在从胚胎发育到营养生长的转变过程中，对激活和抑制基因的重编程发挥着关键作用。此外，我们的结果为组蛋白修饰和组蛋白变体在重编程和维持基因表达模式中的复杂相互关系提供了新的见解。

Development.title: Florigen activation complex forms via multifaceted assembly in Arabidopsis
Development.summary: Nature, Published online: 12 November 2025;doi:10.1038/s41586-025-09704-6In flowering plants, DNA–FD–14-3-3 recruits FT to the florigen activation complex both through DNA–FT interactions and by reducing liquid phase condensation of FD protein, which promotes dimerization, leading to FT recruitment.
Development.abstract: Florigen, encoded by FT genes, is synthesized in leaves and transported to the shoot apical meristem (SAM) to induce flower development1–3. At the SAM, 14-3-3 proteins are proposed to act as receptors for FT protein and to mediate the indirect interaction between FT and the basic leucine zipper (bZIP) transcription factor FD to form the florigen activation complex (FAC) that activates transcription of flowering genes4–6. Here we demonstrate a different mechanism of FAC assembly, diverse functions for the 14-3-3 proteins within the complex, and an unexpected spatiotemporal distribution of the FAC. We show that FT is not recruited by 14-3-3 alone, but that it interacts with the DNA–FD–14-3-3 complex through two interfaces, one of which binds DNA via the unstructured C terminus of FT. We also find that interaction of 14-3-3 proteins with the C terminus of phosphorylated FD reduces liquid phase condensation of the intrinsically disordered FD protein, allowing it to bind DNA, and that the 14-3-3 proteins strengthen DNA binding of FD by promoting dimerization, which ultimately results in the recruitment of FT. Unexpectedly, we also find that after FT movement to the shoot apex, FT and FD are co-transcribed in young floral primordia, forming a boundary with the suppressed bract and allowing formation of the FAC during the first stages of floral development. Our studies propose a new mechanism by which the florigen FT transcriptional complex is formed, and indicate distinct functions for the complex during SAM and floral primordium development. In flowering plants, DNA–FD–14-3-3 recruits FT to the florigen activation complex both through DNA–FT interactions and by reducing liquid phase condensation of FD protein, which promotes dimerization, leading to FT recruitment.

Development.title_cn: 拟南芥中成花素激活复合体通过多途径组装形成
Development.abstract_cn: 成花素（Florigen）由FT基因编码，在叶片中合成后被转运至茎尖分生组织（SAM），以诱导花朵发育1–3。在SAM中，14-3-3蛋白被认为是FT蛋白的受体，并介导FT与碱性亮氨酸拉链（bZIP）转录因子FD之间的间接相互作用，从而形成激活开花基因转录的成花素激活复合体（FAC）4–6。本研究揭示了FAC组装的一种不同机制、复合体中14-3-3蛋白的多种功能以及FAC出乎意料的时空分布。我们发现FT并非单独由14-3-3招募，而是通过两个界面与DNA–FD–14-3-3复合体相互作用，其中一个界面通过FT的非结构化C末端结合DNA。我们还发现，14-3-3蛋白与磷酸化FD的C末端相互作用，可减少内在无序FD蛋白的液相凝聚，使其能够结合DNA；并且14-3-3蛋白通过促进二聚化来增强FD的DNA结合能力，最终导致FT的招募。出乎意料的是，我们还发现，在FT转运至茎尖后，FT和FD在幼花原基中共同转录，与受抑制的苞片形成边界，并允许FAC在花朵发育的最初阶段形成。我们的研究提出了一种成花素FT转录复合体形成的新机制，并揭示了该复合体在SAM和花原基发育过程中的不同功能。在开花植物中，DNA–FD–14-3-3通过DNA–FT相互作用以及减少FD蛋白的液相凝聚（从而促进二聚化）来招募FT进入成花素激活复合体，最终实现FT的招募。

Development.title: Rare genetic variants confer a high risk of ADHD and implicate neuronal biology
Development.summary: Nature, Published online: 12 November 2025;doi:10.1038/s41586-025-09702-8An analysis of rare genetic variants identifies three genes—MAP1A, ANO8 and ANK2—that have a role in attention deficit hyperactivity disorder (ADHD) and investigates the potential underlying biological mechanisms.
Development.abstract: Attention deficit hyperactivity disorder (ADHD) is a childhood-onset neurodevelopmental disorder with a large genetic component1. It affects around 5% of children and 2.5% of adults2, and is associated with several severe outcomes3–11. Common genetic variants associated with the disorder have been identified12,13, but the role of rare variants in ADHD is mostly unknown. Here, by analysing rare coding variants in exome-sequencing data from 8,895 individuals with ADHD and 53,780 control individuals, we identify three genes (MAP1A, ANO8 and ANK2; P < 3.07 × 10−6; odds ratios 5.55–15.13) that are implicated in ADHD. The protein–protein interaction networks of these three genes were enriched for rare-variant risk genes of other neurodevelopmental disorders, and for genes involved in cytoskeleton organization, synapse function and RNA processing. Top associated rare-variant risk genes showed increased expression across pre- and postnatal brain developmental stages and in several neuronal cell types, including GABAergic (γ-aminobutyric-acid-producing) and dopaminergic neurons. Deleterious variants were associated with lower socioeconomic status and lower levels of education in individuals with ADHD, and a decrease of 2.25 intelligence quotient (IQ) points per rare deleterious variant in a sample of adults with ADHD (n = 962). Individuals with ADHD and intellectual disability showed an increased load of rare variants overall, whereas other psychiatric comorbidities had an increased load only for specific gene sets associated with those comorbidities. This suggests that psychiatric comorbidity in ADHD is driven mainly by rare variants in specific genes, rather than by a general increased load across constrained genes. An analysis of rare genetic variants identifies three genes—MAP1A, ANO8 and ANK2—that have a role in attention deficit hyperactivity disorder (ADHD) and investigates the potential underlying biological mechanisms.
Development.authors_short: Demontis, Ditte et al., Børglum, Anders D.
Development.title_cn: 罕见遗传变异赋予注意缺陷多动障碍高风险并揭示神经元生物学机制
Development.abstract_cn: 注意缺陷多动障碍 (ADHD) 是一种儿童期起病的神经发育障碍，具有显著的遗传组分1。它影响约5%的儿童和2.5%的成人2，并与多种严重不良结局相关3–11。尽管与该疾病相关的常见遗传变异已被识别12,13，但罕见变异在ADHD中的作用尚不明确。本研究通过分析来自8,895名ADHD患者和53,780名对照个体的外显子组测序数据中的罕见编码变异，识别出三个与ADHD相关的基因 (MAP1A, ANO8 和 ANK2; P < 3.07 × 10−6; 优势比 5.55–15.13)。这三个基因的蛋白质-蛋白质相互作用网络富集了其他神经发育障碍的罕见变异风险基因，以及参与细胞骨架组织、突触功能和RNA加工的基因。与ADHD最相关的罕见变异风险基因在产前和产后大脑发育阶段以及多种神经元细胞类型（包括GABA能神经元和多巴胺能神经元）中表现出更高的表达。有害变异与ADHD患者较低的社会经济地位和受教育水平相关，并且在ADHD成人样本 (n = 962) 中，每个罕见有害变异导致智商 (IQ) 平均下降2.25分。患有ADHD和智力障碍的个体总体上表现出罕见变异负荷增加，而其他精神共病仅在与这些共病相关的特定基因集中表现出负荷增加。这表明ADHD中的精神共病主要由特定基因中的罕见变异驱动，而非受限基因的普遍负荷增加所致。对罕见遗传变异的分析识别出三个在注意缺陷多动障碍 (ADHD) 中发挥作用的基因——MAP1A、ANO8和ANK2——并探讨了其潜在的生物学机制。

Development.title: Developmentally regulated genes drive phylogenomic splits in ovule evolution
Development.summary: Nature Communications, Published online: 13 November 2025;doi:10.1038/s41467-025-65399-3Making use of phylogenomic and transcriptome analysis of 20 plant species, including 14 gymnosperms, Sondervan et al. uncover candidate ovule genes and find that orthologs with differential tissue expression patterns across species most influence major evolutionary splits of seed plants.
Development.abstract: The evolution of seeds transformed life on earth and is responsible for our most important food crops. Gymnosperms, the oldest living seed plants, are an untapped genomic reservoir for genes involved in seed evolution. To tap this resource, we assemble deep transcriptomes of 14 gymnosperms, four angiosperms, and two ferns and identified 22,429 phylogenetically informative ortholog groups. We observe that genes differentially expressed in ovules or leaves provide the majority of phylogenomic support for the evolutionary splits between 1) seed and non-seed plants; 2) gymnosperms and angiosperms; and/or 3) within gymnosperms (conifers vs. “ancient” gymnosperms). Our gymnosperm data identifies unreported candidate ovule regulated genes in Arabidopsis. Moreover, prior knowledge from Arabidopsis helps uncover 4,076 candidate ovule genes that influence these evolutionary splits. We validate the expression of candidate ovule genes in gymnosperm-specific ovule structures. Our work provides a resource for seed gene discovery, conservation, and crop improvement. Making use of phylogenomic and transcriptome analysis of 20 plant species, including 14 gymnosperms, Sondervan et al. uncover candidate ovule genes and find that orthologs with differential tissue expression patterns across species most influence major evolutionary splits of seed plants.
Development.authors_short: Sondervan, Veronica M. et al., Coruzzi, Gloria M.
Development.title_cn: 发育调控基因驱动胚珠进化中的系统基因组学分化
Development.abstract_cn: 种子的进化改变了地球上的生命，并催生了我们最重要的粮食作物。裸子植物作为现存最古老的种子植物，是种子进化相关基因尚未开发的基因组宝库。为了利用这一资源，我们组装了14种裸子植物、4种被子植物和2种蕨类植物的深度转录组，并鉴定了22,429个具有系统发育信息价值的直系同源基因组。我们发现，在胚珠或叶片中差异表达的基因，为以下进化分化提供了主要的系统基因组学支持：1) 种子植物与非种子植物之间；2) 裸子植物与被子植物之间；和/或 3) 裸子植物内部（针叶树与“古老”裸子植物之间）。我们的裸子植物数据在拟南芥中识别出未曾报道的胚珠调控候选基因。此外，来自拟南芥的现有知识有助于揭示4,076个影响这些进化分化的胚珠候选基因。我们验证了候选胚珠基因在裸子植物特有胚珠结构中的表达。我们的工作为种子基因的发现、保护和作物改良提供了资源。Sondervan等人利用对包括14种裸子植物在内的20种植物物种进行的系统基因组学和转录组分析，揭示了胚珠候选基因，并发现跨物种具有差异组织表达模式的直系同源基因对种子植物的主要进化分化影响最大。

Development.title: Mutual inhibition between EPFL2 and auxin extends the intervals of periodic leaf morphogenesis
Development.summary: Nature Communications, Published online: 13 November 2025;doi:10.1038/s41467-025-65792-yPlant development is characterized by periodic morphogenesis, yet regulatory mechanisms underlying the periodicity remain unknown. Tameshige et al. reveal that bistable cellular status modulates the spatial pattern of periodic leaf morphogenesis.
Development.abstract: Rules behind the spatial arrangement of repetitive modules are key principles of multicellular morphogenesis. In plant shoots, PIN-FORMED 1 (PIN1)-mediated polar auxin transport instructs periodic formation of auxin maxima, which develop into lateral organs or leaf serrations. However, it remains unknown how the intervals of regularly arising auxin maxima are controlled. Here we show that a cysteine rich peptide EPIDERMAL PATTERNING FACTOR-LIKE 2 (EPFL2) dose-dependently determines the intervals of auxin maxima during serration formation in leaf primordia. EPFL2 constitutes a mutually repressive relationship with cellular auxin response, thereby produces bistable states. Based on our computational simulations, we propose that the bistability modulates the periodicity of PIN1-mediated auxin maxima formation. Moreover, EPFL2 ensures precise phyllotactic angles, underscoring the general role of EPFL2 in auxin-mediated shoot patterning. This study illustrates that the intercoupling between EPFL2-auxin bistable module and PIN1-mediated polar auxin transport underpins versatile periodicity in auxin maxima formation during shoot development. Plant development is characterized by periodic morphogenesis, yet regulatory mechanisms underlying the periodicity remain unknown. Tameshige et al. reveal that bistable cellular status modulates the spatial pattern of periodic leaf morphogenesis.
Development.authors_short: Tameshige, Toshiaki et al., Ikeuchi, Momoko
Development.title_cn: EPFL2与生长素的相互抑制延长了周期性叶片形态发生的间隔
Development.abstract_cn: 重复模块的空间排列规律是多细胞形态发生的关键原理。在植物茎尖，PIN-FORMED 1 (PIN1) 介导的极性生长素运输指导生长素最大值的周期性形成，这些最大值随后发育成侧生器官或叶片锯齿。然而，周期性出现的生长素最大值的间隔如何被调控仍不清楚。本研究表明，富含半胱氨酸的肽EPIDERMAL PATTERNING FACTOR-LIKE 2 (EPFL2) 在叶原基锯齿形成过程中，剂量依赖性地决定了生长素最大值的间隔。EPFL2与细胞生长素响应之间存在相互抑制关系，从而产生双稳态。基于我们的计算模拟，我们提出这种双稳态调节了PIN1介导的生长素最大值形成的周期性。此外，EPFL2确保了精确的叶序角，突出了EPFL2在生长素介导的茎尖模式形成中的普遍作用。这项研究阐明了EPFL2-生长素双稳态模块与PIN1介导的极性生长素运输之间的相互耦合，是茎尖发育过程中生长素最大值形成多样化周期性的基础。植物发育以周期性形态发生为特征，但其周期性背后的调控机制仍不清楚。Tameshige 等人揭示了双稳态细胞状态调节了周期性叶片形态发生的空间模式。

Development.title: PRC1-mediated H2A.Zub promotes gene expression by preventing H3.1K27me1 incorporation in Arabidopsis
Development.summary: PcG complexes are pivotal in orchestrating the transition from embryonic to vegetative development in plants. However, the mechanisms underlying the gene expression reprogramming that takes place during this d...
Development.abstract: PcG complexes are pivotal in orchestrating the transition from embryonic to vegetative development in plants. However, the mechanisms underlying the gene expression reprogramming that takes place during this developmental transition are still not fully understood. Several studies suggest that incorporating PcG modifications into distinct histone variants may play a key role in this process. However, while PRC2-mediated H3K27me3 is essential for gene repression, the timing of PRC2 action on canonical H3.1 or variant H3.3 remains unclear. Furthermore, the exact role of PRC1 in transcriptional regulation is still unresolved, partly owing to limited knowledge of the conditions under which this complex monoubiquitinates canonical H2A or H2A.Z variant. Here, we demonstrate that H2A.Z undergoes monoubiquitination during the seed-to-seedling transition. H2A.Zub facilitates the recruitment of PRC2 to mediate H3.3 trimethylation, repressing seed-specific genes; however, H2A.Zub also promotes the activation of vegetative-specific genes by preventing H3K27me1 incorporation into H3.1. Notably, the histone demethylase REF6 initiates this process by removing two methyl groups from stably repressed H3.1K27me3-marked genes, enabling the subsequent H2A.Zub incorporation. This result suggests that REF6 activity is a critical early step in PRC1-mediated transcriptional activation. Our findings reveal the long-sought mechanism by which PRC1 participates in transcriptional activation. We demonstrate that PRC1-mediated H2A.Zub, acting as a “switcher”, plays a pivotal role in reprogramming active and repressed genes during the transition from embryonic to vegetative development. Moreover, our results provide new insights into the intricate relationship between histone modifications and histone variants in reprogramming and maintaining gene expression patterns.
Development.authors_short: Baile, Fernando et al., Calonje, Myriam
Development.title_cn: PRC1介导的H2A.Z单泛素化通过阻止H3.1K27me1掺入促进拟南芥基因表达
Development.abstract_cn: PcG复合体在植物从胚胎发育到营养生长的转变过程中起着关键的调控作用。然而，在这一发育转变过程中发生的基因表达重编程的潜在机制仍未完全阐明。一些研究表明，将PcG修饰整合到不同的组蛋白变体中可能在此过程中发挥关键作用。然而，尽管PRC2介导的H3K27me3对基因抑制至关重要，但PRC2作用于经典H3.1或变体H3.3的时机仍不清楚。此外，PRC1在转录调控中的确切作用仍未解决，部分原因是由于对该复合体对经典H2A或H2A.Z变体进行单泛素化的条件了解有限。在本研究中，我们证明H2A.Z在种子到幼苗的转变过程中发生单泛素化。H2A.Zub促进PRC2的招募以介导H3.3三甲基化，从而抑制种子特异性基因；然而，H2A.Zub也通过阻止H3K27me1掺入H3.1来促进营养生长特异性基因的激活。值得注意的是，组蛋白去甲基化酶REF6通过从稳定抑制的H3.1K27me3标记基因中去除两个甲基来启动这一过程，从而使随后的H2A.Zub掺入成为可能。这一结果表明REF6活性是PRC1介导的转录激活中的一个关键早期步骤。我们的发现揭示了PRC1参与转录激活的长期寻求的机制。我们证明，PRC1介导的H2A.Zub作为一个“转换器”，在从胚胎发育到营养生长的转变过程中，对激活和抑制基因的重编程发挥着关键作用。此外，我们的结果为组蛋白修饰和组蛋白变体在重编程和维持基因表达模式中的复杂相互关系提供了新的见解。

Bioengineering.title: Synthesis of enantioenriched atropisomers by biocatalytic deracemization
Bioengineering.summary: Nature, Published online: 12 November 2025;doi:10.1038/s41586-025-09738-wA new method for deracemization of atropisomers is described which leverages a P450 enzyme-mediated process involving bond rotation for enantioenrichment.
Bioengineering.abstract: The synthesis of enantiopure materials is vital for pharmaceutical and agrochemical industries owing to the inherently chiral nature of biological systems and the fact that two enantiomers can have markedly different biochemical properties1. In particular, enantioselective preparation of atropisomers is of great interest owing to their privileged status as chiral ligands and pharmacophores2–4. Although chromatographic- or crystallization-based methods are commonly used to separate atropisomers, we urgently need more efficient and economical approaches to access enantioenriched atropisomers5,6. The use of stereoconvergent methods to access molecules with point chirality is well established but we have not tapped the potential of stereoconvergent catalytic methods to arrive at enantioenriched atropisomers. Here we report deracemization activity of a P450 enzyme and explore its ability to deliver a stereoconvergent route towards enantioenriched atropisomers. Using a curated set of P450 variants, we found that a wide variety of symmetric and non-symmetrically substituted 2,2′-binaphthol (BINOL) building blocks can be deracemized to high enantiomeric purity. This deracemization activity is mechanistically distinct from the activity of previously reported P450 enzymes, which operate through enantioselective bond formation to afford enantioenriched atropisomers. By contrast, the deracemization process reported here is proposed to proceed through bond rotation. As engineered variants have complementary selectivity profiles and substrate scope, this biocatalytic platform should be readily tunable for any desired substitution pattern. We anticipate that these results will inspire new stereoconvergent approaches to synthesizing conformationally stable atropisomers. A new method for deracemization of atropisomers is described which leverages a P450 enzyme-mediated process involving bond rotation for enantioenrichment.
Bioengineering.authors_short: Roos, Casey B. et al., Narayan, Alison R. H.
Bioengineering.title_cn: 通过生物催化消旋化合成富对映体阻转异构体
Bioengineering.abstract_cn: 对映体纯材料的合成对于制药和农化工业至关重要，因为生物系统本质上是手性的，并且两种对映体可能具有显著不同的生化性质1。特别是，阻转异构体的对映选择性制备备受关注，因为它们作为手性配体和药效团具有特殊地位2-4。尽管色谱法或结晶法常用于分离阻转异构体，但我们迫切需要更高效、更经济的方法来获得富对映体阻转异构体5,6。利用立体会聚方法获得具有点手性分子已得到充分证实，但我们尚未充分发掘立体会聚催化方法在制备富对映体阻转异构体方面的潜力。在此，我们报道了一种P450酶的消旋化活性，并探索了其提供立体会聚途径以获得富对映体阻转异构体的能力。通过使用一组经过筛选的P450变体，我们发现多种对称和非对称取代的2,2′-联萘酚（BINOL）结构单元可以被消旋化，从而达到高对映体纯度。这种消旋化活性在机制上不同于先前报道的P450酶的活性，后者通过对映选择性键形成来提供富对映体阻转异构体。相比之下，本文报道的消旋化过程被认为是通过键旋转进行的。由于工程化变体具有互补的选择性谱和底物范围，因此该生物催化平台应能针对任何所需的取代模式进行轻松调节。我们预计这些结果将启发新的立体会聚方法来合成构象稳定的阻转异构体。本文描述了一种阻转异构体消旋化的新方法，该方法利用P450酶介导的涉及键旋转的过程来实现对映体富集。

Bioengineering.title: Isotropic, aberration-corrected light sheet microscopy for rapid high-resolution imaging of cleared tissue
Bioengineering.summary: Nature Biotechnology, Published online: 13 November 2025;doi:10.1038/s41587-025-02882-8A light-sheet microscope built from off-the-shelf components enables high-resolution clear tissue imaging.
Bioengineering.abstract: Light-sheet microscopy is ideal for imaging large and cleared tissues, but achieving a high isotropic resolution for a centimeter-sized sample is limited by slow and often aberrated, axially scanned light sheets. Here, we introduce a compact, high-speed light-sheet fluorescence microscope achieving 850 nm isotropic resolution across cleared samples up to 1 cm³ and refractive indices ranging from 1.33 to 1.56. Using off-the-shelf optics, we combine an air objective and a meniscus lens with an axially swept light sheet to achieve diffraction-limited resolution and aberration correction. The effective field of view is increased by twofold by correcting the field curvature of the light sheet using a concave mirror in the remote focusing unit. Adapting the light sheet’s motion with a closed-loop feedback enhances the imaging speed by tenfold, reaching 100 frames per second while maintaining resolution and field of view. We benchmark the system performance across scales, from subcellular structure up to centimeter scale, using various clearing methods. A light-sheet microscope built from off-the-shelf components enables high-resolution clear tissue imaging.
Bioengineering.authors_short: Aakhte, Mostafa et al., Huisken, Jan
Bioengineering.title_cn: 用于透明化组织快速高分辨率成像的各向同性像差校正光片显微镜
Bioengineering.abstract_cn: 光片显微镜是成像大型透明化组织的理想选择，但对于厘米级样本实现高各向同性分辨率，受限于缓慢且常伴有像差的轴向扫描光片。在此，我们介绍了一种紧凑型高速光片荧光显微镜，它能在高达1立方厘米、折射率范围为1.33至1.56的透明化样本中实现850纳米的各向同性分辨率。通过使用市售光学元件，我们将空气物镜和弯月透镜与轴向扫描光片相结合，实现了衍射极限分辨率和像差校正。通过在远程聚焦单元中使用凹面镜校正光片的场曲，有效视场增加了两倍。通过闭环反馈调整光片的运动，成像速度提高了十倍，达到每秒100帧，同时保持了分辨率和视场。我们使用多种透明化方法，对该系统从亚细胞结构到厘米尺度的性能进行了基准测试。这种由市售组件构建的光片显微镜能够实现高分辨率的透明组织成像。

Bioengineering.title: Proteomic sensors for quantitative multiplexed and spatial monitoring of kinase signaling
Bioengineering.summary: Nature Communications, Published online: 13 November 2025;doi:10.1038/s41467-025-65950-2Understanding kinase action requires precise quantitative and spatial measurements of their activity in vivo. Here the authors develop a proteomic kinase activity sensor technique (ProKAS) enabling multiplexed spatial, kinetic, and screening analyses of kinase activities via mass spectrometry.
Bioengineering.abstract: Understanding kinase action requires precise quantitative measurements of their activity in vivo. In addition, the ability to capture spatial information of kinase activity is crucial to deconvolute complex signaling networks, interrogate multifaceted kinase actions, and assess drug effects or genetic perturbations. Here we develop a proteomic kinase activity sensor technique (ProKAS) for the analysis of kinase signaling using mass spectrometry. ProKAS is based on a tandem array of peptide sensors with amino acid barcodes that allow multiplexed analysis for spatial, kinetic, and screening applications. We engineered a ProKAS module to simultaneously monitor the activities of the DNA damage response kinases ATR, ATM, and CHK1 in response to genotoxic drugs, while also uncovering differences between these signaling responses in the nucleus, cytosol, and replication factories. Furthermore, we developed an in silico approach for the rational design of specific substrate peptides expandable to other kinases. Overall, ProKAS is a versatile system for systematically and spatially probing kinase action in cells. Understanding kinase action requires precise quantitative and spatial measurements of their activity in vivo. Here the authors develop a proteomic kinase activity sensor technique (ProKAS) enabling multiplexed spatial, kinetic, and screening analyses of kinase activities via mass spectrometry.
Bioengineering.authors_short: Comstock, William J. et al., Smolka, Marcus B.
Bioengineering.title_cn: 蛋白质组学传感器用于激酶信号传导的定量、多重和空间监测
Bioengineering.abstract_cn: 理解激酶的作用需要对其体内活性进行精确的定量测量。此外，捕获激酶活性的空间信息对于解析复杂的信号网络、探究多方面的激酶作用以及评估药物效应或基因扰动至关重要。在本文中，我们开发了一种基于质谱的蛋白质组学激酶活性传感器技术（ProKAS），用于分析激酶信号传导。ProKAS基于带有氨基酸条形码的串联肽传感器阵列，可实现空间、动力学和筛选应用的多重分析。我们设计了一个ProKAS模块，用于同时监测DNA损伤响应激酶ATR、ATM和CHK1在基因毒性药物作用下的活性，并揭示了这些信号响应在细胞核、细胞质和复制工厂之间的差异。此外，我们开发了一种计算方法（in silico approach），用于合理设计可扩展至其他激酶的特异性底物肽。总之，ProKAS是一个多功能系统，可用于系统性地、空间性地探测细胞中的激酶作用。理解激酶的作用需要对其体内活性进行精确的定量和空间测量。本文中，作者开发了一种蛋白质组学激酶活性传感器技术（ProKAS），该技术能够通过质谱实现激酶活性的多重空间、动力学和筛选分析。

Bioengineering.title: Human organoids as 3D in vitro platforms for drug discovery: opportunities and challenges
Bioengineering.summary: Nature Reviews Drug Discovery, Published online: 12 November 2025;doi:10.1038/s41573-025-01317-yHuman organoids provide physiologically relevant, 3D models for studying disease mechanisms, drug efficacy and toxicity. This Review examines organoid generation methods, applications in preclinical drug discovery, and the regulatory and practical challenges that must be addressed for their integration into development pipelines.
Bioengineering.abstract: Organoids are 3D structures derived from stem cells that recapitulate key architectural and functional aspects of the corresponding tissue. Compared with conventional 2D cell lines, human organoids provide experimental models that more closely reflect human physiology. Their ability to capture the complexity and heterogeneity of human tissues enables the study of disease mechanisms, drug efficacy and toxicity. When generated from patient material, organoids also allow the assessment of individual drug responses. In this Review, we explore the utility of organoids in drug discovery. We outline current methodologies for generating and maintaining organoids, examine their applications in disease modelling, drug screening and safety evaluation, and consider regulatory aspects and the challenges for their broader adoption in drug discovery. Human organoids provide physiologically relevant, 3D models for studying disease mechanisms, drug efficacy and toxicity. This Review examines organoid generation methods, applications in preclinical drug discovery, and the regulatory and practical challenges that must be addressed for their integration into development pipelines.
Bioengineering.authors_short: Wang, Daisong et al., Clevers, Hans
Bioengineering.title_cn: 人体类器官作为药物发现的三维体外平台：机遇与挑战
Bioengineering.abstract_cn: 类器官是源自干细胞的三维结构，能够重现相应组织的关键结构和功能特征。与传统的二维细胞系相比，人体类器官提供了更接近人体生理学的实验模型。它们能够捕捉人体组织的复杂性和异质性，从而有助于疾病机制、药物疗效和毒性的研究。当从患者材料中生成时，类器官还允许评估个体药物反应。在本综述中，我们探讨了类器官在药物发现中的应用价值。我们概述了类器官生成和维持的当前方法，审视了它们在疾病建模、药物筛选和安全性评估中的应用，并考虑了监管方面以及它们在药物发现中更广泛应用所面临的挑战。人体类器官为研究疾病机制、药物疗效和毒性提供了生理学相关的三维模型。本综述考察了类器官的生成方法、在临床前药物发现中的应用，以及为将其整合到开发流程中必须解决的监管和实践挑战。

Bioengineering.title: MISO: microfluidic protein isolation enables single-particle cryo-EM structure determination from a single cell colony
Bioengineering.summary: Nature Methods, Published online: 13 November 2025;doi:10.1038/s41592-025-02894-xThe micro isolation (MISO) method combines microfluidics-based protein purification with cryo-EM grid preparation, enabling cryo-EM structure determination of soluble and membrane proteins starting from less than 1 µg of a target protein.
