Bioengineering.abstract: Single-particle cryogenic electron microscopy (cryo-EM) enables reconstruction of atomic-resolution 3D maps of proteins by visualizing thousands to millions of purified protein particles embedded in vitreous ice. This corresponds to picograms of purified protein, which can potentially be isolated from a few thousand cells. Hence, cryo-EM holds the potential of a very sensitive analytical method for delivering high-resolution protein structure as a readout. In practice, millions of times more starting biological material is required to prepare cryo-EM grids. Here we show that using a micro isolation (MISO) method, which combines microfluidics-based protein purification with cryo-EM grid preparation, cryo-EM structures of soluble bacterial and eukaryotic membrane proteins can be solved starting from less than 1 µg of a target protein and progressing from cells to cryo-EM grids within a few hours. This scales down the amount of starting biological material hundreds to thousands of times, opening possibilities for the structural characterization of hitherto inaccessible proteins. The micro isolation (MISO) method combines microfluidics-based protein purification with cryo-EM grid preparation, enabling cryo-EM structure determination of soluble and membrane proteins starting from less than 1 µg of a target protein.
Bioengineering.authors_short: Eluru, Gangadhar et al., Efremov, Rouslan G.
Bioengineering.title_cn: MISO：微流控蛋白分离助力单细胞集落的单颗粒冷冻电镜结构测定
Bioengineering.abstract_cn: 单颗粒冷冻电子显微镜（cryo-EM）通过观察包埋在玻璃态冰中的数千至数百万个纯化蛋白质颗粒，能够重建蛋白质的原子分辨率三维结构图。这相当于皮克级的纯化蛋白质，理论上可以从数千个细胞中分离得到。因此，cryo-EM 有潜力成为一种非常灵敏的分析方法，以高分辨率蛋白质结构作为输出。然而，在实际操作中，制备 cryo-EM 样品网格需要多达数百万倍的起始生物材料。本文展示了一种微分离（MISO）方法，该方法结合了基于微流控的蛋白质纯化与 cryo-EM 样品网格制备，能够从少于 1 微克的靶蛋白开始，并在数小时内从细胞到 cryo-EM 样品网格，解析可溶性细菌和真核膜蛋白的 cryo-EM 结构。这使得起始生物材料的用量减少了数百至数千倍，为迄今难以获得的蛋白质的结构表征开辟了可能性。微分离（MISO）方法结合了基于微流控的蛋白质纯化与 cryo-EM 样品网格制备，使得从少于 1 微克的靶蛋白开始即可进行可溶性蛋白和膜蛋白的 cryo-EM 结构测定。

Bioengineering.title: Confocal Airy beam oblique light-sheet tomography for brain-wide cell type distribution and morphology
Bioengineering.summary: Nature Methods, Published online: 13 November 2025;doi:10.1038/s41592-025-02888-9Confocal Airy beam integrated with single-photon oblique light-sheet tomography (CAB-OLST) is a high-throughput imaging approach for brain-wide mapping of neurons, as demonstrated in cleared mouse brains.
Bioengineering.abstract: Advanced brain-wide mapping is critical for addressing complex questions in neuroscience. However, current imaging methods are limited by throughput, resolution and signal-to-noise ratio, constraining their broader applicability. Here, we present confocal Airy beam integrated with single-photon oblique light-sheet tomography (CAB-OLST): a system that integrates single-photon excitation with a scanned Airy beam light sheet, virtual slit detection and automated mechanical sectioning. CAB-OLST enables high-throughput, high-resolution and high-signal-to-noise ratio volumetric imaging, achieving an optical resolution of 0.77 μm × 0.49 μm × 2.61 μm. This allows for mouse brain-wide cell type distribution mapping at a voxel size of 0.37 μm × 0.37 μm × 1.77 μm in 10 h and single-neuron projectome imaging with a voxel size of 0.26 μm × 0.26 μm × 1.06 μm over 58 h. Compared to existing light-sheet and point-scanning systems, CAB-OLST provides a scalable and robust platform for comprehensive neuronal morphology reconstruction and high-precision cell atlas generation. Confocal Airy beam integrated with single-photon oblique light-sheet tomography (CAB-OLST) is a high-throughput imaging approach for brain-wide mapping of neurons, as demonstrated in cleared mouse brains.
Bioengineering.authors_short: Qi, Xiaoli et al., Osten, Pavel
Bioengineering.title_cn: 共聚焦艾里光束斜光片断层成像技术用于全脑细胞类型分布和形态学研究
Bioengineering.abstract_cn: 先进的全脑图谱绘制对于解决神经科学中的复杂问题至关重要。然而，当前的成像方法在通量、分辨率和信噪比方面存在局限性，限制了其更广泛的应用。在此，我们提出了一种结合了共聚焦艾里光束和单光子斜光片断层成像技术（CAB-OLST）的系统：该系统集成了单光子激发、扫描艾里光束光片、虚拟狭缝检测和自动化机械切片。CAB-OLST 实现了高通量、高分辨率和高信噪比的体积成像，光学分辨率达到 0.77 μm × 0.49 μm × 2.61 μm。这使得在10小时内以0.37 μm × 0.37 μm × 1.77 μm的体素尺寸绘制小鼠全脑细胞类型分布图成为可能，并在58小时内以0.26 μm × 0.26 μm × 1.06 μm的体素尺寸进行单神经元投射组成像。与现有的光片和点扫描系统相比，CAB-OLST 为全面的神经元形态重建和高精度细胞图谱生成提供了一个可扩展且稳健的平台。共聚焦艾里光束结合单光子斜光片断层成像技术（CAB-OLST）是一种高通量成像方法，用于神经元的全脑图谱绘制，已在透明化小鼠大脑中得到验证。

Evolution.title: An ancient recombination desert is a speciation supergene in placental mammals
Evolution.summary: Nature, Published online: 12 November 2025;doi:10.1038/s41586-025-09740-2Deep learning methods identified a large and evolutionarily conserved X-linked low recombination region in placental mammals that serves as both a barrier to gene flow in hybridizing lineages and an accurate phylogenomic marker.
Evolution.abstract: Gene flow between biological species is a common and often adaptive evolutionary phenomenon throughout the tree of life1–4. Given the pervasive nature of genetic exchange, a daunting challenge is how best to infer the correct relationships between species from the complex collection of histories arrayed across genomes5. The local rate of meiotic recombination influences the distribution of signatures of, and barriers to, gene flow during the early stages of speciation6. Still, a broader understanding of this relationship and its application to accurately discerning phylogeny is lacking due to a scarcity of recombination maps. Here we applied deep learning methods to genome alignments from 22 divergent placental mammal species to infer the evolution of the recombination landscape. We identified a large and evolutionarily conserved X-linked recombination desert constituting 30% of the chromosome. Recombination-aware phylogenomic analyses from 94 species revealed that the X-linked recombination desert is an ancient and recurrent barrier to gene flow and retains the species history when introgression dominates genome-wide ancestry. The functional basis for this supergene is manifold, enriched with genes that influence sex chromosome silencing and reproduction traits. Because the locus underpins reproductive isolation across ordinal lineages, it may represent a reliable marker for resolving challenging relationships across the mammalian phylogeny. Deep learning methods identified a large and evolutionarily conserved X-linked low recombination region in placental mammals that serves as both a barrier to gene flow in hybridizing lineages and an accurate phylogenomic marker.
Evolution.authors_short: Foley, Nicole M. et al., Murphy, William J.
Evolution.title_cn: 胎盘哺乳动物中一个古老的重组荒漠是物种形成的超级基因
Evolution.abstract_cn: 生物物种间的基因流是生命之树中普遍存在的、且通常具有适应性的进化现象1–4。鉴于遗传交换的普遍性，一个艰巨的挑战是如何从基因组中复杂的历史集合中，最佳地推断物种间的正确关系5。减数分裂重组的局部速率影响着物种形成早期基因流的特征分布及其屏障6。然而，由于重组图谱的稀缺，对这种关系及其在准确识别系统发育中的应用仍缺乏更广泛的理解。本研究中，我们应用深度学习方法分析了来自22种不同胎盘哺乳动物的基因组比对数据，以推断重组图景的演化。我们识别出一个大型且进化上保守的X染色体连锁重组荒漠，其构成了该染色体的30%。对94个物种进行的重组感知系统基因组分析揭示，该X染色体连锁重组荒漠是一个古老且反复出现的基因流屏障，并在基因渗入主导全基因组祖先时保留了物种历史。这个超级基因的功能基础是多方面的，富含影响性染色体沉默和生殖性状的基因。由于该基因座支撑着跨目谱系的生殖隔离，它可能代表了一个可靠的标记，用于解决哺乳动物系统发育中具有挑战性的关系。深度学习方法在胎盘哺乳动物中识别出一个大型且进化上保守的X染色体连锁低重组区域，该区域既是杂交谱系中基因流的屏障，也是一个准确的系统基因组标记。

Evolution.title: Convergent genome evolution shaped the emergence of terrestrial animals
Evolution.summary: Nature, Published online: 12 November 2025;doi:10.1038/s41586-025-09722-4Comparisons of 154 genomes from 21 animal phyla and outgroups have been used to reconstruct ancestral adaptation to life on land across 11 distinct terrestrialization events, revealing strong evidence for convergent genomic evolution across the animal kingdom and recurring periods of terrestrial colonization.
Evolution.abstract: The challenges associated with the transition of life from water to land are profound1, yet they have been met in many distinct animal lineages2–5. These constitute a series of independent evolutionary experiments from which we can decipher the role of contingency versus convergence in the adaptation of animal genomes. Here we compare 154 genomes from 21 animal phyla and their outgroups to reconstruct the protein-coding content of the ancestral genomes linked to 11 animal terrestrialization events, and to produce a timescale of terrestrialization. We uncover distinct patterns of gene gain and loss underlying each transition to land, but similar biological functions emerged recurrently pointing to specific adaptations as key to life on land. We show that semi-terrestrial species evolved convergent functional patterns, in contrast with fully terrestrial lineages that followed different paths to land. Our timeline supports three temporal windows of land colonization by animals during the last 487 million years, each associated with specific ecological contexts. Although each lineage exhibits distinct adaptations, there is strong evidence of convergent genome evolution across the animal kingdom suggesting that, in large part, adaptation to life on land is predictable, linking genes to ecosystems. Comparisons of 154 genomes from 21 animal phyla and outgroups have been used to reconstruct ancestral adaptation to life on land across 11 distinct terrestrialization events, revealing strong evidence for convergent genomic evolution across the animal kingdom and recurring periods of terrestrial colonization.
Evolution.authors_short: Wei, Jialin et al., Paps, Jordi
Evolution.title_cn: 趋同基因组演化塑造了陆生动物的起源
Evolution.abstract_cn: 生命从水生到陆生的转变面临着巨大的挑战1，然而，许多不同的动物谱系2–5都成功应对了这些挑战。这些构成了系列独立的演化实验，从中我们可以解读动物基因组适应过程中偶然性与趋同性的作用。本研究比较了来自21个动物门及其外群的154个基因组，以重建与11次动物陆生化事件相关的祖先基因组的蛋白质编码内容，并绘制了陆生化的时间线。我们揭示了每次陆生转变背后基因获得和丢失的不同模式，但相似的生物学功能反复出现，表明特定的适应是陆生生活的关键。我们发现半陆生物种演化出了趋同的功能模式，而完全陆生谱系则遵循了不同的陆生路径。我们的时间线支持在过去4.87亿年间动物陆地定居的三个时间窗口，每个窗口都与特定的生态环境相关。尽管每个谱系都表现出独特的适应性，但动物界普遍存在趋同基因组演化的有力证据，这表明陆生生活的适应在很大程度上是可预测的，将基因与生态系统联系起来。通过比较来自21个动物门及其外群的154个基因组，本研究重建了11次不同陆生化事件中祖先对陆生生活的适应，揭示了动物界趋同基因组演化的有力证据以及陆地定居的反复时期。

Evolution.title: Developmentally regulated genes drive phylogenomic splits in ovule evolution
Evolution.summary: Nature Communications, Published online: 13 November 2025;doi:10.1038/s41467-025-65399-3Making use of phylogenomic and transcriptome analysis of 20 plant species, including 14 gymnosperms, Sondervan et al. uncover candidate ovule genes and find that orthologs with differential tissue expression patterns across species most influence major evolutionary splits of seed plants.
Evolution.abstract: The evolution of seeds transformed life on earth and is responsible for our most important food crops. Gymnosperms, the oldest living seed plants, are an untapped genomic reservoir for genes involved in seed evolution. To tap this resource, we assemble deep transcriptomes of 14 gymnosperms, four angiosperms, and two ferns and identified 22,429 phylogenetically informative ortholog groups. We observe that genes differentially expressed in ovules or leaves provide the majority of phylogenomic support for the evolutionary splits between 1) seed and non-seed plants; 2) gymnosperms and angiosperms; and/or 3) within gymnosperms (conifers vs. “ancient” gymnosperms). Our gymnosperm data identifies unreported candidate ovule regulated genes in Arabidopsis. Moreover, prior knowledge from Arabidopsis helps uncover 4,076 candidate ovule genes that influence these evolutionary splits. We validate the expression of candidate ovule genes in gymnosperm-specific ovule structures. Our work provides a resource for seed gene discovery, conservation, and crop improvement. Making use of phylogenomic and transcriptome analysis of 20 plant species, including 14 gymnosperms, Sondervan et al. uncover candidate ovule genes and find that orthologs with differential tissue expression patterns across species most influence major evolutionary splits of seed plants.
Evolution.authors_short: Sondervan, Veronica M. et al., Coruzzi, Gloria M.
Evolution.title_cn: 发育调控基因驱动胚珠进化中的系统基因组学分化
Evolution.abstract_cn: 种子的进化改变了地球上的生命，并催生了我们最重要的粮食作物。裸子植物作为现存最古老的种子植物，是种子进化相关基因尚未开发的基因组宝库。为了利用这一资源，我们组装了14种裸子植物、4种被子植物和2种蕨类植物的深度转录组，并鉴定了22,429个具有系统发育信息价值的直系同源基因组。我们发现，在胚珠或叶片中差异表达的基因，为以下进化分化提供了主要的系统基因组学支持：1) 种子植物与非种子植物之间；2) 裸子植物与被子植物之间；和/或 3) 裸子植物内部（针叶树与“古老”裸子植物之间）。我们的裸子植物数据在拟南芥中识别出未曾报道的胚珠调控候选基因。此外，来自拟南芥的现有知识有助于揭示4,076个影响这些进化分化的胚珠候选基因。我们验证了候选胚珠基因在裸子植物特有胚珠结构中的表达。我们的工作为种子基因的发现、保护和作物改良提供了资源。Sondervan等人利用对包括14种裸子植物在内的20种植物物种进行的系统基因组学和转录组分析，揭示了胚珠候选基因，并发现跨物种具有差异组织表达模式的直系同源基因对种子植物的主要进化分化影响最大。

Metabolism.title: Cytosolic acetyl-coenzyme A is a signalling metabolite to control mitophagy
Metabolism.summary: Nature, Published online: 12 November 2025;doi:10.1038/s41586-025-09745-xAcetyl-coenzyme A functions as a non-canonical signal to trigger mitophagy, and the acetyl-coenzyme A–NLRX1 axis underlies the KRAS-inhibitor-induced mitophagy response and promotes drug resistance, providing a metabolic mechanism of KRAS inhibitor resistance.
Metabolism.abstract: Acetyl-coenzyme A (AcCoA) sits at the nexus of nutrient metabolism and shuttles between the canonical and non-canonical tricarboxylic acid cycle1,2, which is dynamically regulated by nutritional status, such as fasting3. Here we find that mitophagy is triggered after a reduction in cytosolic AcCoA levels through short-term fasting and through inhibition of ATP-citrate lyase (encoded by ACLY), mitochondrial citrate/malate antiporter (encoded by SLC25A1) or acyl-CoA synthetase short chain family member 2 (encoded by ACSS2), and the mitophagy can be counteracted by acetate supplementation. Notably, NOD-like receptor (NLR) family member X1 (NLRX1) mediates this effect. Disrupting NLRX1 abolishes cytosolic AcCoA reduction-induced mitophagy both in vitro and in vivo. Mechanically, the mitochondria outer-membrane-localized NLRX1 directly binds to cytosolic AcCoA within a conserved pocket on its leucine-rich repeat (LRR) domain. Moreover, AcCoA binds to the LRR domain and enhances its interaction with the nucleotide-binding and oligomerization (NACHT) domain, which helps to maintain NLRX1 in an autoinhibited state and prevents the association between NLRX1 and light chain 3 (LC3). Furthermore, we find that the AcCoA–NLRX1 axis underlies the KRAS-inhibitor-induced mitophagy response and promotes drug resistance, providing a metabolic mechanism of KRAS inhibitor resistance. Thus, cytosolic AcCoA is a signalling metabolite that connects metabolism to mitophagy through its receptor NLRX1. Acetyl-coenzyme A functions as a non-canonical signal to trigger mitophagy, and the acetyl-coenzyme A–NLRX1 axis underlies the KRAS-inhibitor-induced mitophagy response and promotes drug resistance, providing a metabolic mechanism of KRAS inhibitor resistance.
Metabolism.authors_short: Zhang, Yifan et al., Lei, Qun-Ying
Metabolism.title_cn: 胞质乙酰辅酶A作为信号代谢物调控线粒体自噬
Metabolism.abstract_cn: 乙酰辅酶A (AcCoA) 位于营养代谢的枢纽，并在经典和非经典三羧酸循环之间穿梭1,2，其动态受营养状态（如禁食3）的调控。本研究发现，通过短期禁食以及抑制ATP-柠檬酸裂解酶 (由ACLY编码)、线粒体柠檬酸/苹果酸逆向转运蛋白 (由SLC25A1编码) 或短链酰基辅酶A合成酶家族成员2 (由ACSS2编码)，胞质AcCoA水平降低后会触发线粒体自噬，且这种自噬可通过补充乙酸盐来逆转。值得注意的是，NOD样受体 (NLR) 家族成员X1 (NLRX1) 介导了这一效应。在体外和体内实验中，NLRX1的破坏均能消除胞质AcCoA降低诱导的线粒体自噬。机制上，定位于线粒体外膜的NLRX1通过其富含亮氨酸重复序列 (LRR) 结构域上的一个保守口袋直接结合胞质AcCoA。此外，AcCoA结合LRR结构域并增强其与核苷酸结合和寡聚化 (NACHT) 结构域的相互作用，这有助于维持NLRX1的自抑制状态，并阻止NLRX1与轻链3 (LC3) 的结合。进一步地，我们发现AcCoA–NLRX1轴是KRAS抑制剂诱导的线粒体自噬反应的基础，并促进了耐药性，从而揭示了KRAS抑制剂耐药性的一种代谢机制。因此，胞质AcCoA是一种通过其受体NLRX1将代谢与线粒体自噬连接起来的信号代谢物。综上所述，乙酰辅酶A作为一种非经典信号触发线粒体自噬，而乙酰辅酶A–NLRX1轴则构成了KRAS抑制剂诱导的线粒体自噬反应并促进耐药性的代谢机制。

Metabolism.title: Viral NblA proteins negatively affect oceanic cyanobacterial photosynthesis
Metabolism.summary: Nature, Published online: 12 November 2025;doi:10.1038/s41586-025-09656-xViral NblA accelerates the cyanophage infection cycle, directs degradation of the host phycobilisome and other proteins, and reduces host photosynthetic light-harvesting efficiency.
Metabolism.abstract: Marine picocyanobacteria are abundant photosynthetic organisms of global importance. They coexist in the ocean with cyanophages—viruses that infect cyanobacteria. Cyanophages carry many auxiliary metabolic genes acquired from their hosts that are thought to redirect host metabolism for the phage’s benefit1–5. One such gene is nblA, which is present in multiple cyanophage families2,6–8. Under nutrient deprivation cyanobacterial NblA is responsible for inducing proteolytic degradation of the phycobilisome9–11, the large cyanobacterial photosynthetic light-harvesting complex. This increases the pool of amino acids available for essential tasks11, serving as a survival mechanism12. Ectopic expression of different cyanophage nblA genes results in host pigment protein degradation6,8,13. However, the benefit of the virus-encoded NblA for cyanophages and the broader impact on the host are unclear. Here, using a recently developed genetic manipulation system for marine cyanophages14, we reveal that viral NblA significantly accelerates the cyanophage infection cycle, directs degradation of the host phycobilisome and other proteins, and reduces host photosynthetic light-harvesting efficiency. Metagenomic analysis revealed that cyanophages carrying nblA are widespread in the oceans and comprise 35% and 65% of oceanic T7-like cyanophages in surface and deep photic zones, respectively. Our results show a large benefit of NblA to the cyanophage, while it exerts a negative effect on the host photosynthetic apparatus and host photosynthesis. These findings suggest that cyanophage NblA has an adverse global impact on light harvesting by oceanic picocyanobacteria. Viral NblA accelerates the cyanophage infection cycle, directs degradation of the host phycobilisome and other proteins, and reduces host photosynthetic light-harvesting efficiency.
Metabolism.authors_short: Nadel, Omer et al., Lindell, Debbie
Metabolism.title_cn: 病毒NblA蛋白负面影响海洋蓝细菌光合作用
Metabolism.abstract_cn:
海洋微型蓝细菌是全球重要的光合生物。它们与感染蓝细菌的噬蓝细菌病毒（cyanophages）共存于海洋中。噬蓝细菌病毒携带许多从宿主处获得的辅助代谢基因，这些基因被认为能重定向宿主代谢以利于病毒自身1–5。nblA是其中一个基因，它存在于多个噬蓝细菌病毒家族中2,6–8。在营养匮乏条件下，蓝细菌的NblA负责诱导藻胆体（大型蓝细菌光合捕光复合物）的蛋白水解降解9–11。这增加了可用于基本任务的氨基酸库11，作为一种生存机制12。不同噬蓝细菌病毒nblA基因的异位表达会导致宿主色素蛋白降解6,8,13。然而，病毒编码的NblA对噬蓝细菌病毒的益处以及对宿主的更广泛影响尚不清楚。

本研究利用最近开发的海洋噬蓝细菌病毒基因操作系统14，揭示了病毒NblA显著加速了噬蓝细菌病毒感染周期，引导宿主藻胆体及其他蛋白质的降解，并降低了宿主光合捕光效率。宏基因组分析显示，携带nblA的噬蓝细菌病毒在海洋中广泛分布，分别占表层和深层透光区海洋T7样噬蓝细菌病毒的35%和65%。我们的结果表明，NblA对噬蓝细菌病毒有显著益处，同时对宿主光合作用装置和宿主光合作用产生负面影响。这些发现提示，噬蓝细菌病毒NblA对海洋微型蓝细菌的光捕获具有不利的全球性影响。病毒NblA通过加速噬蓝细菌病毒感染周期、引导宿主藻胆体及其他蛋白质降解，并降低宿主光合捕光效率来发挥作用。

Metabolism.title: Iron absorption and loss, and efficacy of iron supplementation with and without prebiotics in children with virally suppressed HIV: three prospective studies in South Africa
Metabolism.summary: Nature Communications, Published online: 13 November 2025;doi:10.1038/s41467-025-64998-4Children living with HIV face a heightened risk of iron deficiency, yet optimal prevention and treatment strategies remain elusive. In these three prospective studies in South African children living with HIV, the authors show reduced dietary iron absorption but adequate absorption from iron supplements. Prebiotics may enhance efficacy and safety of oral iron supplementation in iron-deficient children living with HIV.
Metabolism.abstract: Children living with HIV are at risk for iron deficiency, yet optimal strategies for prevention and treatment remain unclear. Here, we investigate iron absorption, losses, and the efficacy and safety of oral iron supplementation with versus without prebiotics in three prospective studies in children with virally suppressed HIV in South Africa (NCT03572010, NCT04931641). In the first study, using stable iron isotopes, we show that iron absorption from iron-fortified maize porridge, a lipid-based nutrient supplement, and an oral iron supplement is comparable between children with HIV (n = 43) and without HIV (n = 45). In the second study, we use a stable iron isotope dilution method over a 6-month period to demonstrate that children with HIV (n = 29) absorb significantly less iron from their habitual diet than their uninfected peers (n = 36), while basal iron losses are similar. In the third study, a 12-week randomised, placebo-controlled, double-blind trial, iron-deficient children with HIV receiving iron with prebiotic galacto-oligosaccharides (n = 41) exhibit a 39% greater relative increase in serum ferritin (primary outcome) compared to those receiving iron with placebo (n = 42) (p = 0.053). They also report significantly fewer infection-related symptoms, with no significant differences in gut inflammation or enteropathogen carriage (secondary outcomes). Collectively, these findings indicate that while dietary iron absorption is reduced in children with virally suppressed HIV, supplemental and fortificant iron are well absorbed, and co-administration of iron supplements with prebiotics may improve efficacy and safety. Children living with HIV face a heightened risk of iron deficiency, yet optimal prevention and treatment strategies remain elusive. In these three prospective studies in South African children living with HIV, the authors show reduced dietary iron absorption but adequate absorption from iron supplements. Prebiotics may enhance efficacy and safety of oral iron supplementation in iron-deficient children living with HIV.
Metabolism.authors_short: Baumgartner, Jeannine et al., Zimmermann, Michael B.
Metabolism.title_cn: 南非病毒载量受抑制艾滋病儿童铁吸收与流失及联合或不联合益生元铁补充剂疗效：三项前瞻性研究
Metabolism.abstract_cn: 艾滋病患儿面临铁缺乏的风险，但最佳的预防和治疗策略仍不明确。本研究在南非对病毒载量受抑制的艾滋病患儿进行了三项前瞻性研究（NCT03572010, NCT04931641），旨在调查铁吸收、流失以及口服铁补充剂联合或不联合益生元的疗效和安全性。在第一项研究中，我们利用稳定铁同位素技术表明，艾滋病患儿（n=43）与非艾滋病患儿（n=45）从铁强化玉米粥、脂质营养补充剂和口服铁补充剂中吸收的铁量相当。在第二项研究中，我们采用稳定铁同位素稀释法，在六个月内证明艾滋病患儿（n=29）从日常饮食中吸收的铁显著少于未感染的同龄儿童（n=36），而基础铁流失量相似。在第三项研究中，一项为期12周的随机、安慰剂对照、双盲试验显示，接受铁剂联合益生元低聚半乳糖治疗的铁缺乏艾滋病患儿（n=41）的血清铁蛋白相对增加量（主要结局指标）比接受铁剂联合安慰剂的患儿（n=42）高39%（p=0.053）。他们还报告了显著更少的感染相关症状，肠道炎症或肠道病原体携带方面没有显著差异（次要结局指标）。总的来说，这些发现表明，尽管病毒载量受抑制的艾滋病患儿的膳食铁吸收减少，但补充性铁和强化铁的吸收良好。益生元可能增强铁缺乏艾滋病患儿口服铁补充剂的疗效和安全性。

Metabolism.title: TSLP links intestinal nutrient sensing with amplification of the ILC2–tuft cell circuit
Metabolism.summary: Nature Immunology, Published online: 12 November 2025;doi:10.1038/s41590-025-02328-yLocksley and colleagues describe a nutrient-sensing circuit in the small intestine. Upon feeding, TSLP production from fibroblasts is increased in a GLP-2-dependent manner, resulting in increased ILC2 activation and tuft cell hyperplasia, thus linking food intake with ILC2 activation.
Metabolism.abstract: Group 2 innate lymphocytes (ILC2s) are prevalent in small intestine but their role during homeostasis is unclear. Here we show that thymic stromal lymphopoietin (TSLP)—a cytokine implicated in ILC2 activation—is expressed constitutively in subepithelial fibroblasts, including telocytes and crypt-associated trophocytes, which are specialized fibroblasts necessary to sustain epithelial identity. Feeding increases TSLP and induces ILC2 type 2 cytokines that are attenuated by deletion of TSLP in fibroblasts or TSLP receptor on ILC2s. Both mouse and human intestinal fibroblasts express receptors for glucagon-like peptide-2 (GLP-2)—an intestinotrophic growth factor released by enteroendocrine cells following food intake. GLP-2 promotes intestinal TSLP in mouse and human intestinal fibroblasts, and TSLP-dependent ILC2 activation and tuft cell hyperplasia in mice, thus linking nutrient detection with ILC2-mediated amplification of the tuft cell chemosensory circuit that promotes epithelial surveillance of ingested cargo. Locksley and colleagues describe a nutrient-sensing circuit in the small intestine. Upon feeding, TSLP production from fibroblasts is increased in a GLP-2-dependent manner, resulting in increased ILC2 activation and tuft cell hyperplasia, thus linking food intake with ILC2 activation.
Metabolism.authors_short: Liao, Chang et al., Locksley, Richard M.
Metabolism.title_cn: TSLP连接肠道营养感知与ILC2-簇状细胞回路的放大
Metabolism.abstract_cn: 2型固有淋巴细胞 (ILC2s) 在小肠中普遍存在，但它们在稳态中的作用尚不清楚。本研究表明，胸腺基质淋巴细胞生成素 (TSLP)——一种与ILC2活化相关的细胞因子——在包括间质细胞和隐窝相关滋养细胞在内的上皮下成纤维细胞中组成型表达。这些成纤维细胞是维持上皮细胞特性所必需的特化细胞。进食会增加TSLP的表达并诱导ILC2产生2型细胞因子，而通过删除成纤维细胞中的TSLP或ILC2上的TSLP受体可以减弱这种效应。小鼠和人肠道成纤维细胞均表达胰高血糖素样肽-2 (GLP-2) 的受体，GLP-2是一种在进食后由肠内分泌细胞释放的促肠生长因子。GLP-2促进小鼠和人肠道成纤维细胞中肠道TSLP的表达，并促进小鼠体内TSLP依赖的ILC2活化和簇状细胞增生，从而将营养检测与ILC2介导的簇状细胞化学感应回路的放大联系起来，该回路促进了上皮细胞对摄入物质的监测。Locksley及其同事描述了小肠中的一个营养感知回路。进食后，成纤维细胞产生的TSLP以GLP-2依赖的方式增加，导致ILC2活化和簇状细胞增生增加，从而将食物摄入与ILC2活化联系起来。

Metabolism.title: Uridine-sensitized screening identifies demethoxy-coenzyme Q and NUDT5 as regulators of nucleotide synthesis
Metabolism.summary: Nature Metabolism, Published online: 13 November 2025;doi:10.1038/s42255-025-01419-2A uridine-sensitized CRISPR-Cas9 screening identifies demethoxy-CoQ as an alternative electron acceptor in the absence of CoQ, and NUDT5 as a regulator of de novo pyrimidine synthesis via its interaction with PPAT.
Metabolism.abstract: Rapidly proliferating cells require large amounts of nucleotides, making nucleotide metabolism a widely exploited therapeutic target against cancer, autoinflammatory disorders and viral infections. However, regulation of nucleotide metabolism remains incompletely understood. Here, we reveal regulators of de novo pyrimidine synthesis. Using uridine-sensitized CRISPR-Cas9 screening, we show that coenzyme Q (CoQ) is dispensable for pyrimidine synthesis, in the presence of the demethoxy-CoQ intermediate as alternative electron acceptor. We further report that the ADP-ribose pyrophosphatase NUDT5 directly binds PPAT, the rate-limiting enzyme in purine synthesis, which inhibits its activity and preserves the phosphoribosyl pyrophosphate (PRPP) pool. In the absence of NUDT5, hyperactive purine synthesis exhausts the PRPP pool at the expense of pyrimidine synthesis, which promotes resistance to purine and pyrimidine nucleobase analogues. Of note, the interaction between NUDT5 and PPAT is disrupted by PRPP, highlighting an intricate allosteric regulation. Overall, our findings reveal a fundamental mechanism of nucleotide balance and position NUDT5 as a regulator of nucleobase analogue metabolism. A uridine-sensitized CRISPR-Cas9 screening identifies demethoxy-CoQ as an alternative electron acceptor in the absence of CoQ, and NUDT5 as a regulator of de novo pyrimidine synthesis via its interaction with PPAT.
Metabolism.authors_short: Strefeler, Abigail et al., Jourdain, Alexis A.
Metabolism.title_cn: 尿苷敏感性筛选鉴定出脱甲氧基辅酶Q和NUDT5为核苷酸合成的调控因子
Metabolism.abstract_cn: 快速增殖的细胞需要大量的核苷酸，这使得核苷酸代谢成为癌症、自身炎症性疾病和病毒感染的广泛利用的治疗靶点。然而，核苷酸代谢的调控机制仍未完全阐明。在此，我们揭示了从头嘧啶合成的调控因子。通过尿苷敏感性CRISPR-Cas9筛选，我们发现，在脱甲氧基辅酶Q中间体作为替代电子受体存在的情况下，辅酶Q (CoQ) 对于嘧啶合成并非必需。我们进一步报告，ADP-核糖焦磷酸酶NUDT5直接结合嘌呤合成的限速酶PPAT，从而抑制其活性并维持磷酸核糖焦磷酸 (PRPP) 库。在NUDT5缺失的情况下，过度活跃的嘌呤合成会耗尽PRPP库，从而牺牲嘧啶合成，并促进对嘌呤和嘧啶核碱基类似物的耐药性。值得注意的是，NUDT5和PPAT之间的相互作用被PRPP破坏，这突显了一种复杂的变构调控机制。总而言之，我们的研究结果揭示了核苷酸平衡的基本机制，并将NUDT5定位为核碱基类似物代谢的调控因子。尿苷敏感性CRISPR-Cas9筛选鉴定出脱甲氧基辅酶Q在CoQ缺失时作为替代电子受体，并揭示NUDT5通过与PPAT的相互作用调控从头嘧啶合成。

Metabolism.title: Reawakening cAMP signalling in cancer cachexia
Metabolism.summary: Nature Metabolism, Published online: 12 November 2025;doi:10.1038/s42255-025-01417-4The question of why muscle wasting persists in cancer cachexia despite adequate nutrition has long since intrigued researchers. Here, the authors identify PDE4D-mediated suppression of cAMP–PKA–CREB1 signalling as a driver of mitochondrial dysfunction and show that PDE4D inhibition preserves muscle bioenergetics and mass in cancer cachexia.
Metabolism.abstract: The question of why muscle wasting persists in cancer cachexia despite adequate nutrition has long since intrigued researchers. Here, the authors identify PDE4D-mediated suppression of cAMP–PKA–CREB1 signalling as a driver of mitochondrial dysfunction and show that PDE4D inhibition preserves muscle bioenergetics and mass in cancer cachexia.
Metabolism.title_cn: 重新激活癌症恶病质中的cAMP信号传导
Metabolism.abstract_cn: 尽管营养充足，癌症恶病质中肌肉萎缩持续存在的原因长期以来一直困扰着研究人员。本研究中，作者们发现PDE4D介导的cAMP–PKA–CREB1信号传导抑制是线粒体功能障碍的驱动因素，并表明PDE4D抑制能够维持癌症恶病质中的肌肉生物能量和质量。

Metabolism.title: Structural basis of G6P/Pi transport and inhibition in SLC37A4
Metabolism.summary: Nature Structural & Molecular Biology, Published online: 12 November 2025;doi:10.1038/s41594-025-01711-5Zhou et al. report cryo-electron microscopy structures of human SLC37A4 in four states, elucidating conformational transitions during glucose-6-phosphate/phosphate transport and S-4048 inhibition. This study links structural mechanisms to glycogen storage disease type Ib pathology, offering therapeutic insights.
Metabolism.abstract: Glycogen storage disease type Ib (GSD-Ib), caused by loss-of-function mutations in the endoplasmic reticulum transporter SLC37A4, disrupts glucose homeostasis through impaired glucose-6-phosphate (G6P)/phosphate (Pi) antiport. Despite its central role in glycogen metabolism and immune regulation, the structural mechanisms governing SLC37A4’s transport cycle and pathological dysfunction remain elusive. Here we report cryo-electron microscopy structures of human SLC37A4 in four functional states, capturing conformational transitions between lumen-facing and cytoplasm-facing states. Combined with mutational analysis, molecular dynamics simulations and functional assays, we identify a conserved substrate-binding pocket that alternately accommodates G6P and Pi through electrostatic complementarity and domain-dependent interactions. We further demonstrate that the high-affinity inhibitor S-4048 sterically occludes the cytoplasmic entry pathway by trapping the transporter in a cytoplasm-facing conformation. Our work elucidates the molecular pathology of GSD-Ib-linked mutations and provides a structural framework for developing therapies targeting this transporter in metabolic diseases. Zhou et al. report cryo-electron microscopy structures of human SLC37A4 in four states, elucidating conformational transitions during glucose-6-phosphate/phosphate transport and S-4048 inhibition. This study links structural mechanisms to glycogen storage disease type Ib pathology, offering therapeutic insights.
Metabolism.authors_short: Zhou, Dong et al., Zhang, Zhe
Metabolism.title_cn: SLC37A4中G6P/Pi转运及其抑制的结构基础
Metabolism.abstract_cn: 糖原贮积病Ib型（GSD-Ib）是由内质网转运蛋白SLC37A4的功能缺失突变引起的，通过葡萄糖-6-磷酸（G6P）/磷酸（Pi）逆向转运受损而扰乱葡萄糖稳态。尽管SLC37A4在糖原代谢和免疫调节中发挥核心作用，但其转运循环和病理功能障碍的结构机制仍不清楚。本研究报道了人SLC37A4在四种功能状态下的冷冻电镜结构，捕获了其在腔面朝向和细胞质面朝向状态之间的构象转变。结合突变分析、分子动力学模拟和功能测定，我们鉴定了一个保守的底物结合口袋，该口袋通过静电互补和结构域依赖性相互作用交替结合G6P和Pi。我们进一步证明，高亲和力抑制剂S-4048通过将转运蛋白捕获在细胞质面朝向的构象中，空间性地阻断了细胞质进入途径。我们的工作阐明了GSD-Ib相关突变的分子病理学，并为开发针对代谢疾病中该转运蛋白的疗法提供了结构框架。

Metabolism.title: Structural basis of glucose-6-phosphate transport by human SLC37A2
Metabolism.summary: Nature Structural & Molecular Biology, Published online: 12 November 2025;doi:10.1038/s41594-025-01712-4Lai and Xu et al. used cryo-electron microscopy and functional analyses to elucidate the glucose-6-phosphate uniport mechanism of human solute carrier family 37 member 2 and its structural dynamics, offering insights into glucose metabolism and related disorders.
Metabolism.abstract: Glucose-6-phosphate (G6P) transporters are crucial for glucose metabolism by mediating G6P transport from the cytoplasm to endoplasmic reticulum (ER). However, their transport mechanisms remain poorly understood. Here, we elucidate the structural and functional basis of human solute carrier family 37 member 2 (SLC37A2), a G6P transporter implicated in metabolic regulation and macrophage inflammation. We show that SLC37A2 functions as a uniporter, facilitating G6P transport independent of inorganic phosphate gradients. Structures of SLC37A2 in the apo and G6P-bound states reveal a dimeric architecture. Both the ER luminal-open and cytosolic-open structures are captured, showing the structural dynamics during G6P transport. G6P is coordinated by SLC37A2 through interactions with its phosphate and hydroxyl groups. Furthermore, mapping mutations associated with glycogen storage disease type Ib onto SLC37A2 highlights residues essential for transport activity. Together, this work provides structural insights into G6P transport and establishes a framework for understanding related metabolic disorders. Lai and Xu et al. used cryo-electron microscopy and functional analyses to elucidate the glucose-6-phosphate uniport mechanism of human solute carrier family 37 member 2 and its structural dynamics, offering insights into glucose metabolism and related disorders.
Metabolism.authors_short: Lai, Qinxuan et al., Liu, Xin
Metabolism.title_cn: 人源SLC37A2介导葡萄糖-6-磷酸转运的结构基础
Metabolism.abstract_cn: 葡萄糖-6-磷酸 (G6P) 转运蛋白通过介导G6P从细胞质到内质网 (ER) 的转运，对葡萄糖代谢至关重要。然而，其转运机制仍知之甚少。本研究阐明了人源溶质载体家族37成员2 (SLC37A2) 的结构和功能基础，SLC37A2是一种与代谢调节和巨噬细胞炎症相关的G6P转运蛋白。我们发现SLC37A2作为一种单向转运蛋白发挥作用，独立于无机磷酸梯度促进G6P转运。SLC37A2在脱辅基和G6P结合状态下的结构揭示了其二聚体构象。我们捕获了内质网腔开放和细胞质开放两种构象，展示了G6P转运过程中的结构动态变化。G6P通过与SLC37A2的磷酸基团和羟基相互作用而被SLC37A2结合。此外，将与糖原贮积病Ib型相关的突变映射到SLC37A2上，突出了对转运活性至关重要的残基。综上所述，这项工作为G6P转运提供了结构见解，并为理解相关代谢疾病建立了框架。Lai和Xu等人利用冷冻电镜和功能分析阐明了人源溶质载体家族37成员2的葡萄糖-6-磷酸单向转运机制及其结构动态，为葡萄糖代谢和相关疾病提供了见解。

Cancer.title: Cytosolic acetyl-coenzyme A is a signalling metabolite to control mitophagy
Cancer.summary: Nature, Published online: 12 November 2025;doi:10.1038/s41586-025-09745-xAcetyl-coenzyme A functions as a non-canonical signal to trigger mitophagy, and the acetyl-coenzyme A–NLRX1 axis underlies the KRAS-inhibitor-induced mitophagy response and promotes drug resistance, providing a metabolic mechanism of KRAS inhibitor resistance.
Cancer.abstract: Acetyl-coenzyme A (AcCoA) sits at the nexus of nutrient metabolism and shuttles between the canonical and non-canonical tricarboxylic acid cycle1,2, which is dynamically regulated by nutritional status, such as fasting3. Here we find that mitophagy is triggered after a reduction in cytosolic AcCoA levels through short-term fasting and through inhibition of ATP-citrate lyase (encoded by ACLY), mitochondrial citrate/malate antiporter (encoded by SLC25A1) or acyl-CoA synthetase short chain family member 2 (encoded by ACSS2), and the mitophagy can be counteracted by acetate supplementation. Notably, NOD-like receptor (NLR) family member X1 (NLRX1) mediates this effect. Disrupting NLRX1 abolishes cytosolic AcCoA reduction-induced mitophagy both in vitro and in vivo. Mechanically, the mitochondria outer-membrane-localized NLRX1 directly binds to cytosolic AcCoA within a conserved pocket on its leucine-rich repeat (LRR) domain. Moreover, AcCoA binds to the LRR domain and enhances its interaction with the nucleotide-binding and oligomerization (NACHT) domain, which helps to maintain NLRX1 in an autoinhibited state and prevents the association between NLRX1 and light chain 3 (LC3). Furthermore, we find that the AcCoA–NLRX1 axis underlies the KRAS-inhibitor-induced mitophagy response and promotes drug resistance, providing a metabolic mechanism of KRAS inhibitor resistance. Thus, cytosolic AcCoA is a signalling metabolite that connects metabolism to mitophagy through its receptor NLRX1. Acetyl-coenzyme A functions as a non-canonical signal to trigger mitophagy, and the acetyl-coenzyme A–NLRX1 axis underlies the KRAS-inhibitor-induced mitophagy response and promotes drug resistance, providing a metabolic mechanism of KRAS inhibitor resistance.
Cancer.authors_short: Zhang, Yifan et al., Lei, Qun-Ying
Cancer.title_cn: 胞质乙酰辅酶A作为信号代谢物调控线粒体自噬
Cancer.abstract_cn: 乙酰辅酶A (AcCoA) 位于营养代谢的枢纽，并在经典和非经典三羧酸循环之间穿梭1,2，其动态受营养状态（如禁食3）的调控。本研究发现，通过短期禁食以及抑制ATP-柠檬酸裂解酶 (由ACLY编码)、线粒体柠檬酸/苹果酸逆向转运蛋白 (由SLC25A1编码) 或短链酰基辅酶A合成酶家族成员2 (由ACSS2编码)，胞质AcCoA水平降低后会触发线粒体自噬，且这种自噬可通过补充乙酸盐来逆转。值得注意的是，NOD样受体 (NLR) 家族成员X1 (NLRX1) 介导了这一效应。在体外和体内实验中，NLRX1的破坏均能消除胞质AcCoA降低诱导的线粒体自噬。机制上，定位于线粒体外膜的NLRX1通过其富含亮氨酸重复序列 (LRR) 结构域上的一个保守口袋直接结合胞质AcCoA。此外，AcCoA结合LRR结构域并增强其与核苷酸结合和寡聚化 (NACHT) 结构域的相互作用，这有助于维持NLRX1的自抑制状态，并阻止NLRX1与轻链3 (LC3) 的结合。进一步地，我们发现AcCoA–NLRX1轴是KRAS抑制剂诱导的线粒体自噬反应的基础，并促进了耐药性，从而揭示了KRAS抑制剂耐药性的一种代谢机制。因此，胞质AcCoA是一种通过其受体NLRX1将代谢与线粒体自噬连接起来的信号代谢物。综上所述，乙酰辅酶A作为一种非经典信号触发线粒体自噬，而乙酰辅酶A–NLRX1轴则构成了KRAS抑制剂诱导的线粒体自噬反应并促进耐药性的代谢机制。

Cancer.title: Uridine-sensitized screening identifies demethoxy-coenzyme Q and NUDT5 as regulators of nucleotide synthesis
Cancer.summary: Nature Metabolism, Published online: 13 November 2025;doi:10.1038/s42255-025-01419-2A uridine-sensitized CRISPR-Cas9 screening identifies demethoxy-CoQ as an alternative electron acceptor in the absence of CoQ, and NUDT5 as a regulator of de novo pyrimidine synthesis via its interaction with PPAT.
Cancer.abstract: Rapidly proliferating cells require large amounts of nucleotides, making nucleotide metabolism a widely exploited therapeutic target against cancer, autoinflammatory disorders and viral infections. However, regulation of nucleotide metabolism remains incompletely understood. Here, we reveal regulators of de novo pyrimidine synthesis. Using uridine-sensitized CRISPR-Cas9 screening, we show that coenzyme Q (CoQ) is dispensable for pyrimidine synthesis, in the presence of the demethoxy-CoQ intermediate as alternative electron acceptor. We further report that the ADP-ribose pyrophosphatase NUDT5 directly binds PPAT, the rate-limiting enzyme in purine synthesis, which inhibits its activity and preserves the phosphoribosyl pyrophosphate (PRPP) pool. In the absence of NUDT5, hyperactive purine synthesis exhausts the PRPP pool at the expense of pyrimidine synthesis, which promotes resistance to purine and pyrimidine nucleobase analogues. Of note, the interaction between NUDT5 and PPAT is disrupted by PRPP, highlighting an intricate allosteric regulation. Overall, our findings reveal a fundamental mechanism of nucleotide balance and position NUDT5 as a regulator of nucleobase analogue metabolism. A uridine-sensitized CRISPR-Cas9 screening identifies demethoxy-CoQ as an alternative electron acceptor in the absence of CoQ, and NUDT5 as a regulator of de novo pyrimidine synthesis via its interaction with PPAT.
Cancer.authors_short: Strefeler, Abigail et al., Jourdain, Alexis A.
Cancer.title_cn: 尿苷敏感性筛选鉴定出脱甲氧基辅酶Q和NUDT5为核苷酸合成的调控因子
Cancer.abstract_cn: 快速增殖的细胞需要大量的核苷酸，这使得核苷酸代谢成为癌症、自身炎症性疾病和病毒感染的广泛利用的治疗靶点。然而，核苷酸代谢的调控机制仍未完全阐明。在此，我们揭示了从头嘧啶合成的调控因子。通过尿苷敏感性CRISPR-Cas9筛选，我们发现，在脱甲氧基辅酶Q中间体作为替代电子受体存在的情况下，辅酶Q (CoQ) 对于嘧啶合成并非必需。我们进一步报告，ADP-核糖焦磷酸酶NUDT5直接结合嘌呤合成的限速酶PPAT，从而抑制其活性并维持磷酸核糖焦磷酸 (PRPP) 库。在NUDT5缺失的情况下，过度活跃的嘌呤合成会耗尽PRPP库，从而牺牲嘧啶合成，并促进对嘌呤和嘧啶核碱基类似物的耐药性。值得注意的是，NUDT5和PPAT之间的相互作用被PRPP破坏，这突显了一种复杂的变构调控机制。总而言之，我们的研究结果揭示了核苷酸平衡的基本机制，并将NUDT5定位为核碱基类似物代谢的调控因子。尿苷敏感性CRISPR-Cas9筛选鉴定出脱甲氧基辅酶Q在CoQ缺失时作为替代电子受体，并揭示NUDT5通过与PPAT的相互作用调控从头嘧啶合成。

Cancer.title: Reawakening cAMP signalling in cancer cachexia
Cancer.summary: Nature Metabolism, Published online: 12 November 2025;doi:10.1038/s42255-025-01417-4The question of why muscle wasting persists in cancer cachexia despite adequate nutrition has long since intrigued researchers. Here, the authors identify PDE4D-mediated suppression of cAMP–PKA–CREB1 signalling as a driver of mitochondrial dysfunction and show that PDE4D inhibition preserves muscle bioenergetics and mass in cancer cachexia.
Cancer.abstract: The question of why muscle wasting persists in cancer cachexia despite adequate nutrition has long since intrigued researchers. Here, the authors identify PDE4D-mediated suppression of cAMP–PKA–CREB1 signalling as a driver of mitochondrial dysfunction and show that PDE4D inhibition preserves muscle bioenergetics and mass in cancer cachexia.
Cancer.title_cn: 重新激活癌症恶病质中的cAMP信号传导
Cancer.abstract_cn: 尽管营养充足，癌症恶病质中肌肉萎缩持续存在的原因长期以来一直困扰着研究人员。本研究中，作者们发现PDE4D介导的cAMP–PKA–CREB1信号传导抑制是线粒体功能障碍的驱动因素，并表明PDE4D抑制能够维持癌症恶病质中的肌肉生物能量和质量。

Cancer.title: Impaired cAMP–PKA–CREB1 signalling drives mitochondrial dysfunction in skeletal muscle during cancer cachexia
Cancer.summary: Nature Metabolism, Published online: 12 November 2025;doi:10.1038/s42255-025-01397-5Tumour-induced dysregulation of cAMP–PKA–CREB1 signalling in skeletal muscle is shown to be a driver of mitochondrial dysfunction, contributing to cancer cachexia in mice.
Cancer.abstract: Skeletal muscle wasting is a defining feature of cancer cachexia, a multifactorial syndrome that drastically compromises patient quality of life and treatment outcomes. Mitochondrial dysfunction is a major contributor to skeletal muscle wasting in cancer cachexia, yet the upstream molecular drivers remain elusive. Here we show that cancer impairs the activity of cAMP-dependent protein kinase A (PKA) and of its transcriptional effector CREB1 in skeletal muscle, ultimately contributing to the downregulation of a core transcriptional network that supports mitochondrial integrity and function. The restoration of cAMP–PKA–CREB1 signalling through pharmacological inhibition of the cAMP-hydrolysing phosphodiesterase 4 (PDE4) rescues the expression of mitochondrial-related genes, improves mitochondrial function and mitigates skeletal muscle wasting in male mice. Altogether, our data identify tumour-induced suppression of the cAMP–PKA–CREB1 axis as a central mechanism contributing to mitochondrial dysfunction in skeletal muscle during cancer cachexia. Furthermore, these findings highlight PDE4, particularly the PDE4D isoform, as a potential therapeutic target to preserve muscle mitochondrial function and counteract muscle wasting in cancer cachexia. Tumour-induced dysregulation of cAMP–PKA–CREB1 signalling in skeletal muscle is shown to be a driver of mitochondrial dysfunction, contributing to cancer cachexia in mice.
Cancer.authors_short: Angelino, Elia et al., Graziani, Andrea
Cancer.title_cn: 受损的cAMP–PKA–CREB1信号通路驱动癌症恶病质期间骨骼肌线粒体功能障碍
Cancer.abstract_cn: 骨骼肌萎缩是癌症恶病质的一个典型特征，这是一种严重损害患者生活质量和治疗效果的多因素综合征。线粒体功能障碍是癌症恶病质中骨骼肌萎缩的主要原因之一，但其上游分子驱动因素仍不明确。本研究表明，癌症损害了骨骼肌中cAMP依赖性蛋白激酶A (PKA)及其转录效应因子CREB1的活性，最终导致支持线粒体完整性和功能的关键转录网络的下调。通过药理学抑制cAMP水解磷酸二酯酶4 (PDE4)来恢复cAMP–PKA–CREB1信号通路，可在雄性小鼠中挽救线粒体相关基因的表达，改善线粒体功能并减轻骨骼肌萎缩。总而言之，我们的数据表明肿瘤诱导的cAMP–PKA–CREB1轴抑制是导致癌症恶病质期间骨骼肌线粒体功能障碍的核心机制。此外，这些发现强调PDE4，特别是PDE4D亚型，是维持肌肉线粒体功能和对抗癌症恶病质中肌肉萎缩的潜在治疗靶点。研究表明，肿瘤诱导的骨骼肌中cAMP–PKA–CREB1信号通路的失调是线粒体功能障碍的驱动因素，并导致小鼠癌症恶病质。

Biotechnology.title: iPEX enables micrometre-resolution deep spatial proteomics via tissue expansion
Biotechnology.summary: Nature, Published online: 12 November 2025;doi:10.1038/s41586-025-09734-0Isotropic tissue magnification is integrated with matrix-assisted laser desorption/ionization mass spectrometry imaging to enable untargeted spatial proteomics at micrometre resolution and with high protein identification rates in multiple tissue types.
Biotechnology.abstract: The number of spatial omics technologies being developed is increasing1. However, a missing tool is one that can locate proteins in tissues in an untargeted manner at high spatial resolution and coverage. Here we present in situ imaging proteomics via expansion (iPEX), which integrates isotropic tissue magnification2 with matrix-assisted laser desorption/ionization (MALDI) mass spectrometry imaging. iPEX provides scalable spatial resolution down to the micrometre scale and substantially increases the sensitivity of protein identification by 10–100-fold. Using the retina as a model, iPEX enabled the construction of spatial proteomic maps with high precision, the visualization of single-cell layers and extrasomatic structures and the identification of colocalized proteins. iPEX was readily applied to diverse tissues, including brain, intestine, liver and organoids, detecting 600–1,500 proteins at 1–5-µm effective pixel size. The application of iPEX to depict spatial proteomic maps in brains of mice with 5xFAD Alzheimer’s disease revealed an early-onset mitochondrial aberrancy. Notably, in young mice, the peroxisomal acetyl-CoA acyltransferase ACAA1A—of which the N392S mutant is a monogenic risk factor in Alzheimer’s disease3—was downregulated. ACAA1 depletion blocked the biosynthesis of long-chain polyunsaturated fatty acids, including docosahexaenoic acid, in multiple cellular contexts. These lipidome alterations were restored in cells overexpressing wild-type ACAA1 but not ACAA1(N392S), which suggests that the dysregulation of long-chain polyunsaturated fatty acids has an early role in neurodegeneration. Together, these results demonstrate that iPEX facilitates untargeted spatial proteomics at micrometre resolution for diverse applications. Isotropic tissue magnification is integrated with matrix-assisted laser desorption/ionization mass spectrometry imaging to enable untargeted spatial proteomics at micrometre resolution and with high protein identification rates in multiple tissue types.
Biotechnology.authors_short: Wang, Fengxiang et al., Zou, Yilong
Biotechnology.title_cn: iPEX通过组织膨胀技术实现微米级深度空间蛋白质组学
Biotechnology.abstract_cn: 空间组学技术正日益发展。然而，目前仍缺乏一种能够以高空间分辨率和覆盖度，非靶向地定位组织中蛋白质的工具。本文介绍了一种通过膨胀实现的体内成像蛋白质组学（iPEX）技术，该技术将各向同性组织放大技术与基质辅助激光解吸/电离（MALDI）质谱成像相结合。iPEX可提供低至微米级的可扩展空间分辨率，并将蛋白质识别灵敏度显著提高了10至100倍。以视网膜为模型，iPEX能够高精度地构建空间蛋白质组图谱，可视化单细胞层和体外结构，并识别共定位蛋白质。iPEX易于应用于多种组织，包括大脑、肠道、肝脏和类器官，在1-5微米的有效像素尺寸下检测到600-1500种蛋白质。将iPEX应用于描绘5xFAD阿尔茨海默病小鼠大脑中的空间蛋白质组图谱，揭示了早期线粒体异常。值得注意的是，在年轻小鼠中，过氧化物酶体乙酰辅酶A酰基转移酶ACAA1A（其N392S突变体是阿尔茨海默病的单基因风险因素）表达下调。ACAA1的缺失阻断了多种细胞环境中长链多不饱和脂肪酸（包括二十二碳六烯酸）的生物合成。这些脂质组改变在过表达野生型ACAA1的细胞中得到恢复，但在过表达ACAA1(N392S)的细胞中未能恢复，这表明长链多不饱和脂肪酸的失调在神经退行性疾病中具有早期作用。综上所述，这些结果表明iPEX能够实现微米级分辨率的非靶向空间蛋白质组学，并具有广泛的应用前景。该技术通过将各向同性组织放大技术与基质辅助激光解吸/电离质谱成像相结合，在多种组织类型中实现了微米级分辨率和高蛋白质识别率的非靶向空间蛋白质组学。

Biotechnology.title: Isotropic, aberration-corrected light sheet microscopy for rapid high-resolution imaging of cleared tissue
Biotechnology.summary: Nature Biotechnology, Published online: 13 November 2025;doi:10.1038/s41587-025-02882-8A light-sheet microscope built from off-the-shelf components enables high-resolution clear tissue imaging.
Biotechnology.abstract: Light-sheet microscopy is ideal for imaging large and cleared tissues, but achieving a high isotropic resolution for a centimeter-sized sample is limited by slow and often aberrated, axially scanned light sheets. Here, we introduce a compact, high-speed light-sheet fluorescence microscope achieving 850 nm isotropic resolution across cleared samples up to 1 cm³ and refractive indices ranging from 1.33 to 1.56. Using off-the-shelf optics, we combine an air objective and a meniscus lens with an axially swept light sheet to achieve diffraction-limited resolution and aberration correction. The effective field of view is increased by twofold by correcting the field curvature of the light sheet using a concave mirror in the remote focusing unit. Adapting the light sheet’s motion with a closed-loop feedback enhances the imaging speed by tenfold, reaching 100 frames per second while maintaining resolution and field of view. We benchmark the system performance across scales, from subcellular structure up to centimeter scale, using various clearing methods. A light-sheet microscope built from off-the-shelf components enables high-resolution clear tissue imaging.
Biotechnology.authors_short: Aakhte, Mostafa et al., Huisken, Jan
Biotechnology.title_cn: 用于透明化组织快速高分辨率成像的各向同性像差校正光片显微镜
Biotechnology.abstract_cn: 光片显微镜是成像大型透明化组织的理想选择，但对于厘米级样本实现高各向同性分辨率，受限于缓慢且常伴有像差的轴向扫描光片。在此，我们介绍了一种紧凑型高速光片荧光显微镜，它能在高达1立方厘米、折射率范围为1.33至1.56的透明化样本中实现850纳米的各向同性分辨率。通过使用市售光学元件，我们将空气物镜和弯月透镜与轴向扫描光片相结合，实现了衍射极限分辨率和像差校正。通过在远程聚焦单元中使用凹面镜校正光片的场曲，有效视场增加了两倍。通过闭环反馈调整光片的运动，成像速度提高了十倍，达到每秒100帧，同时保持了分辨率和视场。我们使用多种透明化方法，对该系统从亚细胞结构到厘米尺度的性能进行了基准测试。这种由市售组件构建的光片显微镜能够实现高分辨率的透明组织成像。

Biotechnology.title: A large-scale human toxicogenomics resource for drug-induced liver injury prediction
Biotechnology.summary: Nature Communications, Published online: 13 November 2025;doi:10.1038/s41467-025-65690-3Drug-induced liver injury is a major cause of patient harm, trial failures, and drug withdrawals. Here, the authors show that a toxicogenomics resource of 300 drugs enables the prediction of liver injury with 88% sensitivity at 100% specificity and reveals mechanisms for safer drug development.
Biotechnology.abstract: Drug-Induced Liver Injury (DILI) remains one of the most critical challenges in drug development, causing patient safety concerns, clinical trial failures and drug withdrawals. We introduce ToxPredictor, a toxicogenomics framework combining RNA-seq data from primary human hepatocytes with pharmacokinetic data to predict dose-resolved DILI risks and safety margins. At its core is DILImap, an RNA-seq library tailored for DILI research, comprising 300 compounds at multiple concentrations. ToxPredictor achieves 88% sensitivity at 100% specificity in blind validation, outperforming state-of-the-art methods. It flagged recent phase III clinical failures, including Evobrutinib, TAK-875, and BMS-986142, overlooked by animal studies. Beyond prediction, ToxPredictor provides mechanistic insights into hepatotoxic pathways, enabling early de-risking and actionable safety decisions. Unlike single-endpoint readouts—even from 3D models—transcriptomics offers a multi-dimensional system-level view of hepatocyte responses, capable of detecting diverse DILI mechanisms not captured by conventional assays. Scalable, actionable, and integrated into a broader AI/ML drug discovery platform, this work establishes toxicogenomics as a promising tool for developing safer therapeutics and addressing one of the most pressing challenges in toxicology. Drug-induced liver injury is a major cause of patient harm, trial failures, and drug withdrawals. Here, the authors show that a toxicogenomics resource of 300 drugs enables the prediction of liver injury with 88% sensitivity at 100% specificity and reveals mechanisms for safer drug development.
Biotechnology.authors_short: Bergen, Volker et al., Zamanighomi, Mahdi
Biotechnology.title_cn: 一个用于药物性肝损伤预测的大规模人类毒理基因组学资源
Biotechnology.abstract_cn: 药物性肝损伤（DILI）仍然是药物开发中最严峻的挑战之一，它导致患者安全问题、临床试验失败和药物撤市。我们引入了ToxPredictor，这是一个毒理基因组学框架，它结合了原代人肝细胞的RNA测序数据和药代动力学数据，以预测剂量依赖性的DILI风险和安全裕度。其核心是DILImap，一个为DILI研究量身定制的RNA测序文库，包含300种化合物在多个浓度下的数据。ToxPredictor在盲法验证中实现了88%的敏感性和100%的特异性，优于现有最先进的方法。它成功识别了近期被动物研究忽视的III期临床失败药物，包括Evobrutinib、TAK-875和BMS-986142。除了预测功能，ToxPredictor还提供了肝毒性通路的机制性见解，有助于早期去风险化和制定可操作的安全决策。与单终点读数（即使是来自3D模型）不同，转录组学提供了肝细胞反应的多维度系统级视图，能够检测传统检测方法无法捕获的多种DILI机制。这项工作具有可扩展性、可操作性，并已整合到一个更广泛的AI/ML药物发现平台中，它确立了毒理基因组学作为开发更安全疗法和解决毒理学中最紧迫挑战之一的有前景工具的地位。药物性肝损伤是导致患者伤害、试验失败和药物撤市的主要原因。本文作者展示了一个包含300种药物的毒理基因组学资源能够以88%的敏感性和100%的特异性预测肝损伤，并揭示了更安全药物开发的机制。

Biotechnology.title: Ultra-mild bisulfite outperforms existing methods for 5-methylcytosine detection with low input DNA
Biotechnology.summary: Nature Communications, Published online: 13 November 2025;doi:10.1038/s41467-025-66033-yDNA methylation is a critical biomarker for disease detection, yet current methods often compromise DNA integrity or lack sufficient accuracy. Here, the authors introduce Ultra-Mild Bisulfite Sequencing, a technique that enables highly sensitive, robust, and accurate detection of 5mC.
Biotechnology.abstract: We present Ultra-Mild Bisulfite Sequencing (UMBS-seq), a method for 5-methylcytosine (5mC) detection that minimizes DNA degradation and background noise. UMBS-seq outperforms conventional bisulfite and enzymatic methyl-sequencing (EM-seq) methods in library yield, complexity, and conversion efficiency when applied to low-input DNA samples. In particular, its effectiveness with low-input cell-free DNA (cfDNA) and hybridization-based target capture highlights its potential for clinical applications, including 5mC biomarker detection and early disease diagnosis. DNA methylation is a critical biomarker for disease detection, yet current methods often compromise DNA integrity or lack sufficient accuracy. Here, the authors introduce Ultra-Mild Bisulfite Sequencing, a technique that enables highly sensitive, robust, and accurate detection of 5mC.
Biotechnology.authors_short: Dai, Qing et al., He, Chuan
Biotechnology.title_cn: 超温和亚硫酸氢盐法在低起始量DNA检测5-甲基胞嘧啶方面优于现有方法
Biotechnology.abstract_cn: 我们提出了一种超温和亚硫酸氢盐测序（UMBS-seq）方法，用于5-甲基胞嘧啶（5mC）检测，该方法能最大限度地减少DNA降解并降低背景噪音。在应用于低起始量DNA样本时，UMBS-seq在文库产量、复杂性和转化效率方面均优于传统的亚硫酸氢盐测序和酶促甲基化测序（EM-seq）方法。尤其值得一提的是，其在低起始量无细胞DNA（cfDNA）和基于杂交的靶向捕获方面的有效性，凸显了其在临床应用中的巨大潜力，包括5mC生物标志物检测和早期疾病诊断。DNA甲基化是疾病检测的关键生物标志物，然而现有方法往往会损害DNA完整性或缺乏足够的准确性。本文中，作者引入了超温和亚硫酸氢盐测序技术，该技术能够实现5mC的高灵敏度、稳健且准确的检测。

Biotechnology.title: Chemical richness and diversity of uncultivated ‘Entotheonella’ symbionts in marine sponges
Biotechnology.summary: Nature Chemical Biology, Published online: 13 November 2025;doi:10.1038/s41589-025-02066-0Marine sponges host bacteria that produce diverse bioactive compounds. Here, the authors conduct a large-scale metagenomic, single-bacterial and biochemical study to reveal the untapped biosynthetic potential of ‘Entotheonella’ symbionts, a talented producer taxon from microbial dark matter.
Biotechnology.abstract: Marine sponges are the source of numerous bioactive natural products that serve as chemical defenses and provide pharmaceutical leads for drug development. For some of the compounds, symbiotic bacteria have been established as the actual producers. Among the known sponge symbionts, ‘Candidatus Entotheonella’ members stand out because of their abundant and variable biosynthetic gene clusters (BGCs). Here, to obtain broader insights into this producer taxon, we conduct a comparative analysis on eight sponges through metagenomic and single-bacterial sequencing and biochemical studies. The data suggest sets of biosynthetic genes that are largely unique in 14 ‘Entotheonella’ candidate species and a member of a sister lineage named ‘Candidatus Proxinella’. Four biosynthetic loci were linked in silico or experimentally to cytotoxins, antibiotics and the terpene cembrene A from corals. The results support widespread and diverse bacterial roles in the chemistry of sponges and aid the development of sustainable production methods for sponge-derived therapeutics. Marine sponges host bacteria that produce diverse bioactive compounds. Here, the authors conduct a large-scale metagenomic, single-bacterial and biochemical study to reveal the untapped biosynthetic potential of ‘Entotheonella’ symbionts, a talented producer taxon from microbial dark matter.
Biotechnology.authors_short: Dell, Maria et al., Piel, Jörn
Biotechnology.title_cn: 海洋海绵中未培养的“Entotheonella”共生体的化学多样性与丰富性
Biotechnology.abstract_cn: 海洋海绵是多种生物活性天然产物的来源，这些产物既可作为化学防御物质，也为药物开发提供了药学先导化合物。对于其中一些化合物，共生细菌已被证实是其真正的生产者。在已知的海绵共生体中，“Candidatus Entotheonella”成员因其丰富且多变的生物合成基因簇（BGCs）而脱颖而出。为了更深入地了解这一生产者类群，本研究通过宏基因组学、单细菌测序和生物化学研究，对八种海绵进行了比较分析。数据表明，在14种“Entotheonella”候选物种以及一个名为“Candidatus Proxinella”的姐妹谱系成员中，存在大量独特的生物合成基因集。四个生物合成位点通过计算机模拟或实验被证实与细胞毒素、抗生素以及来自珊瑚的萜烯类化合物cembrene A相关。这些结果支持了细菌在海绵化学中广泛而多样的作用，并有助于开发海绵源治疗药物的可持续生产方法。海洋海绵宿主细菌可产生多种生物活性化合物。本研究中，作者通过大规模宏基因组学、单细菌和生物化学研究，揭示了“Entotheonella”共生体（一个来自微生物暗物质的优秀生产者类群）尚未开发的生物合成潜力。

Biotechnology.title: MISO: microfluidic protein isolation enables single-particle cryo-EM structure determination from a single cell colony
Biotechnology.summary: Nature Methods, Published online: 13 November 2025;doi:10.1038/s41592-025-02894-xThe micro isolation (MISO) method combines microfluidics-based protein purification with cryo-EM grid preparation, enabling cryo-EM structure determination of soluble and membrane proteins starting from less than 1 µg of a target protein.
Biotechnology.abstract: Single-particle cryogenic electron microscopy (cryo-EM) enables reconstruction of atomic-resolution 3D maps of proteins by visualizing thousands to millions of purified protein particles embedded in vitreous ice. This corresponds to picograms of purified protein, which can potentially be isolated from a few thousand cells. Hence, cryo-EM holds the potential of a very sensitive analytical method for delivering high-resolution protein structure as a readout. In practice, millions of times more starting biological material is required to prepare cryo-EM grids. Here we show that using a micro isolation (MISO) method, which combines microfluidics-based protein purification with cryo-EM grid preparation, cryo-EM structures of soluble bacterial and eukaryotic membrane proteins can be solved starting from less than 1 µg of a target protein and progressing from cells to cryo-EM grids within a few hours. This scales down the amount of starting biological material hundreds to thousands of times, opening possibilities for the structural characterization of hitherto inaccessible proteins. The micro isolation (MISO) method combines microfluidics-based protein purification with cryo-EM grid preparation, enabling cryo-EM structure determination of soluble and membrane proteins starting from less than 1 µg of a target protein.
Biotechnology.authors_short: Eluru, Gangadhar et al., Efremov, Rouslan G.
Biotechnology.title_cn: MISO：微流控蛋白分离助力单细胞集落的单颗粒冷冻电镜结构测定
Biotechnology.abstract_cn: 单颗粒冷冻电子显微镜（cryo-EM）通过观察包埋在玻璃态冰中的数千至数百万个纯化蛋白质颗粒，能够重建蛋白质的原子分辨率三维结构图。这相当于皮克级的纯化蛋白质，理论上可以从数千个细胞中分离得到。因此，cryo-EM 有潜力成为一种非常灵敏的分析方法，以高分辨率蛋白质结构作为输出。然而，在实际操作中，制备 cryo-EM 样品网格需要多达数百万倍的起始生物材料。本文展示了一种微分离（MISO）方法，该方法结合了基于微流控的蛋白质纯化与 cryo-EM 样品网格制备，能够从少于 1 微克的靶蛋白开始，并在数小时内从细胞到 cryo-EM 样品网格，解析可溶性细菌和真核膜蛋白的 cryo-EM 结构。这使得起始生物材料的用量减少了数百至数千倍，为迄今难以获得的蛋白质的结构表征开辟了可能性。微分离（MISO）方法结合了基于微流控的蛋白质纯化与 cryo-EM 样品网格制备，使得从少于 1 微克的靶蛋白开始即可进行可溶性蛋白和膜蛋白的 cryo-EM 结构测定。

Stem cell.title: Human organoids as 3D in vitro platforms for drug discovery: opportunities and challenges
Stem cell.summary: Nature Reviews Drug Discovery, Published online: 12 November 2025;doi:10.1038/s41573-025-01317-yHuman organoids provide physiologically relevant, 3D models for studying disease mechanisms, drug efficacy and toxicity. This Review examines organoid generation methods, applications in preclinical drug discovery, and the regulatory and practical challenges that must be addressed for their integration into development pipelines.
Stem cell.abstract: Organoids are 3D structures derived from stem cells that recapitulate key architectural and functional aspects of the corresponding tissue. Compared with conventional 2D cell lines, human organoids provide experimental models that more closely reflect human physiology. Their ability to capture the complexity and heterogeneity of human tissues enables the study of disease mechanisms, drug efficacy and toxicity. When generated from patient material, organoids also allow the assessment of individual drug responses. In this Review, we explore the utility of organoids in drug discovery. We outline current methodologies for generating and maintaining organoids, examine their applications in disease modelling, drug screening and safety evaluation, and consider regulatory aspects and the challenges for their broader adoption in drug discovery. Human organoids provide physiologically relevant, 3D models for studying disease mechanisms, drug efficacy and toxicity. This Review examines organoid generation methods, applications in preclinical drug discovery, and the regulatory and practical challenges that must be addressed for their integration into development pipelines.
Stem cell.authors_short: Wang, Daisong et al., Clevers, Hans
Stem cell.title_cn: 人体类器官作为药物发现的三维体外平台：机遇与挑战
Stem cell.abstract_cn: 类器官是源自干细胞的三维结构，能够重现相应组织的关键结构和功能特征。与传统的二维细胞系相比，人体类器官提供了更接近人体生理学的实验模型。它们能够捕捉人体组织的复杂性和异质性，从而有助于疾病机制、药物疗效和毒性的研究。当从患者材料中生成时，类器官还允许评估个体药物反应。在本综述中，我们探讨了类器官在药物发现中的应用价值。我们概述了类器官生成和维持的当前方法，审视了它们在疾病建模、药物筛选和安全性评估中的应用，并考虑了监管方面以及它们在药物发现中更广泛应用所面临的挑战。人体类器官为研究疾病机制、药物疗效和毒性提供了生理学相关的三维模型。本综述考察了类器官的生成方法、在临床前药物发现中的应用，以及为将其整合到开发流程中必须解决的监管和实践挑战。
